NK046(mi)002:1441: par mthong zhing shes pa'i don gyi phyir de bzhina
NK046(mi)002:1442: gshegsa pa nyid kyis gsungs te /
NK046(mi)002:1444: bdag ni sems can gyi tshogs mtha' yas pa de
NK046(mi)002:1445: la phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir go bgos na
NK046(mi)002:1446: sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde bar
NK046(mi)002:1447: dmigs pa mtha' yas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba mtha'
NK046(mi)002:1448: yas pa dag bag med par gyur tam /
NK046(mi)002:1449: gnyid kyis log kyang nyin mtshan du sems kyi skad cig la 'phel ba dang /
NK046(mi)002:1450: rgyas par dang yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te /
NK046(mi)002:1452: gnyis pa rig pa'i sgo nas sgrub pa la /
NK046(mi)002:1453: smon sems kyi phan yon rigs pa'i sgo nas bsgrub pa dang /
NK046(mi)002:1454: 'jug sems kyi phan yon rigs pa'i sgo nas bsgrub pa gnyis las /
NK046(mi)002:1456: de la rgyu 'bras kyi rnam bzhag ni shes bya
NK046(mi)002:1457: shin tu lkog gyur yin pas thams cad mkhyen pa
NK046(mi)002:1458: sangs rgyas kho na'i spyod yul las gzhan gyi spyod
NK046(mi)002:1459: yul ma yin pas na rgyal ba'i bka' lung rnam
NK046(mi)002:1460: dag la yid ches kyis blang dor bya ba las
NK046(mi)002:1461: rigs pas 'thad pa sgrub tu med na'ang byang chub
NK046(mi)002:1462: sems kyi phan yon ni shin tu rgya che zhing
NK046(mi)002:1463: rgyal bas kyang yang yang basngagasa par mdzad pas na
NK046(mi)002:1464: rigs pas kyang bsgrub na'ang 'grub par 'gyur ba yin
NK046(mi)002:1465: pas na rigs pas bsgrub par mdzad pa ste /
NK046(mi)002:1466: sngon khyim bdag mdza' bo'i bu mo zhes rgya mtshor
NK046(mi)002:1467: nor bu len du 'gro tshe mas gos kyi mtha'
NK046(mi)002:1468: nas bzung ste ngus bas nga rang rgya mtshor 'gro
NK046(mi)002:1469: ba la khyod kyis bkra mi shis pa byas te
NK046(mi)002:1470: ngu bar zer nas mgo la rdog pas bsnun nas
NK046(mi)002:1471: song bas rgya mtshor gru gzings zhig tshe khos shing
NK046(mi)002:1472: leb cing la 'jus pas mtsho gling zhig tu thon
NK046(mi)002:1473: te / dga' ba'i grong sogs rim par bgrod nas
NK046(mi)002:1474: mthar mgo la lcags kyi 'khor lo 'khor nas sdug
NK046(mi)002:1475: bsngal bzod dka' ba byung bas de'i rkyen gyis snying
NK046(mi)002:1476: rje skyes te ma'i mgo la rdog pa bsnun pa'i
NK046(mi)002:1477: 'bras bu myong ba rnams kyi sdug bsngal bdag la
NK046(mi)002:1478: smin nas de dag gis mi myong bar shog cig
NK046(mi)002:1479: bsam ma thag tu sdug bsngal las grol nas shing
NK046(mi)002:1480: rta la bdun srid du bde cham mer 'dug pa
NK046(mi)002:1482: de ltar snying rje'i sems kyis semsa can nyung zad
NK046(mi)002:1483: rnams kyi klad nad tsam sman la sogs pas basla
NK046(mi)002:1484: lo snyam du bsam nas sbyor bas bsal bar ma
NK046(mi)002:1485: byas na yang de la phan 'dogsa par 'dod pa'i
NK046(mi)002:1486: bsam pa dang ldan pas te /
NK046(mi)002:1487: de la bsod namsa dapaga tu med pa dang ldan
NK046(mi)002:1488: pa 'gyur na byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis nam
NK046(mi)002:1489: mkha' dang mnyam pa'i semsa can thams cad la re
NK046(mi)002:1490: re'i ste rang rang so so bzhin du 'di phyi'i
NK046(mi)002:1491: sdug bsngal lam mi bde ba dapaga tu med pa
NK046(mi)002:1492: mtha' dag ma lus par basla bar 'doda cinga /
NK046(mi)002:1493: de dag re re la'ang gnas skabs dang mthar thug
NK046(mi)002:1494: gi yon tan dapaga tu med pa dang ldan pa
NK046(mi)002:1495: nyid du bsgrub par 'dod pa la bsod nams dpag
NK046(mi)002:1496: tu med pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba lta smos
NK046(mi)002:1498: bsam pa bzang ba'i tshul yang 'jig rten na bsam
NK046(mi)002:1499: pa bzang bar grags pa pha'am yanga na ma yanga
NK046(mi)002:1500: rung ste de dag gis rang rang gi bu 'di
NK046(mi)002:1501: tshe ring zhing nad med pa btsan phyug mnga' thang
NK046(mi)002:1502: sogs che na ci ma rung snyam pa las byang
NK046(mi)002:1503: chub sems dpa' min pa su la 'dis sangs rgyas
NK046(mi)002:1504: kyi go 'phang thob na ci ma rung snyam pa'i
NK046(mi)002:1505: byang chub kyi sems 'di 'dra'i phan semsa yoda de
NK046(mi)002:1506: med do // de dag gis mi shes pas lan
NK046(mi)002:1507: no snyam na mngon shes lnga dang ldan pa'i lha
NK046(mi)002:1508: dang rigs pa'i gnas chen bco brgyad shes pa'i drang
NK046(mi)002:1509: srong rnams kyang rung ste de 'dra'i bsam pa med
NK046(mi)002:1510: med do // la / de dag la phan sems med pas mi 'byung ngo snyam na /
NK046(mi)002:1511: tshangs pas rang gi mnga' ris rnams bde ba dang ldan 'dod dang /
NK046(mi)002:1512: sdug bsngal dang bral 'dod sogs tshangs pa'i gnas pa
NK046(mi)002:1513: bzhi dang ldan pa'i tshangsa pa la yanga de dag
NK046(mi)002:1514: sangs rgyas thob 'dod kyi byang chub kyi sems 'di
NK046(mi)002:1516: pha dang ma dang lha dang drang srong tshangs pa
NK046(mi)002:1517: la sogs pa'i semsa can de dag nyid la sngon
NK046(mi)002:1518: chad rang gi don du yang sangs rgyas thob 'dod
NK046(mi)002:1519: 'di 'dra'i semsa khyad par can tha na gang ci
NK046(mi)002:1520: yang rmi ba'i rmi lam du yang ma rmisa shing
NK046(mi)002:1521: skye ma myong na sems can gzhan gyi don du
NK046(mi)002:1522: dngos su ga la skye ste skye mi rigs so
NK046(mi)002:1523: // lha la sogs pa gzhan dag gzhan don du
NK046(mi)002:1524: lta ci rang gi don du yang mi 'byung rgyu'i
NK046(mi)002:1525: sems can thams cad kyi don sems pa'i byang chub
NK046(mi)002:1526: kyi semsa gang yin pa 'di ni semsa kyi rin
NK046(mi)002:1527: chen ste rnam rtog gi nang nas rin po che
NK046(mi)002:1528: lta bu'i rnam rtog khyad par du 'phags pa 'di
NK046(mi)002:1529: nyid rang rgyud la snga na med pa'i ste sngar
NK046(mi)002:1530: skye ma myong ba'i ngo mtshar rmad ciga ste rmad
NK046(mi)002:1531: du byung ba zhig da res theg chen gyi chos
NK046(mi)002:1532: // thos pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi
NK046(mi)002:1533: mthus rang rgyud la 'khrungs pa 'di ni lha yul
NK046(mi)002:1534: dpag sam gyi ljon pa 'jig rten mi yul na
NK046(mi)002:1536: de ni mtha' yas pa'i 'gro ba kun gyi gnas
NK046(mi)002:1537: skabs dang mthar thug gi dga' bde ma lus pa
NK046(mi)002:1539: semsa can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal gyi nad ma
NK046(mi)002:1540: lus pa sel ba'i sman chen po'am rtsir gyur pa
NK046(mi)002:1541: yi rin chen byang chub sems kyi bsoda nams sam
NK046(mi)002:1542: phan yon gang yin pa de la 'di tsam zhes
NK046(mi)002:1543: tshad kyi ji ltar gzhal gyis langa ste nam mkha'i
NK046(mi)002:1544: mtha' dang sems can gyi grangs dang sdug bsngal gyi
NK046(mi)002:1545: rnam grangs / sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rnams gzhal gyis mi lang ba'i phyir ro //
NK046(mi)002:1546: nges na dpal byin gyis zhus pa las //
NK046(mi)002:1547: byang chub sems kyi bsod nams gang //
NK046(mi)002:1548: gal te de la gzugs mchis na //
NK046(mi)002:1549: nam mkha'i khams ni kun gang ste //
NK046(mi)002:1550: de bas kyang ni lhag par 'gyur //
NK046(mi)002:1554: bye ba khrag khrig gtam pa'i zhing dag na //
NK046(mi)002:1555: mchod pa rnams mang dpag med ci yod pa //
NK046(mi)002:1556: skyes mchog rnams la nyin rer rtag mchod pas //
NK046(mi)002:1557: byams pa'i sems la grangs dang char mi phod //
NK046(mi)002:1559: byams pa'i sems kyis sems can la bde ba dang
NK046(mi)002:1560: ldan 'dod kyi phan para bsam pa tsam gyis kyang
NK046(mi)002:1561: rin po che sna bdun la sogs pas sangs rgyas
NK046(mi)002:1562: bcom ldan 'das rnams la mchoda pa byas pa las
NK046(mi)002:1564: nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i semsa can ma lus pa
NK046(mi)002:1565: thamsa cad kyi bde don ste sangs rgyas kyi go
NK046(mi)002:1566: 'phang 'thob pa'i ched du sbyin sogs phyin drug la
NK046(mi)002:1567: dngos su sbyor bas brtson pa ni sangs rgyas mchod
NK046(mi)002:1568: las khyad par du 'phags pa smos ci dgosa so
NK046(mi)002:1569: // sems can thams cad tshe thung ba nad mang
NK046(mi)002:1570: ba longs spyod med pa la sogs pa'i 'di phyi'i
NK046(mi)002:1571: sdug bsngal mi 'dod pas 'dora bar 'dod pa'i semsa
NK046(mi)002:1572: // yod kyang / zhe 'dod dang lag len phyin ci log tu gyur nas srog gcod pa /
NK046(mi)002:1573: ma byin pa len pa sogs mi dge ba bcu
NK046(mi)002:1574: dang du blangs nas 'di phyi'i sdug bsngal nyid la
NK046(mi)002:1575: phye ma sleb mar me la mchongs pa bzhin mngona
NK046(mi)002:1576: par rgyug cing / de bzhin du tshe ring ba
NK046(mi)002:1577: nad med pa la sogs pa'i 'di phyi'i bde ba
NK046(mi)002:1578: 'dod kyang de'i thabs blang dor la rmongs shing gti
NK046(mi)002:1579: mug pas dge bcu mi sgrub par ma zad mi
NK046(mi)002:1580: dge ba sna tshogs byas te rang gi 'di phyi'i
NK046(mi)002:1581: bde ba dgra bo mthong ba ltar 'jomas par byed
NK046(mi)002:1582: par rgyug cing / do // des na sems can
NK046(mi)002:1583: gang zhig rgyu dang bcas pa'i bde bas phongas shing
NK046(mi)002:1584: par rgyug cing / do // dbul ba dang /
NK046(mi)002:1585: sdug bsngal rgyu 'bras mang po dang ldan zhing nyams
NK046(mi)002:1587: byams pa chen po'i sgo nas gnas skabs dang mthar
NK046(mi)002:1588: thug gi bde ba kun gyis tshim par byed pa
NK046(mi)002:1589: dang / snying rje chen po'i sgo nas 'di phyi'i sdug bsngal thamsa cad rgyun gcod par byed cinga /
NK046(mi)002:1590: shes rab chen po'i sgo nas blang dor gyi gnas
NK046(mi)002:1591: bstan nas rgyu 'bras blang dor la rmongs pa'i gti
NK046(mi)002:1592: mug kyang ni sela bar byed pa yi rgyu de
NK046(mi)002:1593: dang dge ba stobs mtshungsa gzhan ga la yod de
NK046(mi)002:1594: med la / bde ba bsgrub cing sdug bsngal sel ba dang /
NK046(mi)002:1595: blang dor gyi gnas ston pa de 'dra'i phan 'dogs
NK046(mi)002:1596: pa'i bshes kyang ga la yoda de med cing 'bras
NK046(mi)002:1597: bu bsod namsa kyang byang chub kyi sems de dang
NK046(mi)002:1598: 'dra ba'ang ga la yoda de med do //
NK046(mi)002:1599: des phan yon bstan zin la /
NK046(mi)002:1600: de ltar phan yon shes pa'i don po rin chen
NK046(mi)002:1601: byang chub kyi sems de rang gzhan gyi rgyud la
NK046(mi)002:1602: mi skyed pa'i thabs med nges snyam nas rang gzhan
NK046(mi)002:1603: gyi rgyud la ma skyes pa bskyed par byed pa
NK046(mi)002:1604: dang skyes pa mi nyams shing gong 'phel du byed
NK046(mi)002:1605: pa'i thabs la bkres pa zas dang skom pa chu
NK046(mi)002:1606: la gdung ba lta bu'i don gnyer gyi 'dun pa
NK046(mi)002:1607: chen po sus kyang bzlog tu med pa zhig byung
NK046(mi)002:1608: na phan yon shes pa'i don 'bras byung ba yin
NK046(mi)002:1609: gyi gzhan du bshad shes pa tsam gyis ci yang
NK046(mi)002:1610: mi phan pas sems thog nas yang yang sgom dgos
NK046(mi)002:1611: gsungs / gsum pa sems bskyed rgyud ldan gyi gang zag gi che ba ni /
NK046(mi)002:1612: sngar zas nor sogs kyis phan btagsa pa la phyis
NK046(mi)002:1613: 'dis phan btags so zhes tshur lan ldon pa gang
NK046(mi)002:1615: byas pa shes shing drin bzo ba'i //
NK046(mi)002:1616: mi la dpal mgon nye bar gnas //
NK046(mi)002:1617: zhes byas pa shes pa la lha rnams kyis bsrung
NK046(mi)002:1618: ba sogs yon tan che zhing re zhiga 'jig rten
NK046(mi)002:1619: na bstod cing basngagasa par 'osa na /
NK046(mi)002:1620: sngar rang gis phar phan ma btags shing phan pa
NK046(mi)002:1621: sgrub par sus kyang ma bcol bzhin du 'di phyi
NK046(mi)002:1622: kun tu legas pa'am phan bde'i thabs 'ba' zhig sgrub
NK046(mi)002:1623: para byed pa yi byang chub semsa dapa'a rnams la
NK046(mi)002:1624: mchod cing bstod de basngagasa par 'os pa smos ci
NK046(mi)002:1625: dgosa so // dpe la brten nas don ngo shes //
NK046(mi)002:1627: dpe las don lhag par shes pa yul dman pa
NK046(mi)002:1628: bargya'am stong la sogs pa 'gro ba nyung zad tsam
NK046(mi)002:1629: la nar ma'i zhes lo'am zla bar nyin bzhin nar
NK046(mi)002:1630: ma ste rgyun ma bcad pa'i zas sbyin pa'am sbyor
NK046(mi)002:1632: dus dman pa bya rdzogs kyi skad ciga ma la /
NK046(mi)002:1633: dngos po dman pa yon 'bul ba med pa'i zas tsam sbyin para byed pa dang /
NK046(mi)002:1634: sbyor ba dman pa brdung rdeg la sogs pas brnyas bcos dang bacasa pa'i sgo nas /
NK046(mi)002:1635: phan 'dogs pa dman pa nyin phyed tsam la lto
NK046(mi)002:1636: 'grangsa par byed pa yi sbyin bdag la yang 'jig
NK046(mi)002:1637: rten na sbyin gtong rgya chen po'i dge ba byed
NK046(mi)002:1638: pa yin no zhes skye bo mang bosa bstod cing
NK046(mi)002:1640: byang chub sems dpa' rnams de ltar yul dman pa
NK046(mi)002:1641: ma yin pa nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i semsa can
NK046(mi)002:1642: gyi khams grangsa mtha'a yas pa rnams la dus dman
NK046(mi)002:1643: pa ma yin pa dus ring po 'khor ba ma
NK046(mi)002:1645: dngos po dman pa ma yin pa bde bar gshegsa
NK046(mi)002:1646: pa sangs rgyas kyi bde ba bla na med pa
NK046(mi)002:1647: / sbyor ba dman pa ma yin pa zhi zhing gus pa dang bcas pa'i sgo nas /
NK046(mi)002:1648: phan 'dogs dman pa ma yin pa khyad par can
NK046(mi)002:1649: rang rang gi yid la gang ci bsam pa mtha'
NK046(mi)002:1650: dag ma lus pa rdzogsa par byed pa rgyun mi
NK046(mi)002:1651: 'chad pa'i rtag tu sbyin pa chen po de lta
NK046(mi)002:1652: bu zhig gtong ba'i sbyin bdag byang chub sems dpa'
NK046(mi)002:1653: rnams bstod cing bkur bar 'os pa smos ci dgos
NK046(mi)002:1654: so // sems can gang su zhig gis gong du
NK046(mi)002:1655: bshad pa de 'dra'i rgyal ba'i sras po sangs rgyas
NK046(mi)002:1656: kyi go 'phang sbyin pa'i sbyin badga chen po de
NK046(mi)002:1657: la lus ngag gis gnod pa lta ci /
NK046(mi)002:1658: gal te zhe sdang la sogs pas 'di la ma
NK046(mi)002:1659: rung ba zhig byung na snyam pa'i ngan semsa tsam
NK046(mi)002:1660: zhig bskyed para byed pa de /
NK046(mi)002:1661: ngan semsa bskyed pa'i grangs bzhina te zhes 'dir skyes
NK046(mi)002:1662: bu stobs ldan gyis se gol gcig brdab pa'i yun
NK046(mi)002:1663: drug cu rtsa bzhir bgos pa'i yun gcig dus mtha'i
NK046(mi)002:1665: de'i grangs ji snyed yod pa de snyed kyi bskal
NK046(mi)002:1666: bar ni dmyal bar sdug bsngal chen po myong zhing
NK046(mi)002:1667: gnas para 'gyur zhes thub pasa gsungs te /
NK046(mi)002:1668: rab tu zhi ba rnam par nges pa cho 'phrul gyi mdo las /
NK046(mi)002:1670: byang chub sems dpa' la khong khro ba dang brnyas
NK046(mi)002:1671: pa'i sems ci tsam pa de snyed kyi bskal bar
NK046(mi)002:1672: sems can dmyal bar gnas par go cha bgo bar
NK046(mi)002:1674: 'on te sems can gang su zhig gis yid rab
NK046(mi)002:1675: tu dga' zhing dang ba'i sems kyis byang chub sems
NK046(mi)002:1676: dpa' de'i zhal du blta bar byed na de yi
NK046(mi)002:1677: 'bras bu ni de'i yun gyi skad cig gi grangs
NK046(mi)002:1678: de snyed las lhag pa'i bskal ba'i grangs su dga'
NK046(mi)002:1679: ldan lha'i bde ba myong ba la sogs pa rgya
NK046(mi)002:1680: che bas na ngan sems kyi 'bras bu de bas
NK046(mi)002:1682: nges pa dang ma nges par 'jug pa'i phyag rgya'i mdo las /
NK046(mi)002:1683: 'jam dpal yongs su brtag pa bzung nas gal te
NK046(mi)002:1684: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi sems
NK046(mi)002:1685: can thams cad kyi mig phyung bar 'gyur la /
NK046(mi)002:1686: yongs su brtag pa bzung ste rigs kyi bu'am rigs
NK046(mi)002:1687: kyi bu mo gang la las sems can de dag
NK046(mi)002:1688: thams cad la byams pa'i sems kyi de dag gi
NK046(mi)002:1690: 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan
NK046(mi)002:1691: gang gis theg pa chen po la mos pa'i byang
NK046(mi)002:1692: chub sems dpa' la dad pa'i sems kyis blta na
NK046(mi)002:1693: / 'di ni de bas bsod nams ches grangs med pa bskyed do //
NK046(mi)002:1695: rgyal sras byang chub sems dpa' rnams la do gal te kha zas med /
NK046(mi)002:1699: nad gdon dgra 'dre'i gnod 'tshe sogs rkyen ngan chen
NK046(mi)002:1700: posa kyang zhes chen po ji tsam byung yang ltas
NK046(mi)002:1701: ngan g.yang du 'gug cing rkyen ngan grogs su 'char
NK046(mi)002:1702: ba'i gang zag yin pas na /
NK046(mi)002:1703: chos kyi bar chad du mi 'gyur bas sdig pa mi 'byung bar ma zad sdig pa'i bshags ma /
NK046(mi)002:1704: dge ba'i bskul mar gyur te nges 'byung dang byams
NK046(mi)002:1705: snying rje sogs dge ba ngang gis gong nas gong
NK046(mi)002:1706: du 'phel bar 'gyur te dper na rgyal bu sbyin
NK046(mi)002:1708: rgyal po gtsug na nor bu bzhin no //
NK046(mi)002:1709: de yang byang sems snying stobs zhan cing thabs la
NK046(mi)002:1710: mi mkhas pa rnams ni rkyen ngan phra mo re
NK046(mi)002:1712: lto 'grangs nyi mas dros tshe chos pa'i gzugs //
NK046(mi)002:1713: rkyen ngan thog tu bab tshe tha mal pa //
NK046(mi)002:1714: zhes gsungs pa lta bu dang /
NK046(mi)002:1715: blo brtan cing thabs la mkhas pa rnams ni /
NK046(mi)002:1717: snod bcud sdig pas gang ba'i tshe //
NK046(mi)002:1718: rkyen ngan byang chub lam du bsgyur //
NK046(mi)002:1720: na tsha sdug bsngal dgra 'dre sogs rkyen ngan ci
NK046(mi)002:1721: byung yang de'i dbang du mi gtong bar byang chub
NK046(mi)002:1722: sgrub pa'i grogs su 'gro ba ni mar me dang
NK046(mi)002:1723: nags kyi me la rlung gis rim par gnod pa
NK046(mi)002:1724: dang / grogs su 'gro ba lta bu'o //
NK046(mi)002:1725: gang zag mchog dman gang la semsa kyi rnam rtog
NK046(mi)002:1726: thams cad kyi nang nas dam pa srid zhi'i rgud
NK046(mi)002:1727: pa thams cad sel bar byed pa'i rina chen byang
NK046(mi)002:1728: chub kyi sems de skyes par gyur pa de yi
NK046(mi)002:1729: sku la sgo gsum gus pa chen po'i sgo nas
NK046(mi)002:1731: byang chub sems dpa' gang la brnyas thabs la sogs pa'i gnoda pa byas kyang /
NK046(mi)002:1733: ngan 'brel 'khor ba mtha' can zhes pa ltar yin
NK046(mi)002:1734: pas snying rje dang byang chub kyi sems dang thabs
NK046(mi)002:1735: mkhas dang smon lam gyi stobs kyis gnas skabs dang
NK046(mi)002:1736: mthar thug gi bde ba dang 'brel ba ste thob
NK046(mi)002:1737: par mdzad de dper na drang srong bzod par smra
NK046(mi)002:1738: ba dang / rgyal po byams pa'i stobs bzhin no //
NK046(mi)002:1739: des na rnam pa thams cad du 'brel tshad don
NK046(mi)002:1740: dang ldan pas 'di phyi'i bde ba thams cad pa'i
NK046(mi)002:1741: 'byung gansa skyes bu dam pa byang chub sems dpa'
NK046(mi)002:1742: de rnams la skyabsa su mchi zhes skyabs su song
NK046(mi)002:1743: ba ltar bdag cag gis kyang rgyal sras byang chub
NK046(mi)002:1744: sems dpa' rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su 'gro
NK046(mi)002:1745: bar bya'o // 'o na gong du byang sems la ngan sems byas pas dmyal bar skye zhes dang /
NK046(mi)002:1746: 'dir gnod pa byas pas bde ba dang 'brel zhes
NK046(mi)002:1747: pa gnyis mi 'gal lam zhe na mi 'gal te
NK046(mi)002:1748: / snga ma ni las 'bras bslu med yin pa'i
NK046(mi)002:1749: ngos nas ngan sems kyi 'phral du dmyal bar skye
NK046(mi)002:1751: 'dir byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje dang byang chub
NK046(mi)002:1752: kyi sems kyis thabs la mkhas pa dang smon lam
NK046(mi)002:1753: dbang btsan pas rjes su 'dzin pa la dgongs pa
NK046(mi)002:1754: yin pas so // de ltar sems bskyed rgyud ldan
NK046(mi)002:1755: la yon tan yod par shes ba'i don po rang
NK046(mi)002:1756: gis byang sems rnams la sngar sgo gsum gyi nyes
NK046(mi)002:1757: pa gang byas la bshags sdom byed cing skyabs su
NK046(mi)002:1758: 'dzin na don 'bras 'byung ba yin gyi shes shing
NK046(mi)002:1759: bshad pa tsam gyis ci yang mi 'ong bas sems
NK046(mi)002:1760: thog tu blangs te bsgom dgos de'ang spyir bod 'di
NK046(mi)002:1761: 'phags pa thugs rje chen po'i gdul zhing theg chen
NK046(mi)002:1762: gyi rigs can du gsungs shing deng phal cher dbang
NK046(mi)002:1763: ma thob ba'ang med pas byang chub sems dpa' lhar
NK046(mi)002:1764: bcas 'gro ba'i phyag mchod kyi gnas su gyur pa
NK046(mi)002:1765: la sogs pa'i yon tan mang po dang ldan pa'i
NK046(mi)002:1766: gang zag khyad par can zhig yin la ma 'ongs
NK046(mi)002:1767: ba'i sangs rgyas kyang yin pas de dag la rang
NK046(mi)002:1768: gis sngon chad log lta sgro skur sogs byas pa
NK046(mi)002:1769: yod na bshags sdom bya zhing /
NK046(mi)002:1770: deng phyin chad dag snang sbyang ba dang phyag mchod dang skyabs gnas su 'dzin dgos te /
NK046(mi)002:1771: snyigs ma'i dus na byang sems rnams la gang zag
NK046(mi)002:1772: gzhan la bsten pa'i nyes pa shin tu 'byung nye
NK046(mi)002:1773: bar mdo las gsungs pas na sems can rnams kyi
NK046(mi)002:1774: skyon la mi lta bar dag snang sbyangs pa gal
NK046(mi)002:1775: che ste rgya gar gyi bram ze zla ba lhar
NK046(mi)002:1776: 'dzin pa rnams kyis zla ba nya ba la phyag
NK046(mi)002:1777: bya ba tshes kyi zla ba la phyag bya ba
NK046(mi)002:1778: ltar byang sems la phyag bya bar gsungs pa dang
NK046(mi)002:1779: / gal te nyes pa'i skyon zhig yod na yang
NK046(mi)002:1780: de 'dus byas yin pa'i phyir lam bsgom pa'i stobs
NK046(mi)002:1781: kyis zad de sangs rgyas par 'gyur ba yin gyi
NK046(mi)002:1782: dang po nas skyon med pa zhig gis sangs rgyas
NK046(mi)002:1783: thob pa ma yin pas na sems can gyi nyes
NK046(mi)002:1784: skyon la mi blta ba 'di gal che ba'i man
NK046(mi)002:1785: / ngag yin gsungs / le'u'i mtshan ni /
NK046(mi)002:1786: byang chub semsa dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug pa lasa
NK046(mi)002:1787: byang chub sems kyi phan yon bshad pa zhes bya
NK046(mi)002:1790: // le'u gnyis pa sdig pa bshags pa'i le'u la /
NK046(mi)002:1797: sdig pa bshags pa'i yan lag dang bzhi las /
NK046(mi)002:1800: yid kyis sprul pa'i mchod pa /
NK046(mi)002:1801: smon lam stobs kyis mchod pa /
NK046(mi)002:1802: bla na med pa'i mchod pa /
NK046(mi)002:1803: bstod pa dbyangs kyi mchod pa dang lnga las /
NK046(mi)002:1805: bdag pos yongs su bzung ba'i mchod pa /
NK046(mi)002:1806: bdag pos yongs su ma bzung ba'i mchod pa /
NK046(mi)002:1807: lus 'bul ba'i mchod pa dang gsum las /
NK046(mi)002:1809: yon tan gyi khyad par de lta bu dang ldan
NK046(mi)002:1810: pa'i rin chen byang chub kyi sems de rgyu med
NK046(mi)002:1811: rkyen med du mi 'byung bas rgyu tshogs tshang dgos
NK046(mi)002:1812: la / de yang mgon po klu sgrub kyis tshogs rdzogs pa dang /
NK046(mi)002:1813: thogs med kyis sems dwangs ba zhig gi rgyud la byang chub kyi sems skye bar gsungs shing /
NK046(mi)002:1814: tshogs bsags pa thams cad kyi mchog mchod pa yin
NK046(mi)002:1815: zhing mchod ba rnam dag zhig bshams pas sems dwangs
NK046(mi)002:1817: de'i phyir sngon mnyam med jo bo rjer bod kyis sems bskyed zhus pa na mchod pa bshoms gsungs /
NK046(mi)002:1818: bshams pa na 'di 'dras mi 'ong gsungs nas ma gnang /
NK046(mi)002:1819: yang bsham pa la'ang de ltar gsungs /
NK046(mi)002:1820: yang de bas cher bshams pa na 'ong tsam gsungs nas gzod gnang bas na mchod pa gal che'o //
NK046(mi)002:1821: des na rang la gang yod kyi longs spyod cha
NK046(mi)002:1822: gsum du byas pa'i cha gcig rang gi 'tsho ba'i
NK046(mi)002:1823: cha rkyen du bzhag nas cha gnyis dkon mchog gi
NK046(mi)002:1824: mchod par sbyor dgos bar gsungs /
NK046(mi)002:1825: mchod pa de yang dag pa rnam pa gsum gyi sgo nas mchod dgos te /
NK046(mi)002:1827: rin chen byang chub kyi semsa de rang rgyud la
NK046(mi)002:1828: bzung ba'am bskyed par bya ba'i phyir ram ched du
NK046(mi)002:1830: chos nyid de bzhina nyid dang rjes su mthun par gshegsa pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang /
NK046(mi)002:1831: gang zhig gang gis chags bral ba //
NK046(mi)002:1832: bden gnyis mtshan nyid can de chos //
NK046(mi)002:1833: chags bral nyid ni 'gog pa dang //
NK046(mi)002:1834: lam gyi bden pa dag gis bsdus //
NK046(mi)002:1836: gang gis chags pa dang bral bar byed pa lam gyi bden pa dang /
NK046(mi)002:1837: gang chags pa dang bral ba 'gog pa'i bden pa
NK046(mi)002:1838: ste dam pa'i chos dkona mchoga dri ma med pa
NK046(mi)002:1839: dang / sangsa rgyas kyi sras byang chub sems dpa'
NK046(mi)002:1840: rnams sa dang po thob tshe yon tan brgya phrag
NK046(mi)002:1841: dang / bcu gnyis / gnyis par stong phrag bcu
NK046(mi)002:1842: gnyis la sogs pa'i yona tan rgya mtsho lta bu'i
NK046(mi)002:1845: legsa para te rgyu bzang ba sbus gtsang ba bkod legs pa ste /
NK046(mi)002:1846: de yang rgyu bzang ba log 'tsho dang sdig pas ma sgrubs /
NK046(mi)002:1847: nga rgyal dang ngom chos su ma song /
NK046(mi)002:1848: ser sna dang 'jur 'gegs kyis ma bcings ba dang /
NK046(mi)002:1849: gtsang sgra dang bcas pas spus gtsang ba rang la
NK046(mi)002:1850: yod tshod kyi dngos po gang legs gang gces gang
NK046(mi)002:1851: dkon pa des mchod na ser sna'i gnyen por yang
NK046(mi)002:1852: 'gro / gzhan du thud kyi sngo sa dang lo
NK046(mi)002:1853: ma'i ser sa sogs kyis mchod na bsod nams 'dzad
NK046(mi)002:1854: pa'i rgyur 'gro bas mi rung ngo //
NK046(mi)002:1855: bkod legs pa ste mtho dman med par khod snyoms pa /
NK046(mi)002:1857: bdun tshar sogs byi dor byas pa legs par bkang ba zhig dgos kyi /
NK046(mi)002:1858: chu sogs kyis ma khengs na longs spyod dbul ba'i nyes pa dang /
NK046(mi)002:1859: phyir bo na tshul khrims 'chal ba'i nyes pa 'byung zhing /
NK046(mi)002:1860: yon chab tu mchod nas 'thor bas skran nad 'byung
NK046(mi)002:1861: ba sogs skyon dang bral bar bshams te mchoda dgos
NK046(mi)002:1863: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams su mkho dgu'i dpal
NK046(mi)002:1864: 'byor rang gis mthong thos gang yod 'bul ba ste
NK046(mi)002:1865: / 'di dag gi rnam pa yid la dran pa'am
NK046(mi)002:1866: ming tsam mam de dang de lta bu yod pas
NK046(mi)002:1867: 'bul ba yin no snyam pas chog la /
NK046(mi)002:1868: de yang dngos po gang dang gang 'bul na dag
NK046(mi)002:1869: pa'i zhing dang lha klu mi sogs mtha' yas pa'i
NK046(mi)002:1870: zhing rnams su pad ma dkar po dang man+dara dang
NK046(mi)002:1871: ut+pala la sogs pa chu dang thang las skyes pa'i
NK046(mi)002:1872: me tog ji snyed yod pa dang bilba dang a
NK046(mi)002:1873: smra dang nas 'bras gro la sogs pa 'bras bu
NK046(mi)002:1875: sman gyi rgyal po gi wam dang bzang drug sogs
NK046(mi)002:1876: la sman rtsi sman rdo sman ldum sman gyi rnam
NK046(mi)002:1877: pa'am rigs su gtogs pa gang dag yod pa dang
NK046(mi)002:1878: / 'jiga rten gyi khams na dgos 'dod kun 'byung
NK046(mi)002:1879: gi yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che dang
NK046(mi)002:1881: in+d+ra n+ai la la sogs pa'i rin chen gang ji snyed yod pa dang /
NK046(mi)002:1883: bsil dang zhim dang yang dang 'jam //
NK046(mi)002:1884: dwangs pa'i chu ni dri ma med //
NK046(mi)002:1885: 'thung na lto la mi gnod cing //
NK046(mi)002:1886: mgrin pa la ni mi gnod pa //
NK046(mi)002:1887: zhes yan lag brgyad ldan gyi chu mtsho ma dros pa dang de'i phyogs bzhi nas shar gang+ga /
NK046(mi)002:1890: byang sita ste kha 'bab kyi chu bo chen po
NK046(mi)002:1891: bzhi dang rol pa'i mtsho bdun la sogs pa chu
NK046(mi)002:1892: gtsang ma yid du 'ong ba ci yoda dang /
NK046(mi)002:1893: mnyams med jo bos kyang bod 'dir chu legs pas
NK046(mi)002:1894: 'di nyid gcig pu'i tshogs bsags kyang chog ces gsungs
NK046(mi)002:1895: / rina chen sna bzhi las grub pa'i ri'i rgyal
NK046(mi)002:1896: bo ri rab dang gser gyi ri bdun la sogs
NK046(mi)002:1897: pa'i ri bo dang ni de bzhina du nagsa tshal
NK046(mi)002:1898: gyi mthongs zhes mtha' tsan dan sogs kyis bskor ba'i
NK046(mi)002:1899: dben gnas nyams dga' ba dang /
NK046(mi)002:1900: sa phyogsa g.yu'i man+dala phyis pa lta bu la me
NK046(mi)002:1901: tog sna tshogs bkra bas mdzes pa nyin mo mi'i
NK046(mi)002:1902: rgyu 'grul dang mtshan mo sgra'i ca co med pas
NK046(mi)002:1903: dben zhing nyams dag'a ba rnams dang /
NK046(mi)002:1904: ljon pa'i shing me tog kha dog sna tshogs pa'i
NK046(mi)002:1905: rgyan gyis spras shing spud pa ste phra tshom bkod
NK046(mi)002:1907: shing gang zhig rgun 'brum la sogs pa kha dogs
NK046(mi)002:1908: dang dri ro phun sum tshogs pa'i 'bras bu bzang
NK046(mi)002:1909: la mang ba'i ljid kyis yal ga rnams duda pa
NK046(mi)002:1911: lha dang klu la sogs pa'i 'jiga rten gyi khams
NK046(mi)002:1912: na yanga tsan dan sa mchog la sogs pa'i dri
NK046(mi)002:1914: a ga ru la sogs pa'i lhan skyes dang /
NK046(mi)002:1916: yongs 'dus sa brtol gyi ljon pa sogs blos ji
NK046(mi)002:1917: ltar dpag cing bsam pa thams cad 'byung bas dpag
NK046(mi)002:1919: bde ba can gyi zhing la sogs par gser la
NK046(mi)002:1920: sogs pa'i rin po che sna bdun las grub pa
NK046(mi)002:1921: la sogs pa'i rin chen sna tshogs kyi shing dang
NK046(mi)002:1922: / gshol gyis ma rmos shing sa bon ma btabs
NK046(mi)002:1923: par rang 'khrungsa pa'i 'bras s+aa lu la sogs pa'i
NK046(mi)002:1924: me tog gi rnam pa mang po dang /
NK046(mi)002:1925: de dag las gzhan yanga re re nas brjod kyis
NK046(mi)002:1926: mi lang ba'i mchoda par 'osa pa'i rgyan gyi rnam
NK046(mi)002:1927: grangs ji snyed yod pa rnams dang ni /
NK046(mi)002:1928: grags pa'i mtsho chen bzhi dang /
NK046(mi)002:1929: dri med mdangs ldan g.yu yi mtsho la sogs pa'i
NK046(mi)002:1930: mtsho chen po kha dog sna lnga pad+mas brgyan pa
NK046(mi)002:1931: dang rdzing bu chung ngu mang po pad+mas brgyan pa
NK046(mi)002:1932: dang de dag la ngang pa dang bzhad la sogs
NK046(mi)002:1933: pa'i bya rigs sna tshogs dung gi mdog ltar dkar
NK046(mi)002:1934: ba / gser gyi mdog ltar ser ba /
NK046(mi)002:1935: byu ru'i mdog ltar dmar ba /
NK046(mi)002:1936: g.yu yi mdog ltar ljang ba la sogs pas mdzes
NK046(mi)002:1937: pa'i spu sdug ngoms shing shin tu snyan pa'i skad
NK046(mi)002:1938: snyan sgrogs pa yida du 'onga ba dang ldan pa
NK046(mi)002:1939: dang / shar nyi zla gnyis kyi sgron me 'od lam me /
NK046(mi)002:1940: lho tsan dan nags kyi bdug spos dri zhim thul le /
NK046(mi)002:1941: nub gangs dkar mar gyi lha bshos dkar zengs se /
NK046(mi)002:1942: byang rdza chab sngon mo'i mchod yon dwangs seng nge
NK046(mi)002:1943: ba la sogs pa gang ji snyed yod pa rnams
NK046(mi)002:1944: las / me tog la sogs pa de dag re
NK046(mi)002:1945: re yang grangs kyi khyad par nama mkha'a rab 'byamsa
NK046(mi)002:1946: khamas kyi mathasa gtugsa pa ste tshad med pa'i nam
NK046(mi)002:1947: mkha'i gar khyab tu khyab cing yod pa thams cad
NK046(mi)002:1948: las / dang / kha na ma tho ba med
NK046(mi)002:1949: pa'i khyad par bdag po'i yongsa su bzung ba med
NK046(mi)002:1950: pa sgra mi snyan pa'i longs spyod lta bu de
NK046(mi)002:1951: las / dang / dag kun / sbyor ba'i khyad
NK046(mi)002:1952: par blo yisa blangsa nas zhes sems thog tu bzung
NK046(mi)002:1953: ste rang gi yin pa lta bu'i 'du shes bskyed
NK046(mi)002:1955: zhing gi khyad par sku gsung thugs kyi mdzad spyod
NK046(mi)002:1956: bsrung ba med par thub pas thub pa 'gro drug
NK046(mi)002:1957: las snying stobs che ba'i skyes bu rkang gnyis mi
NK046(mi)002:1958: rnams kyi mchoga sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sras byang
NK046(mi)002:1959: chub sems dpa'i tshogs dang bcas pa rnams la legsa
NK046(mi)002:1960: par ste rin chen byang chub kyi sems rang rgyud
NK046(mi)002:1961: la skye ba'i don du 'bul na /
NK046(mi)002:1962: yon yongs su sbyong ba chen po ste yon chung
NK046(mi)002:1963: ngu tsam phul na 'bras bu chen po sbyin par
NK046(mi)002:1964: mdzad pa dper na sangs rgyas la sran rdog bdun
NK046(mi)002:1965: phul bas mi dbang nga las nu dang bye ma
NK046(mi)002:1966: spar gang gtor bas chos rgyal mya ngan med du
NK046(mi)002:1967: gyur pa lta bu'i yon gnas kyi dam pa sems
NK046(mi)002:1968: can rnams la g.yo dang sgyu med par phan par
NK046(mi)002:1969: bzhed pa'i thugsa snying rje che ba rnams kyis badga
NK046(mi)002:1970: cag la brtser dgongs zhes thugs brtse ba chen pos
NK046(mi)002:1971: nye bar dgongs te bdag gi mchod pa 'di dag
NK046(mi)002:1972: bzhes par mdzad du gsol zhes so //
NK046(mi)002:1973: de dag 'bul dgos pa'i rgyu mtshan badga ni sngon
NK046(mi)002:1974: gyi sbyin pa la sogs pa'i bsoda namsa dang mi
NK046(mi)002:1975: ldan pas tshe 'dir longs spyod 'bul bas bkren chen
NK046(mi)002:1976: te sprang po'i nang nas dbyug bzung lta bu 'gyur
NK046(mi)002:1977: pas na mchoda par 'os ba'i nor sngar bstan pa
NK046(mi)002:1978: de dag las gzhan dngos su badga la cang ma
NK046(mi)002:1979: mchisa te med pa des na dang po thugs bskyed
NK046(mi)002:1980: pa nas bzung ste rang 'dod med par sems can
NK046(mi)002:1981: thams cad kyi tshogs rdzogs shing sgrib pa dag na
NK046(mi)002:1982: ci ma rung snyam pas gazhana don 'ba' zhig dgongsa
NK046(mi)002:1983: pa'i mgona po rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa kun
NK046(mi)002:1984: gyis bdag pos yongs su ma bzung ba'i mchod pa
NK046(mi)002:1985: 'di rnams dngos 'dzin thams cad dang bral bas khyed
NK046(mi)002:1986: la phongs pa mi mnga' yang bdag cag gi tshogs
NK046(mi)002:1987: gnyis rdzogs shing sgrib gnyis dag pa'i don gyi slad
NK046(mi)002:1988: du nyid rnams kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus zhing khams
NK046(mi)002:1989: so so nas legs par bzhesa shig ces te de
NK046(mi)002:1990: ltar rang la 'bul ba'i nus pa yod na rgyal
NK046(mi)002:1991: ba sras bcas la mkhyen pa dang brtse ba'i thabs
NK046(mi)002:1992: mkhas dang rdzu 'phrul bsam gyis mi khyab pa mnga'
NK046(mi)002:1993: ba lags pas bzhes par mdzad nas bdag cag gi
NK046(mi)002:1994: tshogs rdzogs shing sgrib pa dag par yang mdzad par
NK046(mi)002:1996: bdud bzhi'i g.yul las rgyal bas na rgyal ba sangs
NK046(mi)002:1997: rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang de yi sras byang chub
NK046(mi)002:1998: sems dpa'i tshogs dang bcas pa rnams la bdag gisa
NK046(mi)002:1999: ni da nas bzung ste tshe rabs rnams su bdag
NK046(mi)002:2000: rang gi lus gces shing phangs pa dgos shing mkho
NK046(mi)002:2001: ba 'di kun dus gtan du rgyun mi 'chad par
NK046(mi)002:2003: semsa dpa' mchoga rgyal sras rigs gsum mgon po sogs
NK046(mi)002:2004: khyed rnams kyis badga ni yongs su bzhes shig ste
NK046(mi)002:2005: bzhes nas bdag gir mdzod cig dang /
NK046(mi)002:2006: sgo gsum gus pasa khyed rnams kyi 'bangs su mchi
NK046(mi)002:2007: ba ste 'ong nas bka' bzhin du bsgrubs par bagyi'o
NK046(mi)002:2008: // badga ni khyed rnams kyis yongsa su bzhes te bran gyi tshul du rjes su bzung basa zhes /
NK046(mi)002:2009: bdag gir mdzad na khyed rnams thugs mnyes par bgyi
NK046(mi)002:2010: ba'i slad du srid pa 'khor bar gnas na yang
NK046(mi)002:2011: gzhan don du 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal las mi 'jigas
NK046(mi)002:2012: par semsa can thams cad la phana bde'i don bsgrub
NK046(mi)002:2013: par bgyi zhing / de lta na bdag nyid mi
NK046(mi)002:2014: dge ba spyod pa'i sdig pa dang ldan na khyed
NK046(mi)002:2015: rnams kyi mtshan snyan grags dbu 'phang la gnod cing
NK046(mi)002:2016: gzhan don lta ci rang don yang mi nus pas
NK046(mi)002:2017: sngona gyi sdig pa rnams lasa yanga dag par 'ad'a
NK046(mi)002:2018: ste bshags pa bgyid cinga sdig pa gazhana gang yang
NK046(mi)002:2019: slan chad mi bgyid do zhes sdom sems kyis dam
NK046(mi)002:2020: par bgyi zhing / bca' 'o // de ltar lus
NK046(mi)002:2021: 'bul ba ni bsrung ba rnams kyi mchog yin par
NK046(mi)002:2022: par bgyi zhing / bca' 'o // yang gsungs / gnyis pa yid kyi sprul ba'i mchod pa la /
NK046(mi)002:2023: khrus dang sku phyi sogs 'bul ba dang /
NK046(mi)002:2024: nyer spyod kyi mchod pa gnyis las /
NK046(mi)002:2026: zas kyi snga phyir khrus dang rkang pa bkru ba
NK046(mi)002:2027: dris byug pa me tog gi phreng bas mgo la
NK046(mi)002:2028: brgyan pa la sogs pa'i 'jig rten pa'i nyer spyod
NK046(mi)002:2029: dang mthun par mdzad pa ste /
NK046(mi)002:2030: de yang rgyal ba sras bcas la nyes pa'i dri
NK046(mi)002:2031: ma med kyang bdag sogs 'gro ba'i sgo gsum gyi
NK046(mi)002:2032: dri ma khrus kyis sbyang phyir lha la khrus gsol
NK046(mi)002:2033: ba ste / mdun gyi nam mkhar khrus kyi khang
NK046(mi)002:2034: pa gcig gam mang po tsan dan dang ga bur
NK046(mi)002:2035: la sogs pas bsgos pas shina tu dri zhim pa
NK046(mi)002:2036: ba ste / / shel sna lnga'i rang bzhin gyi
NK046(mi)002:2037: sa gzhi bkod pa phra chen ltar mdzes pa dri
NK046(mi)002:2038: ma med pas gsal zhing 'od 'phro bas 'tshera ba
NK046(mi)002:2039: khod snyoms pas bstar ba'i bug pa la them bus
NK046(mi)002:2040: ba ste / / bcad pa / rina chen sna
NK046(mi)002:2041: bdun nam shel sogs 'od zer sna tshogs 'abra ba'i
NK046(mi)002:2042: ka ba phyogs kyi mdog can yida du 'onga ba
NK046(mi)002:2044: de'i rtsa bar 'bo ra zhes chu brten pa'i ra ba mi lang ba'i sked par sleb pa dang /
NK046(mi)002:2045: sked par 'phred du ka sgrog bzhi dang steng skor
NK046(mi)002:2046: kheb byas pa la nang ngos sogs kyi steng du
NK046(mi)002:2047: mu tig sna lnga la sogs pa'i rin po che
NK046(mi)002:2048: 'od 'bar zhing chagas pa'i bla re dang 'phan gdugs
NK046(mi)002:2049: rgyal mtshan ba dan dra ba dang dra phyed la
NK046(mi)002:2050: sogs pas rab tu mdzes par bres shing brgyan te
NK046(mi)002:2051: de'i dbus rgya mthongs kyi steng ka thung gis btegs
NK046(mi)002:2052: pa'i rgya phib la yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin
NK046(mi)002:2053: po che'i tog gis brgyan pa'i nang du rin po
NK046(mi)002:2054: che'i khri sna tshogs pa dang bcas par bsgom pa
NK046(mi)002:2055: der / chos nyid de bzhin nyid dang rjes su
NK046(mi)002:2056: mthun par gshegs pas de bzhina gshegsa pa rnams thugs
NK046(mi)002:2057: chos sku'i dgongs pa las ma g.yos bzhin du gzugs
NK046(mi)002:2058: sku ye shes sgyu ma'i rnam rol gang 'dul gyi
NK046(mi)002:2059: der / rnam pa dang / de yi sras byang
NK046(mi)002:2060: chub sems dpa'i 'khor tshogs rgya mtsho dang bcas par
NK046(mi)002:2061: byon pa rnams kyi na bza' ka sgrog gi steng
NK046(mi)002:2062: der / rnam pa dang / du bkal te /
NK046(mi)002:2063: rang ngam sprul pa'i mchod lha rnams kyis khrus ras
NK046(mi)002:2064: dkar po sku sha mi sgrib pa phul te mnab
NK046(mi)002:2065: pa la beed+aur+ya la sogs pa'i rin chen bum pa
NK046(mi)002:2066: che zhing mdzes pa mang po dag byed kyi rdzas
NK046(mi)002:2067: dang dri bzang sna tshogs pa'i spos kyi chu yid
NK046(mi)002:2068: du 'ong bas sum gnyis legs par bakanga ba yo
NK046(mi)002:2069: ba'i tshul gyis dbang khrus byas pa dang chab gcig
NK046(mi)002:2070: khrus khang gi phyi rol 'od kyi 'dod snam gyi
NK046(mi)002:2071: steng du mchod pa'i lha mo mdzes shing blta na
NK046(mi)002:2072: sdug pa rnams kyis la las /
NK046(mi)002:2073: gang tshe rkang gnyis gtso bo sogs yid 'phrog pa'i
NK046(mi)002:2074: bstod pa'i glu dbyangs snyan pa dang ni la las
NK046(mi)002:2075: rnga zlum gling bu la sogs pa'i rol mora bacasa
NK046(mi)002:2076: pa du mas sku khrus gsola bar bagyi'o //
NK046(mi)002:2077: de nas khrus khang gi them bu blangs ba na
NK046(mi)002:2078: khrus chu nam mkha' nas bab pas 'og tu 'khod
NK046(mi)002:2079: pa'i rang gzhan sems can thams cad kyi sdig sgrib
NK046(mi)002:2080: ma lus pa dag pa dang /
NK046(mi)002:2081: khyad par yul lha gzhi bdag 'dre srin nad bdag
NK046(mi)002:2082: sogs kyi gnod 'tshe'i bsam sbyor gdug rtsub ma lus
NK046(mi)002:2083: pa zhi zhing mi nad dang phyugs nad rgyun chad
NK046(mi)002:2084: / rin chen byang chub kyi sems rgyud la skyes par bsam /
NK046(mi)002:2085: khrus gsol ba'i rgyal ba sras bcas de dag gi
NK046(mi)002:2086: sku la lha'i gos dang ka shi ka la sogs
NK046(mi)002:2087: pa mtshungsa pa med pa'i gos dri ma med pas
NK046(mi)002:2088: gtsang la dri shin tu zhim po'i sman phye skam
NK046(mi)002:2089: pos raba tu bsgosa pas sku phyi zhing byi dor
NK046(mi)002:2090: legs par bagyi'o // na bza' khrus ras sku phyi
NK046(mi)002:2091: kun 'od dmar po'i rnam par byin rlabs dang dngos
NK046(mi)002:2092: grub kyi tshul du rang gzhan sems can thams cad
NK046(mi)002:2093: kyi smin mtshams su thim pas de dag gi ye
NK046(mi)002:2094: shes yon tan thams cad thob par bsam mo //
NK046(mi)002:2095: sku phyis pa'i rjes de nas yul dam pa de
NK046(mi)002:2096: rnams las sprul sku chags bral gyi rnam pa rab
NK046(mi)002:2097: byung gi cha byad can rnams la /
NK046(mi)002:2098: sngon po btsag dang ngur smrig rtsi //
NK046(mi)002:2100: rung ba'i tshon gsum gyis kha dog legas par bsgyur
NK046(mi)002:2101: ba'i na bza' chos gos gsum la sogs pa'i 'tsho
NK046(mi)002:2102: ba'i yo byad bcu gsum po shin tu dri zhim
NK046(mi)002:2103: gyis bsgos pa'i gos 'bum phrag ri ba'i dam pa
NK046(mi)002:2105: longs sku sogs chags can 'khor los bsgyur ba'i cha
NK046(mi)002:2106: byad can rnams la lha rdzas las grub pa'i gosa
NK046(mi)002:2107: bzang po rin thang dang bral bar shin tu srab
NK046(mi)002:2108: cing yang la reg bya 'ajama pa kha dog dang
NK046(mi)002:2109: dbyibs sna tshogas pa'i gos lus la bsam gtan gyi
NK046(mi)002:2110: bde ba bskyed nus pa'i gar gyi phu dung /
NK046(mi)002:2111: dar dkar po gser gyi ngang ris can gyi stod g.yogs /
NK046(mi)002:2113: dar sna tshogs kyi cod pan /
NK046(mi)002:2114: zi ldir ste dar gyi chas gos lnga dang /
NK046(mi)002:2115: gar gyi phu dung gi tshab tu dar dpyang bgrang ba'ang yod /
NK046(mi)002:2116: de ltar phul ba des rang gzhan sems can thams
NK046(mi)002:2117: cad kyi ngo tsha dang khrel yod kyi gos thob
NK046(mi)002:2118: par shog cig ces bsam par bya'o //
NK046(mi)002:2119: rgyan gyi rnam pa gser la sogs pa la beed+au
NK046(mi)002:2120: r+ya sogs kyi phra tshom gyis spras pa'i dbu rgyan
NK046(mi)002:2127: sku rag ste rin po che'i rgyan brgyad po ches
NK046(mi)002:2128: mchoga tu gyur pa brgya phrag mang po de dang
NK046(mi)002:2129: de dag gisa 'aphagas mchog dam pa kun tu bzang
NK046(mi)002:2130: po dang 'ajama pa'i dbyangs dang 'jiga rten dabnga phyug
NK046(mi)002:2131: spyan ras gzigs dang sogas sgras phyag na rdo rje
NK046(mi)002:2132: dang sa yi snying po byams pa nam snying sgrib
NK046(mi)002:2133: sel sogs la'ang brgyan par bgyi zhing 'bul bar bya'o
NK046(mi)002:2134: // des rang gzhan sems can thams cad kyi mtshan
NK046(mi)002:2135: dpe'i rgyan bzang thob par shog cig ces bsam par
NK046(mi)002:2138: gling bzhi dang ni nyi zla dang //
NK046(mi)002:2139: ri rab dang ni 'dod lha dang //
NK046(mi)002:2140: tshangs pa'i 'jig rten stong la ni //
NK046(mi)002:2141: stong ni spyi phud yin par 'dod //
NK046(mi)002:2142: de stong la ni stong gnyis pa //
NK046(mi)002:2143: bar ma'i 'jig rten khams zhes bya //
NK046(mi)002:2144: de stong la ni stong gsum mo //
NK046(mi)002:2145: zhes pas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten
NK046(mi)002:2146: gyi khams mtha' yas pa kun tu dri zhim po'i
NK046(mi)002:2147: ngad rab tu ldang ba'am 'phro ba yi tsan dan
NK046(mi)002:2148: dkar po la sogs pa bsal zhing dri mchoga bzang
NK046(mi)002:2149: po rnams kyi chus rin po che'i snod dung phor
NK046(mi)002:2150: dang nya phyi'i la sogs bkang ba de mchod lha
NK046(mi)002:2151: rnams kyis thub pa'i dbang po sangs rgyas byang chub
NK046(mi)002:2152: sems dpa' kun gyi sku gsera bzang po lan grangs
NK046(mi)002:2153: bcu drug gi bar tu legs par bzhu btul gyis
NK046(mi)002:2154: sbyangsa te btso ma ste shin tu dag pa sman
NK046(mi)002:2155: sna tshogs kyis mdangs bton cing dar gos kyis byi
NK046(mi)002:2156: dora byas pa ltar 'oda rang ngor chagas shing gzhan
NK046(mi)002:2157: ngor 'phro bas 'bar ba de daga la rdul mi
NK046(mi)002:2158: 'byung ba'i ched du byugsa par bagyi'o //
NK046(mi)002:2159: des rang gzhan sems can thams cad kyi pags pa
NK046(mi)002:2160: gser mdog lta bu'i mtshan bzang thob par shog cig
NK046(mi)002:2161: ces bsam mo // thub pa'i dabnga po mchoda par
NK046(mi)002:2162: bya ba'i gansa mchoga tu gyur pa rnams la kha
NK046(mi)002:2163: dog dbyibs legs yid du 'ong ba'i lha'i me tog
NK046(mi)002:2165: lha dang mi'i yul gyi me tog pad+ma dang ut+pal
NK046(mi)002:2166: la sogs pa lha klu mi dang dag pa'i zhing
NK046(mi)002:2167: gi dri zhim zhing 'od zer 'phro ba'i me tog
NK046(mi)002:2168: thamsa cad sil ma nam mkhar gtor bas sprul sku
NK046(mi)002:2169: chags bral gyi rnam pa can rnams la khang bzang
NK046(mi)002:2170: dang bla re 'phan gdug rgyal mtshan man+dala la sogs
NK046(mi)002:2171: pa'i rnam pa dang de las kyang me tog gi
NK046(mi)002:2172: char dbab pa rlung gis bskyod pas phyogs bcu'i rgyal
NK046(mi)002:2173: ba rnams la'ang mchod par gyur pa dang /
NK046(mi)002:2174: me tog sna lnga'i phreng ba phreng brgyud mkhas pas
NK046(mi)002:2175: byas pa ltar spel legsa par brgyus pas yid du
NK046(mi)002:2176: 'ong ba rnams kyis kyang longs sku chags can gyi
NK046(mi)002:2177: rnam pa can rnams la phreng ba la sogs pa
NK046(mi)002:2178: rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs pas mchoda par bya'o //
NK046(mi)002:2179: des na rang gzhan sems can thams cad kyi rgyud
NK046(mi)002:2180: la byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi me tog
NK046(mi)002:2181: gi tshom bu bkra bar shog cig ces bsam mo
NK046(mi)002:2182: // tsan dan sbrul snying dang a ka ru nag
NK046(mi)002:2183: po la sogs pa'i lhan skyes dang sbyar byung gi
NK046(mi)002:2184: spos mchoga tu gyur pa tshor ma thag tu yid
NK046(mi)002:2185: 'phrog par byed pa'i dri zhim po'i ngad phyogs thams
NK046(mi)002:2186: cad du khyab cing ldangs pa yi bduga pa rengs
NK046(mi)002:2187: bu dang spos phor sogs su bsreg pa'i du ba
NK046(mi)002:2188: sprina gyi tshogsa ltar 'khrigs pa yig 'bru dang rin
NK046(mi)002:2189: po che sna bdun gyi rnam pa rlung gis phyogs
NK046(mi)002:2190: bcur bskyod pa rnams kyis kyang rgyal ba sras dang
NK046(mi)002:2191: bcas pa de dag la gus pas dbul bar dgyes
NK046(mi)002:2192: // pa bskyed cing / dri des sems can rnams
NK046(mi)002:2193: kyi sdug bsngal bsal nas bde bas tshim par byas
NK046(mi)002:2194: // pa bskyed cing / pa dang / des rang
NK046(mi)002:2195: gzhan sems can thams cad kyi rgyud la dgyes pa'i
NK046(mi)002:2196: tshul khrims kyi dri bsung gis khyab par shog cig
NK046(mi)002:2197: // pa bskyed cing / pa dang / ces bsam
NK046(mi)002:2198: mo // zhal zas ro brgya dang ldan pa'i 'bras
NK046(mi)002:2199: chan la sogs pa'i baza'a ba dang bca' ba /
NK046(mi)002:2200: bdud rtsi'i batung ba dang dkar gsum mngar gsum la
NK046(mi)002:2201: sogs pa kha dog dang dri ro phun sum tshogs
NK046(mi)002:2202: pa sna tshogas pa dang bacasa pa yi lha rdzas
NK046(mi)002:2205: de'i zhal du bza' bar 'os pa'i lha bshosa /
NK046(mi)002:2206: chu ma rag pa'i zhal zas la sogs pa mang
NK046(mi)002:2207: po mdor na rin po che'i lhung bzed dang ka
NK046(mi)002:2208: to ra sogs su yid la gang 'dod kyi bza'
NK046(mi)002:2209: btung sna tshogs pa rnams kyang de dag la dbul
NK046(mi)002:2210: bar bagyi'o // des rang gzhan sems can thams cad
NK046(mi)002:2211: kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi zas mchog thob par shog
NK046(mi)002:2213: 'dzam bu'i chu gsera gyi pad+ma mdzes shing yid du
NK046(mi)002:2214: 'ong pa mang po gral tshar du dangra ba ste
NK046(mi)002:2215: sgrigs legs pa yi pad spungs su /
NK046(mi)002:2216: beed+aur+ya la sogs pa'i rina chen sna tshogs kyi sgron
NK046(mi)002:2217: me 'od kyis 'dzam bu'i gling sogs khyab cing nyin
NK046(mi)002:2218: mtshan rtag tu snang bar byed pa dang /
NK046(mi)002:2219: rang rang gis phul ba la yang kong bu ni stong gsum gyi stong chen po /
NK046(mi)002:2220: sdong bu ni ri'i rgyal po ri rab /
NK046(mi)002:2221: mar khu ni rgya mtsho chen po tsam la 'od
NK046(mi)002:2222: sna lngas nam mkha'i khams thams cad khyab par byed
NK046(mi)002:2223: pa rnams kyang yid kyis sprul te de dag la
NK046(mi)002:2224: 'bul bar bagyi'o // des rang gzhan sems can thams
NK046(mi)002:2225: cad shes bya la rmongs pa'i ma rig pa'i mun
NK046(mi)002:2226: pa thams cad bsal te shes bya thams cad mkhyen
NK046(mi)002:2227: pa'i ye shes kyi snang ba chen po thob par
NK046(mi)002:2229: rin po che sna tshogs kyis sa gzhi mig mang
NK046(mi)002:2230: ris su bkra ba khod snyoms pas bstar ba mnan
NK046(mi)002:2231: na nems pa bteg na 'phar ba la dri zhim
NK046(mi)002:2232: sna tshogs ba'i spos chu ba lang gi ko ba'i
NK046(mi)002:2233: srab mthug tsam gyis byugsa pa der me tog yid
NK046(mi)002:2234: du 'ong ba kha dog sna tshogs pa sil ma
NK046(mi)002:2235: ste yu ba med pa mi 'greng tsam du bcal
NK046(mi)002:2236: du dkram zhing bkod pa yang mchod para bagyi'o //
NK046(mi)002:2237: des rang gzhan gyi sems can thams cad kyi 'dun
NK046(mi)002:2238: pa sa lta bu'i sems bskyed thob par shog cig
NK046(mi)002:2239: ces bsam mo // rgya khyon dang bkod pa'i tshad
NK046(mi)002:2240: blos gzhal du med pa'i pho brang rin po che
NK046(mi)002:2241: sna tshogs las grub pa brtsegs lnga brgya pa la
NK046(mi)002:2242: sogs pa'i nang dang 'dod snam thams cad na mchod
NK046(mi)002:2243: pa'i lha mo rnams kyis pi wam la sogs pa'i
NK046(mi)002:2244: rol mo dang bcas pas bstod pa'i dbyangs yid du
NK046(mi)002:2245: 'ong ba'i snyan pa sgrogs pa dang ldan pa'i phyi'i
NK046(mi)002:2246: gsham sne dang nang gi ka ba sogs la seng
NK046(mi)002:2247: ge dang chu srin sogs kyi kha nas dpyang ba'i
NK046(mi)002:2248: mu tig dmar po dang rina chen sna tshogs pa'i
NK046(mi)002:2249: d+r+wa ba dang d+r+wa phyed la sogs pa'i rgyan gyi
NK046(mi)002:2250: chun po 'phyang bas mdzesa shing yid du 'ong ba
NK046(mi)002:2251: 'od dang 'od zer 'abra ba d+r+wa ba'i khug mgo
NK046(mi)002:2252: dang d+r+wa phyed kyi sne la rnga yab dang dril
NK046(mi)002:2253: bu dang me long gis brgyan pa /
NK046(mi)002:2254: me long gi ngos dang dri bu'i sgras byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa ston pa /
NK046(mi)002:2255: tsan dan gyi wa kha nas dri bzang gi chu
NK046(mi)002:2256: rgyun bab pas khrus kyi rdzing bu 'khyil ba la
NK046(mi)002:2257: chu bya sna tshogs skad snyan sgrogs shing rtse ba
NK046(mi)002:2258: / nang gi khang mig la lar na bza' sna tshogs dang /
NK046(mi)002:2259: la lar bza' btung sna tshogs /
NK046(mi)002:2260: nyin mor bzhugs khri dang mtshan gyi gzim cha lha'i
NK046(mi)002:2261: ras bcos bu sna tshogs kyi stan dang sngas khra
NK046(mi)002:2262: bo sogs nye ba'i rin po che sna bdun dang
NK046(mi)002:2263: / rin po che sna tshogs pa'i sgron me'i 'od
NK046(mi)002:2264: kyis phyogs thams cad nyin mtshan kun tu gsal zhing
NK046(mi)002:2265: tshad blos dpag tu med cing mtha' yas pa nam
NK046(mi)002:2266: mkha'i khams thams cad khyab pas nam mkha'i rgyan lta
NK046(mi)002:2267: bur gyur ba de dag kyang /
NK046(mi)002:2268: thugs snying rje'i rang bzhina can sangs rgyas bcom ldan
NK046(mi)002:2269: 'das sras byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dang bcas pa
NK046(mi)002:2271: des rang gzhan sems can thams cad kyi thar pa
NK046(mi)002:2272: chen po'i grong khyer thob par shog cig ces bsam
NK046(mi)002:2273: mo // lha rdzas kyi dar dang rin chen sna
NK046(mi)002:2274: tshogs pa'i gdugsa rab tu mdzesa pa gser gyi yu
NK046(mi)002:2275: ba can khor yug ste sham bu la mu tig
NK046(mi)002:2276: la sogs pa'i rgyan gyi rnam pa dpal be'u dang
NK046(mi)002:2277: dra ba dang d+r+wa phyed la sogs pa yid du
NK046(mi)002:2278: 'ong bas brgyan pa dbyibsa shin tu legsa shing blta
NK046(mi)002:2279: na sdug pa bsgreng ba ste gyen du bslang ba
NK046(mi)002:2280: yang mchod pa'i lha mo dang rta cang shes dang
NK046(mi)002:2281: glang po che sogs kyis bzung ba sngon ston pa
NK046(mi)002:2282: thugs rje can la g.yas phyogs nas tshangs pas beed+aur+ya'i
NK046(mi)002:2283: gdugs lnga brgya dang g.yon phyogs nas brgya byin gyis
NK046(mi)002:2284: 'dzam bu'i chu gser gyi gdugs lnga brgya phul ba
NK046(mi)002:2285: ltar dus rtag tu thub pa'i dabnga po sras dang
NK046(mi)002:2286: bcas pa rnams la dbul bar bagyi'o //
NK046(mi)002:2287: de ltar phul bas rang gzhan sems can thams cad
NK046(mi)002:2288: 'khor ba dang ngan song gi tsha gdung las skyob
NK046(mi)002:2289: ste / dkon mchog gsum gyi grib ma bsil ba'i
NK046(mi)002:2290: skyabs 'og tu tshud par shog cig ces bsam par
NK046(mi)002:2291: ste / bya'o // de ltar yid sprul gyi mchod pa'i rnam grangs bcu gnyis po 'di rnams la /
NK046(mi)002:2292: rang re'i blos stong gsum sogs khyab par mi nus
NK046(mi)002:2293: pas na de ltar khyab yod par bsam dgos so
NK046(mi)002:2294: // de la zhi ba lha shin tu spros med
NK046(mi)002:2295: kyi rnal 'byor ba yin pas dngos 'byor gyi mchod
NK046(mi)002:2296: pa rgya chen ma gsung bar 'di ltar dka' tshegs
NK046(mi)002:2297: med par bsod nams kyi tshogs rgya chen po yang
NK046(mi)002:2298: dag par rdzogs pa'i thabs mchog tu gyur pas na
NK046(mi)002:2299: byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa'i mchod pa
NK046(mi)002:2300: // yin la / de nas mchod pa'i rnam grangs
NK046(mi)002:2301: 'di rnams rtsis med mi byed par yang dang yang
NK046(mi)002:2302: // yin la / du bsgom dgos / de'ang lha
NK046(mi)002:2303: bsgom pa lta bu rgyun mi 'chad par bsgom mi
NK046(mi)002:2304: dgos par skad cig yud tsam yud tsam blo la
NK046(mi)002:2305: snang tsam snang tsam shar ba tsam gyis dka' tshegs
NK046(mi)002:2306: dang ngal dub ma dgos par bsod nams kyi tshogs
NK046(mi)002:2307: rgya chen po 'dum par 'gyur bas tshogs rdzogs shing
NK046(mi)002:2308: sgrib pa dag nas byang chub kyi sems rgyud la
NK046(mi)002:2309: // yin la / du bsgom dgos / skye ba
NK046(mi)002:2310: dang / thos pa shes shing mi brjed par 'gyur
NK046(mi)002:2311: ba la sogs pa'i yon tan thams cad 'byung bas
NK046(mi)002:2312: don chen po tshegs chung ngus 'grub pa'i mchod pa'i
NK046(mi)002:2313: rnam grangs 'di rnams yang yang bsam zhing mchod na
NK046(mi)002:2314: log 'tsho dang sdig pas bsgrub pa'i mchod pa nga
NK046(mi)002:2315: rgyal dang ngom chos su 'gro ba ci tsam phul
NK046(mi)002:2316: ba las kyang mchod pa rgya che zhing rnam par
NK046(mi)002:2318: gsum pa smon lam stobs kyi mchod pa ni /
NK046(mi)002:2319: gong du bshad pa de dag lasa gazhana yang khyad
NK046(mi)002:2320: par du 'phags pa'i mchod pa'i tshogas sil snyan yan
NK046(mi)002:2321: lag brgyad ldan la sogs pa'i 'bud rdung dkrol gsum
NK046(mi)002:2323: mi'am ci'i sdong po'i sgra snyan gyi skad 'od srung
NK046(mi)002:2324: chen pos ma bzod par gar 'chams pa lta bu
NK046(mi)002:2325: dang / dri za'i rgyal po rab dag'i tam bu
NK046(mi)002:2326: ra'i rgyud bsgreng ba lta bu gar dang bcas pa'i
NK046(mi)002:2327: bstod pa'i glu dbyangs snyan pa yida du 'ong ba
NK046(mi)002:2328: dang ldan pa gang zhig nus pa'i khyad par thos
NK046(mi)002:2329: pa tsam gyis semsa can gyi sdug bsngal sel zhing
NK046(mi)002:2330: sim pa'i dga' bde thob par byed pa'i sprin zhes
NK046(mi)002:2331: pa khyab che ba'i don yin pas phyogs bcu'i zhing
NK046(mi)002:2332: kun khyab par byed pa'i sgra dbyangs dpag tu med
NK046(mi)002:2333: pa rnams rgyal ba sras bcas kyi spyan sngar 'byung
NK046(mi)002:2334: zhing rgyun mi 'chad par rtag tu so sora gansa
NK046(mi)002:2335: pa gyur ciga ces smos pa dang /
NK046(mi)002:2336: lung dang rtogs pa'i dam pa'i chos dkona mchog yi
NK046(mi)002:2337: ge glegs bam gyi rnam pa dang bcas pa thamsa
NK046(mi)002:2338: cad dang / de yang sangs rgyas dang byang chub
NK046(mi)002:2339: sems dpa' rnams kyis chos gsungs pa'i tshe chos snang
NK046(mi)002:2340: ba'i cho 'phrul zhes me tog gi char dbab par
NK046(mi)002:2341: gsungs pa bzhin du lung gi chos 'chad nyan byed
NK046(mi)002:2342: pa'i dus thams cad la dang /
NK046(mi)002:2343: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mngon par rdzogs par byang
NK046(mi)002:2344: chub pa'i dus su gnas gtsang ma'i lha dag gis
NK046(mi)002:2345: me tog gi char dbab par gsungs pa ltar rtogs
NK046(mi)002:2346: pa'i chos rgyud la skyes pa'i dus thams cad la
NK046(mi)002:2347: dang / chos sku'i rten de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad
NK046(mi)002:2348: pa brgyad dang sgo bstun pa'i mchod rten cha brgyad
NK046(mi)002:2349: la sogs pa ste de yang bdag cag gi ston
NK046(mi)002:2350: pa sku 'khrungs pa'i dus su pad+ma spung pa'i mchod
NK046(mi)002:2351: rten ser skyar zas gtsang gis bzhengs pa /
NK046(mi)002:2352: sangs rgyas pa'i dus su bdud 'dul lam byang chub
NK046(mi)002:2353: mchod rten gzugs can snying po la sogs pas bzhengs
NK046(mi)002:2354: pa / chos 'khor bskor ba'i tshe mchod rten bkra
NK046(mi)002:2355: shis sgo mang w+aa ra na s+air lnga sdes bzhengs
NK046(mi)002:2356: pa / pa / mu stegs ston pa sde drug
NK046(mi)002:2357: brtul ba'i dus su cho 'phrul mchod rten dze ta'i
NK046(mi)002:2358: tshal du li tsa bis bzhengs ba /
NK046(mi)002:2359: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha yul sum cu
NK046(mi)002:2360: rtsa gsum du ma la chos bstan nas slar mi
NK046(mi)002:2361: yul gsal ldan du bab tshe lha bab mchod rten
NK046(mi)002:2362: de dag rnams kyis bzhengs pa /
NK046(mi)002:2363: dge 'dun dbyen bsdum pa'i dus su dbyen 'dum mchod
NK046(mi)002:2364: rten 'od ma'i tshal du ma g+ha d+ha bas bzhengs
NK046(mi)002:2365: pa / sku tshe'i 'du byed byin gyis rlabs tshe
NK046(mi)002:2366: rnam rgyal mchod rten myang 'das mchod rten rtsa can
NK046(mi)002:2367: du gyad kyis bzhengs pa ste brgyad dang /
NK046(mi)002:2369: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung ni rgyas par 'gyur
NK046(mi)002:2370: ro zhes gsungs pa ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshems
NK046(mi)002:2371: mche ba bzhi po las tshangs pa dang /
NK046(mi)002:2372: grong khyer sgra sgrogs kyi 'og gi klu dang /
NK046(mi)002:2373: ka ling ka'i rgyal po dang /
NK046(mi)002:2374: tshig 'dzin yid 'ong gi grong khyer gyi dri za rnams kyis mchod rten re re bzhengs pa dang /
NK046(mi)002:2375: de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring bsrel yul ma g+ha d+ha'i
NK046(mi)002:2376: bre bo che brgyad dang ras tshig pa dang ma
NK046(mi)002:2377: tshig pa rnams kyis mchod rten brgyad la sogs par
NK046(mi)002:2378: bzhengs pa dang / chos rgyal mya ngan med kyis
NK046(mi)002:2379: gnod sbyin khol bo bsgrub nas 'dzam gling gi sa
NK046(mi)002:2380: gnas bye bar de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring bsrel gyi
NK046(mi)002:2381: snying po can gyi mchod rten bye ba bzhengs pa
NK046(mi)002:2382: bzhengs pa dang / dang / rgyal po srong btsan
NK046(mi)002:2383: sgam pos dge slong a kar ma ti shi la
NK046(mi)002:2384: sprul nas rgya gar gyi mchod rten pad+ma spungs pa
NK046(mi)002:2385: nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring bsrel spyan drangs pa
NK046(mi)002:2386: da lta jo bo rang byung lnga ldan gyi smin
NK046(mi)002:2388: mchod rten de las o rgyan sangs rgyas gnyis pas
NK046(mi)002:2389: rdzu 'phrul gyis ring bsel bre gang spyan drangs te
NK046(mi)002:2390: bsam yas mchod rten dkar po na bzhugs pa las
NK046(mi)002:2391: 'phel ba skal ldan gyi gang zag gis da lta'ang
NK046(mi)002:2392: rnyed du yod pa la sogs pa'i mchod rten rnams
NK046(mi)002:2393: dang / ris su bris pa lugs su blugs pa 'bur du dod pa'i sku gzugsa la ste /
NK046(mi)002:2394: seng ga la'i gling gi bu mo mu tig 'khri
NK046(mi)002:2395: shing bden pa la 'god par mdzad pa'i ras bris
NK046(mi)002:2396: kyi thog ma de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' yi gnang
NK046(mi)002:2397: ba'i thang sku 'od zer ma dang /
NK046(mi)002:2398: bzo rgyal karma bi shwas rin po che sna tshogs
NK046(mi)002:2399: las de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgung lo nyer lnga ba'i
NK046(mi)002:2400: tshad dga' ldan lha'i yul na bzhugs pa dang bcu
NK046(mi)002:2401: gnyis ba'i tshad jo bo rin po che sh+aakya mu
NK046(mi)002:2402: ni dang / brgyad pa'i tshad ra mo che mi
NK046(mi)002:2403: bskyed rdo rje gnyis da lta lha sa na bzhugs
NK046(mi)002:2404: ni dang / pa dang / tsan dan las byas
NK046(mi)002:2405: pa'i jo bo rgya nag na bzhugs pa la sogs
NK046(mi)002:2406: ni dang / pa dang / pa dang / gsang sngags rdo rje'i theg pa nas /
NK046(mi)002:2407: bstan pa'i btsas gsum zhes sku rten du rin po
NK046(mi)002:2408: che brgya rtsa gcig las rang byon pa'i sangs rgyas
NK046(mi)002:2410: gsung rten du bstan pa bu gcig gi rgyud dang /
NK046(mi)002:2411: thugs rten du rin po che brgya rtsa gcig gam
NK046(mi)002:2412: gser gyi rdo rje rtse lnga ba khru gang ba
NK046(mi)002:2413: gnas bcu gnyis la sogs pa gang na rdzogs pa
NK046(mi)002:2414: chen po'i chos dar ba'i nam mkha'i gnas su 'byon
NK046(mi)002:2415: par 'gyur ba la sogs pa ji snyed pa thams
NK046(mi)002:2416: cad la rina chen sna tshogs dang me tog dang
NK046(mi)002:2417: dri bzang dang gos rgyan 'bru sman sna tshogs pa
NK046(mi)002:2418: la sogas pa'i char pa dus rtag tu rgyun mi
NK046(mi)002:2419: 'achada par 'abba par shog cig ces smon pa ste
NK046(mi)002:2420: / tshul khrims rnam par dag na smon lam ji btab dngos su 'grub pa dang /
NK046(mi)002:2421: de ltar min na'ang phan yon gyi khyad par ni 'thob par 'gyur ro //
NK046(mi)002:2422: bzhi pa bla na med pa'i mchod pa ni /
NK046(mi)002:2423: byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos rang gi
NK046(mi)002:2424: thugs ka nas 'od zer kha dog mi 'dra ba
NK046(mi)002:2425: bye ba brgya stong sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med
NK046(mi)002:2426: pa'i rdul dang mnyam par spros 'od zer de re
NK046(mi)002:2427: re'i rtse la yang byang chub sems dpa' kun tu
NK046(mi)002:2428: bzang po rang 'dra ba re re sbrul /
NK046(mi)002:2429: de re re'i thugs ka nas sngar dang 'dra ba'i 'od zer spro zhing /
NK046(mi)002:2430: de'i rtser kun tu bzang po sprul pa sogs grangs
NK046(mi)002:2431: med bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i bar du spros te
NK046(mi)002:2432: / de dag re res kyang mchod rdzas kyi rnam
NK046(mi)002:2433: grangs bsam gyis mi khyab pas phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba
NK046(mi)002:2434: sras bcas mchod pa kun tu bzang po'i mchod pa'i
NK046(mi)002:2435: / sprin lta bu / ji ltar 'ajama pa'i dbyangs
NK046(mi)002:2436: dang kun tu bzang po la sogas pa sa bcu'i
NK046(mi)002:2437: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis rnam par 'phrul ba'i
NK046(mi)002:2438: mchod pa'i sprin mtha' yas pas phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba
NK046(mi)002:2439: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la mchoda pa madzada pa
NK046(mi)002:2440: / sprin lta bu / yi tshul / dkon mchog ta la las /
NK046(mi)002:2441: me tog phal cher me tog bla re dang //
NK046(mi)002:2442: me tog bkod pa'i 'od zer rab bkye ste //
NK046(mi)002:2443: me tog sna tshogs kun tu bkram byas nas //
NK046(mi)002:2444: bdag nyid chen po de dag rgyal ba mchod //
NK046(mi)002:2445: ces pa la sogs pa gsungs pa ltar de bzhina
NK046(mi)002:2446: du badga gis kyang de bzhina gshegsa pa mgona po
NK046(mi)002:2447: sras dang bacasa pa rnams la mchoda pa dbul bar
NK046(mi)002:2448: bagyi'o snyam du mos par bya'o //
NK046(mi)002:2449: gzhan yang byang chub tu sems bskyed pa /
NK046(mi)002:2451: chos kyi tshig don 'dzin pa rnams kyang bla na
NK046(mi)002:2452: med pa'i mchod pa yin pas de rnams kyang rang
NK046(mi)002:2454: lnga pa bstod pa dbyangs kyi mchod pa ni //
NK046(mi)002:2455: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sku mtshan dpe /
NK046(mi)002:2457: thugs rnam mkhyen la sogs pa'i yon tan rgya mtsho
NK046(mi)002:2458: lta bu mnga' ba sras byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs
NK046(mi)002:2459: dang bcas pa rnams la badga gis bstod pa'i dbyangs
NK046(mi)002:2460: te skad kyi gdangs 'degs 'jog 'gyur khug phra sbom
NK046(mi)002:2461: ste drug ldan la sogs pa'i yan lag rgya mtshosa
NK046(mi)002:2462: te rgya mtsho ltar mtha' yas pas bstod par bgyi
NK046(mi)002:2463: zhing / bstod pa'i glu dbyangs shin tu snyan pa'i
NK046(mi)002:2464: sprin phung mtha' yas pa rnams rgyal ba sras bcas
NK046(mi)002:2465: de dag rnams la nges par te gdon mi za
NK046(mi)002:2466: bar dus dang rnam pa kun tu khyab cing 'byung
NK046(mi)002:2467: bar gyur cig ces smon pa'o //
NK046(mi)002:2468: gnyis pa phyag 'tshal ba'i yan lag ni /
NK046(mi)002:2469: phyogs bcu'i zhing mtha' yas pa na 'das pa dang
NK046(mi)002:2470: ma 'ongs ba dang da lta ste dus gsum du
NK046(mi)002:2471: gshegas shing bzhugs pa'i sangsa rgyas bcom ldan 'das kun
NK046(mi)002:2472: dang lung dang rtogs pa'i dam pa'i chos dang tshogs
NK046(mi)002:2473: rnams kyi mchog 'dus nas 'bral ba med pa dge
NK046(mi)002:2474: 'dun dang bacasa pa rnams la rang gi lus phyogs
NK046(mi)002:2475: bcu'i zhing gi rdul phra rab kun gyi grangsa ji
NK046(mi)002:2476: snyed yod pa de snyed kyi grangs dang mnyam par
NK046(mi)002:2477: sprul nas lus btud cing gus pas thal mo gnas
NK046(mi)002:2478: gsum du gtugs te lus thams cad la phab ba'am
NK046(mi)002:2479: yan lag lnga sa la phab pa dang /
NK046(mi)002:2480: ngag gus bas phyag 'tshal gyi tshig dang /
NK046(mi)002:2481: yid gus pas dkon mchog rin po che gsum gyi
NK046(mi)002:2482: che ba'i yon tan dran te gus shing dad pas
NK046(mi)002:2483: ni bdag cag gis phyag 'tshal ba dang /
NK046(mi)002:2484: de bzhin du gang byang chub semas kyi gzhi zhes sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs dang /
NK046(mi)002:2485: theg chen gyi sde snod dang ston pa'i sku bltams pa'i gnas la sogs dang /
NK046(mi)002:2486: sems bskyed gling sogs chos 'chad nyan byed pa'i gnas gzhi rnams dang /
NK046(mi)002:2487: sku gsung thugs kyi rten dang mchod rten gang ji
NK046(mi)002:2488: snyed yod pa rnams la'ang badga nyid phyag 'tshal zhing
NK046(mi)002:2489: / so thar gyi mkhan po dang de lung nod pa la'ang gsungs /
NK046(mi)002:2490: de bzhina du dge tshul slong gi las slob dang
NK046(mi)002:2491: klog slob pa po la sogs pa'i slob dpona rnams
NK046(mi)002:2492: dang / brtul zhugs zhes bya ba snga ma brtul
NK046(mi)002:2493: te rjes ma la zhugs pas brtul zhugs te ston
NK046(mi)002:2494: pa'i rjes 'jug rtags tsam 'dzin pa yan chad brtul
NK046(mi)002:2495: zhugsa mchog ste gos dkar lcang lo'i sde dang rab
NK046(mi)002:2496: byung ngur smig gi sde rnams la mi phyed dad
NK046(mi)002:2497: pas kun nas bslangs te sgo gsum gus pas phyag
NK046(mi)002:2498: 'atshala lo zhes lus ngag yid gsum gyi phyag gi
NK046(mi)002:2499: nang nas yid gtso bas kha yengs mig yengs kyi
NK046(mi)002:2500: ngang nas phyag mang po 'tshal ba las sems thog
NK046(mi)002:2501: nas phyag gcig tsam 'tshal ba chod che zhing phan
NK046(mi)002:2502: dang / yon che'o // de yang lus drang por
NK046(mi)002:2503: bsrangs bas rtsa rlung sems rnams drangs bar 'gyur bas
NK046(mi)002:2504: drang po bzhi ldan gyi sgo nas rang gi g.yas
NK046(mi)002:2505: su pha g.yon du ma mdun du dgra bgegs dang
NK046(mi)002:2506: mtha' skor du sems can thams cad sa gzhi'i ngos
NK046(mi)002:2507: la rdul 'khrigs pa bzhin du yod par bsam ste
NK046(mi)002:2508: thams cad kyis lus gus pas lag gnyis kyi thal
NK046(mi)002:2509: mo'i bar du nor bu bzung bar bsams te /
NK046(mi)002:2512: lag gnyis spyi bor thal sbyar te //
NK046(mi)002:2514: legs par sbyar ba spyi mgrin snying ka gsum du
NK046(mi)002:2515: rim par gtugs pa na de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
NK046(mi)002:2516: kyi sku gsung thugs kyi yon tan dran zhing de
NK046(mi)002:2517: dang der phyag 'tshal bas rang gzhan sems can thams
NK046(mi)002:2518: cad kyi lus ngag yid gsum gyi sgrib pa thams
NK046(mi)002:2519: cad dang bral nas dbu gtsug tor bltar mi mngon
NK046(mi)002:2520: pa dang / gsung chos kyi dung dang /
NK046(mi)002:2521: thugs dpal gyi be'u'am sku gsung thugs mi zad pa
NK046(mi)002:2522: rgyan gyi 'khor lo'i yon tan thams cad thob par
NK046(mi)002:2523: shog cig ces bsam nas lus thams cad kyis sa
NK046(mi)002:2524: la phab pa'am ma lnga sa la phab pa na
NK046(mi)002:2525: bsam par bya ba mdo las gsungs pa 'di ltar
NK046(mi)002:2526: pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la 'dzugs pa
NK046(mi)002:2527: na sems can thams cad g.yas phyogs drang po'i lam
NK046(mi)002:2528: la gnas par shog cig ces brjod cing bsam par
NK046(mi)002:2529: bya'o // pus mo g.yon pa'i lha nga sa la
NK046(mi)002:2530: 'dzugs pa na sems can gang su dag g.yon phyogs
NK046(mi)002:2531: 'khyogs po'i lam la gnas pa thams cad 'phags pa'i
NK046(mi)002:2532: lam yang dag pa la gnas par gyur cig ces
NK046(mi)002:2534: lag pa g.yas pa sa la 'dzugs pa na ji
NK046(mi)002:2535: ltar de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub kyi snying po
NK046(mi)002:2536: shing drung du bzhugs te bsod nams rgya las grub
NK046(mi)002:2537: pa'i phyag g.yas sa la bsnun nas bdud sde dpung
NK046(mi)002:2538: dang bcas pa brtul te byang chub brnyes pa de
NK046(mi)002:2539: bzhin du sems can thams cad kyis kyang bdud dang
NK046(mi)002:2540: phyir brgol ba thams cad chom par gyur cig /
NK046(mi)002:2541: byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug cing lag pas
NK046(mi)002:2542: sa chen po la bsnun nas sangs rgyas kyi ye
NK046(mi)002:2543: shes thob par shog cig ces brjod cing bsam mo
NK046(mi)002:2544: // de'i lag pa g.yon pa sa la 'dzugs pa
NK046(mi)002:2545: na sems can gang su dag byis pa'i chos la
NK046(mi)002:2546: // gnas te / g.yon phyogs su 'dzin pa gdul
NK046(mi)002:2547: dka' ba de dag bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis shin
NK046(mi)002:2548: tu sdud par gyur cig ces brjod cing bsam mo
NK046(mi)002:2549: // gnas te / // de'i gdong dang dpral ba
NK046(mi)002:2550: sa la gtugs pa na sems can thams cad nga
NK046(mi)002:2551: rgyal ma mchis pa 'dis bla ma la rim gro
NK046(mi)002:2552: bgyid pa rnyed cing spyi gtsug bltar mi mngon pa
NK046(mi)002:2554: ba'i chos thams cad 'phags par gyur cig ces brjod
NK046(mi)002:2556: bsam mo // de ltar yan lag lngas phyag 'tshal
NK046(mi)002:2558: bsam mo // ba 'dis // sems can thams cad
NK046(mi)002:2559: kyi sgrib pa lnga sel bar gyur cig /
NK046(mi)002:2560: dbang po lnga yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig /
NK046(mi)002:2561: 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga yongs su shes par gyur cig /
NK046(mi)002:2562: mngon par shes pa nyams pa med pa lnga thob par gyur cig /
NK046(mi)002:2563: mig lnga yongs su dag par gyur cig /
NK046(mi)002:2564: 'gro ba rgyud lngar skyes pa rnams 'gro ba lnga las khyad par du 'phags par gyur cig /
NK046(mi)002:2565: tshul khrims khyad par du 'phags pa dang /
NK046(mi)002:2566: ting nge 'dzin khyad par du 'phags pa dang /
NK046(mi)002:2567: shes rab khyad par du 'phags pa dang /
NK046(mi)002:2568: rnam par grol ba khyad par du 'phags pa dang /
NK046(mi)002:2569: rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba khyad par
NK046(mi)002:2570: du 'phags par gyur cig ces brjod cing bsam par
NK046(mi)002:2572: de'i phan yon yang ji skad du /
NK046(mi)002:2573: lus btud dbang chen bar gyi rdul dag dang //
NK046(mi)002:2574: mnyam pa'i 'khor los bsgyur rgyal grangs thob zhing //
NK046(mi)002:2575: mthar thug zhi ba mchog gi go 'phang 'thob //
NK046(mi)002:2577: gsum pa skyabs su 'gro ba'i yan lag ni /
NK046(mi)002:2578: de la chos thams cad kyi sgo dbye sdom pa thams cad kyi gzhi rten /
NK046(mi)002:2579: yon tan thams cad kyi 'byung gnas /
NK046(mi)002:2580: phyi nang gi khyad par 'byed pa dang /
NK046(mi)002:2581: nang pa'i gral du tshud byed skyabs 'gro 'di nyid
NK046(mi)002:2582: yin pas don shin tu che ba ste de yang
NK046(mi)002:2583: chos thams cad kyi sgo dbye yin te /
NK046(mi)002:2584: nang pa'i chos sgo gang la zhugs kyang dang po skyabs 'gro nas 'jug dgos pa'i phyir dang /
NK046(mi)002:2585: sdom pa thams cad kyi gzhi rten yang yin te /
NK046(mi)002:2587: sdom pa kun la yod mod kyang //
NK046(mi)002:2588: skyabs su ma song ba la med //
NK046(mi)002:2589: ces ma gi bsnyen gnas yan lag brgyad pa nas
NK046(mi)002:2590: ya gi gsang sngags kyi sdom pa'i bar thams cad
NK046(mi)002:2591: skyabs su ma song ba'i gang zag rnams la ston
NK046(mi)002:2593: skyabs 'gro'i sdom pa dang ldan pa la sdom pa thams cad gnad pa'i phyir ro //
NK046(mi)002:2594: yon tan thams cad kyi 'byung gnas kyang yin te /
NK046(mi)002:2595: skyabs sdom med pa'i gang zag gis so byang sngags
NK046(mi)002:2596: gsum gyi lam gang nyams su blangs kyang phan pa
NK046(mi)002:2597: med de / 'bri gung skyob pa rin po ches /
NK046(mi)002:2598: skyabs 'gro'i chos gzhug shor na phan pa med //
NK046(mi)002:2600: dper na rming rdo med pas gyang dang ri mo med pa bzhin no //
NK046(mi)002:2601: skyabs sdom dang ldan pa'i gang zag gis so byang
NK046(mi)002:2602: sngags gsum gyi lam gang nyams su blangs kyang de
NK046(mi)002:2603: dang de'i lam dang 'bras bu'i yon tan rnams 'byung
NK046(mi)002:2604: ba'i phyir dper na rming rdo brtan pa'i gyang dang
NK046(mi)002:2606: phyi nang gi khyad par 'byed byed dang nang pa sangs rgyas pa'i gral du tshud byed yin te /
NK046(mi)002:2607: phyi nang gi khyad par 'di la gang zag gi
NK046(mi)002:2608: bdag 'dod pa dang mi 'dod pas 'byed pa yod
NK046(mi)002:2609: kyang / de ltar na rang sde gnas ma bu bas /
NK046(mi)002:2610: khur khyer ba yi gang zag yod //
NK046(mi)002:2611: rtag gam mi rtag mi brjod do //
NK046(mi)002:2612: zhes brjod med kyi bdag 'dod pas nang pa ma yin par 'gyur zhing /
NK046(mi)002:2613: spyir mu stegs pa zhes pa ci yang mi shes pa zhig min te /
NK046(mi)002:2614: rgya gar jo bo'i slob ma pan+di ta sa'i snying
NK046(mi)002:2615: po zhes pas phyi nang gi grub mtha' la lan
NK046(mi)002:2616: gsum rer zhugs kyang phyi nang gi khyad dbye ma
NK046(mi)002:2618: pan+di ta dpal ldan jo bo chen pos kyang /
NK046(mi)002:2619: 'phags yul na mkhas pa'i sgo drug la sogs pa bzhugs kyang /
NK046(mi)002:2620: nga yi bla ma shin+ta ba ni gshegs /
NK046(mi)002:2621: nga ni bod du 'ongs bas rgya gar na phyi
NK046(mi)002:2622: nang gi dbye ba shes pa med gsungs pa dang
NK046(mi)002:2623: / nyid kyis kyang stod mnga' ris yul du /
NK046(mi)002:2625: mtshan yang skyabs 'gro'i pan+di ta zhes btags pa na
NK046(mi)002:2626: bod kyi mkhas pa rnams kyis khyed kyis chos gzhan
NK046(mi)002:2628: ma gsungs na khyed kyi mtshan la yang skyabs 'gro'i
NK046(mi)002:2629: pan+di ta btags par 'dug zhus pa la jo bo
NK046(mi)002:2631: bdag gi ming tsam gyis kyang sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la bya ba byed 'dug gsungs /
NK046(mi)002:2633: mdor na dam pa'i chos thams cad skyabs 'gro nyag gcig la 'dus la zab gnad kyang yin gsungs /
NK046(mi)002:2634: de lta bu'i skyabs 'gro de 'chad par byed pa la spyi don dang /
NK046(mi)002:2640: so so'i don bshad pa dang bzhi /
NK046(mi)002:2642: dang 'dod yid ches phyir mi ldog pa'i dad pa las phyi ma'o //
NK046(mi)002:2643: gnyis pa ngo bo ni 'jigs pa las sgrol ba'i
NK046(mi)002:2644: don du skyabs su 'dzin par khas len cing dam
NK046(mi)002:2645: bcas pa'o // de yang gsol 'debs dang ma nor ba zhig dgos te /
NK046(mi)002:2646: gsol 'debs ni rang la nyes pa sogs gang yang
NK046(mi)002:2647: rung ba byung tshe yul de la dngos po zhus
NK046(mi)002:2648: te de las bdag bsrung bar gsol ba'am zhu ba
NK046(mi)002:2650: dper na mi nyes can zhig gis dpon la lkog
NK046(mi)002:2651: nor phul nas bdag la nyes chad mi 'byung bar
NK046(mi)002:2652: gsol ba 'debs pa lta bu yin la /
NK046(mi)002:2655: khas len de yang zhes pa ltar rang gis dus da nas bzung ste skyid sdug legs nyes /
NK046(mi)002:2656: mtho dman ci byung yang khyed las re ltos gzhan
NK046(mi)002:2657: du med do snyam pas dkon mchog gsum la skyabs
NK046(mi)002:2658: gnas su khas len cing dam bca' ba yin la
NK046(mi)002:2659: / mdor na skyabs 'gro'i ngo bo khas len dang dam bca' yin par shes pa gal che'o //
NK046(mi)002:2661: skyabs yul gyi sgo nas dbye ba yod kyang 'dir gtso bo kun slong gis dbye ba yin la /
NK046(mi)002:2662: de la yang 'jig rten pa'i skyabs 'gro dang /
NK046(mi)002:2663: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i skyabs 'gro dang gnyis /
NK046(mi)002:2664: 'das pa la'ang theg dman dang theg chen gyi skyabs 'gro gnyis /
NK046(mi)002:2665: theg chen la yang gnas skabs rgyu'i skyabs 'gro dang /
NK046(mi)002:2666: mthar thug 'bras bu'i skyabs 'gro gnyis so //
NK046(mi)002:2667: bzhi pa so so'i don bshad pa la /
NK046(mi)002:2668: mdo rgyal mtshan dam pa las /
NK046(mi)002:2669: 'jigs pas skrag pa'i mi dag gis //
NK046(mi)002:2670: phal cher ri dang nags tshal dang //
NK046(mi)002:2671: kun dga' ra ba ljon shing dang //
NK046(mi)002:2672: mchod rten rnams la skyabs su 'gro //
NK046(mi)002:2673: skyabs de gtso bo ma yin te //
NK046(mi)002:2674: skyabs de dag la brten nas ni //
NK046(mi)002:2675: sdug bsngal che las thar mi 'gyur //
NK046(mi)002:2677: gnas skabs nad gdon la sogs pa'i rkyen phran bu
NK046(mi)002:2678: tsam la skrag nas ri dang nags tshal sogs kyi
NK046(mi)002:2679: lha dang / dbang phyug dang tshangs pa khyab 'jug
NK046(mi)002:2680: dang sde brgyad la sogs pa la skyabs su 'dzin
NK046(mi)002:2681: lha dang / pa yin la / de dag gis
NK046(mi)002:2682: sdug bsngal thams cad las skyob pa lta ci ste
NK046(mi)002:2683: gnas skabs kyi 'jigs pa las skyabs par yang ma
NK046(mi)002:2684: nges pas gtso bo'am mchog min la /
NK046(mi)002:2685: de la skyabs yul dkon mchog gsum yin kyang bsam
NK046(mi)002:2686: pa 'jig rten pa yin na 'jig rten pa'i skyabs
NK046(mi)002:2687: 'gro yin no // 'jig rten las 'das pa'i skyabs 'gro la'ang /
NK046(mi)002:2688: theg dman gyi skyabs 'gro ni rkang gnyis rnams kyi
NK046(mi)002:2689: mchog sangs rgyas zhes rkang gnyis mi rnams kyi mchog
NK046(mi)002:2690: rgyal ba sh+aakya thub pa lta bu mchog gi sprul
NK046(mi)002:2691: pa'i sku ste / thugs chos sku dang sku lus gzugs sku gnyis sangs rgyas dang /
NK046(mi)002:2692: zhi ba 'dod chags dang bral ba rnams kyi mchog dam pa'i chos zhes /
NK046(mi)002:2693: spang bya nyon mongs sa bon dang bcas pa spangs
NK046(mi)002:2694: pa'i spang ba'am myang 'das sam 'gog pa chos dang
NK046(mi)002:2695: / tshogs rnams kyi mchod dge 'dun zhes gang zag
NK046(mi)002:2696: gi rgyud du sngar med gsar du 'dus pa'i rtogs
NK046(mi)002:2697: pa de 'gro ba lha dang bcas pas lam bden
NK046(mi)002:2698: dang gang zag gnyis so sor dbye bar mi nus
NK046(mi)002:2699: pas 'dus pa rnams kyi mchog dge 'dun yin te
NK046(mi)002:2700: / / sang ga 'dus pa la'o ces so //
NK046(mi)002:2701: 'dus pa gzhan ni skyes pa'i tha ma 'chi /
NK046(mi)002:2702: 'dus pa'i tha ma 'bral bar 'gyur ba la sogs pas mchog ma yin no //
NK046(mi)002:2703: de'ang slob pa rgyun zhugs phyir 'ong phyir mi 'ong gsum dang /
NK046(mi)002:2704: mi slob pa dgra bcom pa dang bzhi'o //
NK046(mi)002:2705: de lta bu'i dkon mchog gsum la kun slong rang
NK046(mi)002:2706: nyid srid pa 'khor ba'i 'jigs pa la skrag nas
NK046(mi)002:2707: phung po la gshed ma ral gri thogs pa lta
NK046(mi)002:2708: bu dang / khams la sbrul gdug lta bu sogs su bltas te /
NK046(mi)002:2709: de las grol bar 'dod pa'i bsam pas gnas skabs
NK046(mi)002:2710: dus ji srid 'tsho ba'i bar dang mthar thug rang
NK046(mi)002:2711: lam gyi 'bras bu ma thob kyi bar du skyabs
NK046(mi)002:2714: ma nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i sems can rnams la
NK046(mi)002:2715: snying rje drag po shas mi bzod pa bskyed nas
NK046(mi)002:2716: snying rje sar mi bzhag par de dag sdug bsngal
NK046(mi)002:2717: de las sgrol bar bya dgos la de yang rang
NK046(mi)002:2718: nyid ma grol bar gzhan sgrol mi nus pas /
NK046(mi)002:2719: rang gzhan thams cad srid zhi'i 'jigs pa las sgrol
NK046(mi)002:2720: ba'i phyir theg chen gyi dkon mchog gsum la byang
NK046(mi)002:2721: chub snying po ma thob bar du skyabs su 'gro
NK046(mi)002:2722: ba yin la / de la'ang gnas skabs rgyu'i skyabs 'gro dang /
NK046(mi)002:2723: mthar thug 'bras bu'i skyabs 'gro gnyis las /
NK046(mi)002:2725: rang gzhan sems can thams cad srid zhi'i 'jigs pa
NK046(mi)002:2726: las sgrol ba'i phyir du gzhan rgyud la byon zin
NK046(mi)002:2727: gyi dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba yin
NK046(mi)002:2728: la / de ji ltar zhe na /
NK046(mi)002:2729: thun mong ltar bshad na bdag cag gi ston pas
NK046(mi)002:2730: sngon dang bo thugs bskyed de bskal ba grangs med
NK046(mi)002:2732: mthar rgyal po zas gtsang gi sras su 'khrungs nas
NK046(mi)002:2733: byang chub shing drung du mngon par byang chub pa
NK046(mi)002:2734: rgyal ba sh+aakya thub pa lta bu rang rgyud las
NK046(mi)002:2735: tha dad pa'i sangs rgyas sku bzhi'am sku gsum gyi
NK046(mi)002:2736: bdag nyid sangs rgyas dkon mchog dang /
NK046(mi)002:2737: sangs rgyas dang byang sems kyi thugs rgyud na bzhugs
NK046(mi)002:2738: pa'i lung dang rtogs pa'i chos dam chos dkon mchog
NK046(mi)002:2739: dang / byang chub sems dpa' phyir mi ldog pa rje btsun 'jam pa'i dbyangs dang /
NK046(mi)002:2740: byams pa la sogs pa rang las tha dad pa'i
NK046(mi)002:2741: dge 'dun te dge 'dun dkon mchog dang gsum la
NK046(mi)002:2745: 'di ni de dngos 'dod pas khas len de yang snying brtse las rig bya //
NK046(mi)002:2747: rang gzhan gyi srid zhi'i rgud pa sel phyir mthar
NK046(mi)002:2748: thug gi dkon mchog gsum rang rgyud la sgrub par
NK046(mi)002:2750: mthar rang rgyud la mchog gsum de grub pa na
NK046(mi)002:2751: srid zhi'i 'jigs pa las grol ba yin pas skyabs
NK046(mi)002:2752: gnas mthar thug kyang de yin te /
NK046(mi)002:2753: theg pa chen po rgyud bla ma las /
NK046(mi)002:2754: dam pa'i don du 'gro ba yi //
NK046(mi)002:2755: skyabs ni sangs rgyas nyag gcig ste //
NK046(mi)002:2756: thub pa chos kyi sku can phyir //
NK046(mi)002:2757: tshogs kyang de yi mthar thug go //
NK046(mi)002:2759: spyir rgyud bla ma'i don yang skyabs 'gro las gzhan med par shes dgos shing /
NK046(mi)002:2760: khams byang chub yon tan phrin las bzhis 'bras skyabs kyang bstan par gsungs /
NK046(mi)002:2761: des na rgyu'i skyabs 'gros srid zhi'i 'jigs pa thams
NK046(mi)002:2762: cad las sgrol mi nus pas skyabs mthar thug pa
NK046(mi)002:2763: ma yin no // de ltar na 'bras skyabs dang
NK046(mi)002:2764: smon sems gnyis gcig tu 'gyur bas khyad ci yin
NK046(mi)002:2765: ma yin no // zhe na / slob dpon dbyig
NK046(mi)002:2766: gnyen la rang las lhag pa'i bu bzhi yod pa
NK046(mi)002:2767: ma yin no // zhe na / las / mngon
NK046(mi)002:2768: pa rang las mkhas pa slob dpon blo gros brtan
NK046(mi)002:2769: pas mdo rgyan gyi 'grel chen las /
NK046(mi)002:2770: sems bskyed ces bya skyabs 'gro zhes kyang bya //
NK046(mi)002:2772: rgya gar jo bos dam bca' ba'i lcags kyu gnyis yod med du bzhed /
NK046(mi)002:2774: rang don dang gzhan don gyi khyad yin gsungs pa
NK046(mi)002:2775: 'di'i dgongs pa la brtags na ngo bo gcig la
NK046(mi)002:2776: ldog pa tha dad du bzhed pa yin te sems
NK046(mi)002:2777: can thams cad kyi don du zhes pa'i ldog pa
NK046(mi)002:2779: bdag gi rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes pa'i ldog pa nas skyabs 'gro yin la /
NK046(mi)002:2780: de lta bu'i khyad par du byas nas dbye ba yin gsungs so //
NK046(mi)002:2781: gnyis pa gzhung don la spyir theg pa che chung
NK046(mi)002:2782: gi skyabs 'gro'i khyad par mang du yod kyang 'dir
NK046(mi)002:2783: khyad par gsum dang ldan pa'i sgo nas 'chad pa
NK046(mi)002:2784: la / khyad par so sor bshad pa dang /
NK046(mi)002:2785: thun mong du 'gro tshul bshad pa gnyis las /
NK046(mi)002:2787: dang po theg dman gyi skyabs 'gro bshad pa ni /
NK046(mi)002:2788: bsam pa rang nyid srid pa 'khor ba'i 'jigs pa
NK046(mi)002:2789: las grol te zhi ba myang 'das thob pa'i ched
NK046(mi)002:2790: du dus ji srid 'tsho ba'i bar du zhes 'dul
NK046(mi)002:2791: ba'i gzhung nas gsungs pa ltar ro //
NK046(mi)002:2793: gang zhig gsum la skyabs 'gro ba //
