NK046(mi)002:16130: bsnyen gnas yan lag brgyad bsrung ba la sogs pas
NK046(mi)002:16131: dge ba cung zad re bsgrub pa'i dbang gis bde
NK046(mi)002:16132: 'gro ste mtho ris kyi 'jig rten rnam pa mang
NK046(mi)002:16133: po dag tu yanga dang yang du 'ongsa te skyes
NK046(mi)002:16134: nas 'dod pa'i yon tan gyi bde ba manga po
NK046(mi)002:16135: la longs spyod spyad nas gnas par byas kyang der
NK046(mi)002:16136: dge ba ni ma 'grub la sdig pa ni mang
NK046(mi)002:16137: po byas pa'i 'bras bu shi 'phos nas dmyal ba
NK046(mi)002:16138: la sogs pa'i ngan songa gsum gyi sdug bsngal ni
NK046(mi)002:16139: dus yun ring zhing shin tu mi bazad pa bzod
NK046(mi)002:16140: par dka' ba myong ba rnams su ltung bar 'gyur
NK046(mi)002:16141: zhing mtho dman bde sdug nges pa med pa'i srid
NK046(mi)002:16143: de 'dra'i khams gsum 'khor ba'i srid pa na ni
NK046(mi)002:16144: chags sdang rmongs sred sogs kyi rtog ngan re res
NK046(mi)002:16145: kyang dmyal ba la sogs pa'i gnas su 'phen pas
NK046(mi)002:16146: sdug bsngal chen po 'byung pa'i g.yang sa shin tu
NK046(mi)002:16147: mang la / srid pa der ni thar ba'i thabs
NK046(mi)002:16148: de kho na nyid thos pa dang rtogs pa sogs
NK046(mi)002:16149: yod pa min par ma zad phyi nang gi dngos
NK046(mi)002:16150: po rnams la bdag 'dzin a 'thas kyis rtag rtag
NK046(mi)002:16151: bden bden la sogs pa phyin ci log tu 'dzin
NK046(mi)002:16152: pa 'di 'dra ba yin pas na skabs der yang
NK046(mi)002:16153: spros pa dang bral ba'i stong pa nyid rtogs pa
NK046(mi)002:16154: dang dngos por lta ba la sogs pa'i phyin ci
NK046(mi)002:16155: log gi 'dzin pa phan tshun 'gal ba yin pas
NK046(mi)002:16156: na srid pa na de kho na nyid dam zab
NK046(mi)002:16157: mo stong pa nyid thos pa dang rtogs pa 'di
NK046(mi)002:16159: mun pa'i klong du snang ba bzhin no //
NK046(mi)002:16160: des na da res ston pa thugs rje can sras
NK046(mi)002:16161: byang chub sems dpa' dang bcas pa'i sku drin gyis
NK046(mi)002:16162: chos zab mo stong pa nyid la sogs pa ston
NK046(mi)002:16163: pa dang thos pa sogs yod pa'i skabs 'dir /
NK046(mi)002:16164: stong nyid ston pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol du
NK046(mi)002:16165: phyin pa'i le'u 'di lta bu sogs la bdag lta
NK046(mi)002:16166: bus shes pa dang rtogs pa ga la nus snyam
NK046(mi)002:16167: nas sems zhum pa de stong nyid la skrag pa
NK046(mi)002:16168: yin gyi / de las gzhan dgra gdon sogs la skrag pa ltar med la /
NK046(mi)002:16169: deng sang rang rang gis stong nyid ston pa'i gzhung
NK046(mi)002:16170: rnams la thos bsam mi mos pa dang mi shes
NK046(mi)002:16171: pa 'di skye ba sngon mar stong nyid la blo
NK046(mi)002:16172: kha ma phyogs pa'i rtags yin pa dang /
NK046(mi)002:16173: stong nyid ston pa'i gzhung thos tshe sems rab tu
NK046(mi)002:16174: dga' zhing dad pas lus ba spu ldang zhing mig
NK046(mi)002:16175: mchi mas brlan pa ni skye ba sngon sngon mar
NK046(mi)002:16176: stong pa nyid ston pa'i gzhung la thos bsam byas
NK046(mi)002:16177: pa'i sa bon yod pa'i rtags yin par gsungs la
NK046(mi)002:16178: / des na da lta tshe 'dir ji lta ba
NK046(mi)002:16179: bzhin ma rtogs na'ang zab mo stong pa nyid la
NK046(mi)002:16180: blo kha phyogs nas thos bsam bsgom pa re byas
NK046(mi)002:16181: na tshe phyi mar zab mo stong pa nyid thos
NK046(mi)002:16182: pa dang rtogs par 'gyur nges te /
NK046(mi)002:16183: rnal 'byor spyod pa bzhi brgya pa las /
NK046(mi)002:16184: de nyid shes pas gal te 'dir //
NK046(mi)002:16185: mya ngan 'das pa ma thob kyang //
NK046(mi)002:16186: skye ba phyi mar 'bad med par //
NK046(mi)002:16187: nges par thob 'gyur las bzhin no //
NK046(mi)002:16189: sngon yang las ngan stobs chen gyi las kyi lhag
NK046(mi)002:16190: mas shin tu sdug bsngal bar gyur pa'i rgur chung
NK046(mi)002:16191: dang legs 'ong lta bu la sogs pa'ang ston pa
NK046(mi)002:16192: sangs rgyas dang phrad de chos thos pa tsam gyis
NK046(mi)002:16193: bden pa mthong zhing dgra bcom pa'i go 'phang thob
NK046(mi)002:16194: pa rnams kyang sngon sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bstan
NK046(mi)002:16195: pa'i dus su phung khams skye mched sogs la mkhas
NK046(mi)002:16196: par byas pa'i las kyis yin par gsungs shing /
NK046(mi)002:16197: des na gang zag blun zhing blo chung ba rnams
NK046(mi)002:16198: kyis zab mo stong pa nyid kyi don la chos
NK046(mi)002:16199: 'di stong ngam mi stong snyam pa'i the tshom tsam
NK046(mi)002:16201: gal te de ltar the tshom tsam zhig skyes par
NK046(mi)002:16202: gyur na'ang srid pa hrul por byed de de nyid
NK046(mi)002:16203: las / bsod nams chung ngus tshes 'di la //
NK046(mi)002:16204: the tshom tsam zhig skye mi 'gyur //
NK046(mi)002:16205: the tshom tsam zhing skyes gyur na //
NK046(mi)002:16208: des na da nges chos zab mo stong pa nyid
NK046(mi)002:16209: dang 'phrad pa la dga' zhing spro bas thos bsam
NK046(mi)002:16210: bsgom pas don yod par bya'o //
NK046(mi)002:16211: de kho na nyid kyi snang ba dang bral ba'i
NK046(mi)002:16212: srid pa der yanga dpe zla med cing bzod par
NK046(mi)002:16213: dka' bas mi bazad pa'i sdug bsngal gyi rgya mtsho
NK046(mi)002:16214: rgya che la yun ring ba dus dang phyogs kyi
NK046(mi)002:16215: pha mtha' med pa'am mtha' las 'adsa pa nyid du
NK046(mi)002:16217: der ni sems can rnams gong du bshad pa de
NK046(mi)002:16218: ltar srid pa'i las dang nyon mongs pa drag pos
NK046(mi)002:16219: zil gyis mnan nas dge ba sgrub pa la stobs
NK046(mi)002:16220: chung zhing / der ni dge blo re skyes kyang
NK046(mi)002:16221: dge ba sgrub pa'i rten dal 'byor gyi mi tshe
NK046(mi)002:16222: yang thung ba nyid kyis dge ba bsgrub pa'i long
NK046(mi)002:16223: chung zhing / med pa dang / der cung zad
NK046(mi)002:16224: gnas pa'i bar la yanga yun ring por gsona du
NK046(mi)002:16225: re ba'i bya ba lus kyi rim gro sna tshogs
NK046(mi)002:16226: chung zhing / med pa dang / dang / nad
NK046(mi)002:16227: med kyi ste nad med par byed pa yi thabs
NK046(mi)002:16229: zas skom la sogs pa ma rnyed pas bkres shing phongs pa dang /
NK046(mi)002:16230: 'tsho chas kyi bya bas ngal zhing dub pa dang /
NK046(mi)002:16231: tshe phyed gnyid du myos pa dang /
NK046(mi)002:16232: phyi nang gi nyer 'tshe sna tshogs dang de bzhina
NK046(mi)002:16233: du byis pa so so'i skye bo dang 'grogsa pa
NK046(mi)002:16234: sogs dona med pa'i bya ba rnam pa sna tshogs
NK046(mi)002:16235: kyis tshe ni dge ba bsgrub pa'i don ci yang
NK046(mi)002:16236: med par myur pa nyid du zad cing 'ad'a yi
NK046(mi)002:16237: / srid pa las grol ba'i rgyu phyi nang gi
NK046(mi)002:16238: snang ba thams cad bden pa med pa bdag med
NK046(mi)002:16239: pa'i de kho na nyid kyi don la blos rnam
NK046(mi)002:16240: par dpyod pa shina tu rnyed par daka'a zhing 'khor
NK046(mi)002:16241: ba'i gnas der yanga rnam g.yeng gomsa pa shug drag
NK046(mi)002:16242: po ni chu klung bzhin du babs pa glo bur
NK046(mi)002:16243: du bzlog pa'i thabsa ni ga la yod de med
NK046(mi)002:16244: / la / de med par ma zad der yanga
NK046(mi)002:16245: dmyal ba la sogs ngan song chen por ni 'phen
NK046(mi)002:16246: pa'am ltung phyir lha'i bu'i badud la sogs pa nag
NK046(mi)002:16247: phyogs rtsa lag rnams ni brtson par byed de /
NK046(mi)002:16248: 'di ltar bdud rgyal gyis sems can brgya stong mang
NK046(mi)002:16249: po byang chub tu bkod pa pas byang chub sems
NK046(mi)002:16250: dpa' re re tsam byang chub tu lung bstan thob
NK046(mi)002:16251: pa mi bzod pas bdud nyid sangs rgyas dang byang
NK046(mi)002:16252: chub sems dpa' dang rang gi bla ma'i gzugs su
NK046(mi)002:16253: sprul nas / khyod sngar nas sbyang pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa sogs su lung ston pa dang /
NK046(mi)002:16254: chos yang dag la yang dag min par ston cing
NK046(mi)002:16255: yang dag min pa yang dag tu ston pa dang
NK046(mi)002:16256: gzhan yang g.yeng byed ma dang rmongs byed ma la
NK046(mi)002:16257: sogs pa bar chad byed pa mang ste /
NK046(mi)002:16258: chos zab tsa na nag po'i bdud kyang zab /
NK046(mi)002:16260: der ni rtag chad kyi lta ba sogs log pa'i lam mang zhing /
NK046(mi)002:16261: yang dag pa'i lam ma nor ba 'adi'o zhes dmigs
NK046(mi)002:16262: rnam phye ba'i nges pa mi skye bar the tshoma
NK046(mi)002:16264: the tshom gcod pa'i phyi nang gi rkyen rnyed dka' ba'i phyir dang /
NK046(mi)002:16265: des na deng sang thams cad gsar nges che bas
NK046(mi)002:16266: sngar gyi gzhung bzang yang dag par rnams dor nas
NK046(mi)002:16268: gsar pa la yang dag pa yin min kun yod
NK046(mi)002:16269: kyang yang dag yin min gyi dmigs rnam phye ba'i
NK046(mi)002:16270: nges shes the tshom gyi smag dang bral ba ni
NK046(mi)002:16271: rnyed dka' zhing / chos yang dag yin kyang the
NK046(mi)002:16272: tshom dang bcas bzhin nyams su blang na don 'bras
NK046(mi)002:16273: med par 'gyur ro de ltar rnam dpyod rnyed dka'
NK046(mi)002:16274: rnyed dka' zhing / ba dang / rnam g.yeng bzlog dka' ba dang /
NK046(mi)002:16275: the tshom la sogs pas yang dag pa'i chos kyi
NK046(mi)002:16276: snang ba ma rnyed par shi na slar yanga dal
NK046(mi)002:16277: ba rnyed daka'a zhig sangsa rgyas 'jig rten du 'byung
NK046(mi)002:16278: ba dang phrad pa rnyed par shin tu daka'a ba
NK046(mi)002:16279: dang / de yis bstan pa la nan tan byas
NK046(mi)002:16280: nas rang rgyud kyi chags sogs nyon mongas pa'i chu
NK046(mi)002:16281: bo spong thub pa'i dus thob par daka'a ste zhi
NK046(mi)002:16282: ba lhas thugs skyo ba'i nyams kyis e ma 'khor
NK046(mi)002:16283: ba 'dir sdug bsngal gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pas
NK046(mi)002:16286: de ltar sdug bsngal gyi khyad par sna tshogs pas shin tu sdug bsngal bar gnas na yang /
NK046(mi)002:16287: blang dor la rmongs pa'i dbang gis rang nyid sdug
NK046(mi)002:16288: bsngal gyi nang du bying ba mi mthonga bar srid
NK046(mi)002:16289: pa la mngon par chags shing zhen pa gang yin
NK046(mi)002:16290: pa dang / sdug bsngal gyi chu bora gnas pa
NK046(mi)002:16291: 'di dag la dmigs nas kyi hud mya ngan bya
NK046(mi)002:16292: pa dang / bar 'os te / dper na 'ga'
NK046(mi)002:16293: zhiga bsil ba'i reg bya 'dod pas yang yanga khrus
NK046(mi)002:16294: byas te grang bas nyen pa na slar tsha ba
NK046(mi)002:16295: 'dod pas yanga yanga mer 'jug pa ste der tsha
NK046(mi)002:16296: bas nyen pa na yang khrus la 'jug pa ste
NK046(mi)002:16297: pa dang / bar 'os te / / de ltar
NK046(mi)002:16298: tsha grang res mos kyi sgo nas shin tu sdug
NK046(mi)002:16299: bsngal bar gansa kyang srid pas rmongs nas badga nyid
NK046(mi)002:16300: bdera te bde ba phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan
NK046(mi)002:16302: de ltar shin tu sdug bsngal yang rga ba dang
NK046(mi)002:16303: 'chi ba sogs 'ong rgyu med pa bzhina du bag
NK046(mi)002:16304: yongs su rol zhing spyod pasa ci dgar gansa pa
NK046(mi)002:16305: rnams la dang po nyid du rga ba dang na
NK046(mi)002:16306: ba 'ong zhing bcos su med cing bzlog tu med
NK046(mi)002:16307: pa'i 'chi bdag gi bdud 'ongs te bsad para byas
NK046(mi)002:16308: nasa slar yang ngana song du ltung ba la sogs
NK046(mi)002:16309: pa'i sdug bsngal mi bazanga ba rnams 'ong zhing sdug
NK046(mi)002:16311: de ltar de kho na nyid kyi don mthong ba
NK046(mi)002:16312: dang bral bas na sdug bsngal bde bar rlom pa'i
NK046(mi)002:16313: khams gsum 'khor ba'i sems can sdug bsngal gyi mes
NK046(mi)002:16315: bsod namsa kyi tshogs tshad med pa'i sprin lasa legas
NK046(mi)002:16316: par byung ba'i rang gi bde ba'i tshogas char gyis
NK046(mi)002:16317: te yo byad zas gos gnas mal la sogs pa
NK046(mi)002:16318: ci 'dod pa'i tshogs kyi char chen pos de dag
NK046(mi)002:16319: gi dbul zhing phongs pa'i sdug bsngal gyi me la
NK046(mi)002:16320: sogs pa rnams sbyin pas ci 'dod pa'i longs spyod
NK046(mi)002:16321: kyis tshim par byed pa la sogs pa'i sgo nas
NK046(mi)002:16322: zhi bar byed para badga nam zhig tu 'gyur snyam
NK046(mi)002:16323: du bsam pa ni gnas skabs kyi bde ba dang
NK046(mi)002:16324: / yang nges legs kyi dbang du byas te nam
NK046(mi)002:16325: zhiga chos thams cad spros pa thams cad dang bral
NK046(mi)002:16326: ba'i zab mo stong pa nyid 'khor gsum dmigsa pa
NK046(mi)002:16327: med pa'i tshul ji tsam du khong du chub cing
NK046(mi)002:16328: rtogs pa de tsam du sems can gyi don du
NK046(mi)002:16329: gus pasa te gus shing shin tu spro ba'i bsod
NK046(mi)002:16331: rang nyid kyis chos thams cad kyi de kho na
NK046(mi)002:16332: nyid snang stong zung 'jug spros pa thams cad dang
NK046(mi)002:16333: bral ba'i mnyam pa nyid mngon sum du byas nas
NK046(mi)002:16334: / dmigas pas zhes dmigs pa bden zhen gyi dug
NK046(mi)002:16335: kho na'i dbang gis khams gsum 'khor ba'i gnas su
NK046(mi)002:16336: phung bar gyur pa'i sems can rnams la de'i gnyen
NK046(mi)002:16337: po chos thams cad dmigs pa med par ston pa'i
NK046(mi)002:16338: stong pa nyid ni yang dag par ston para 'gyur
NK046(mi)002:16340: de ltar 'gyur bar bya'o zhes snying rje chen po bskyed de /
NK046(mi)002:16341: rang nyid kyis chos thams cad bden med du mthong
NK046(mi)002:16342: na gzhan bden 'dzin gyi dbang gis 'khor ba'i sems
NK046(mi)002:16343: can rnams la nam yang mi gtong ba'i snying rje
NK046(mi)002:16344: chen po shugs kyis 'byung zhing 'di nas ji skad
NK046(mi)002:16345: gsungs pa lta bu'i chos brgyad mgo snyom pa dang
NK046(mi)002:16346: gzhan la brtse ba'i snying rje chen po'i sems skye
NK046(mi)002:16347: ba yang chos nyid yin no //
NK046(mi)002:16348: de ltar mngon mtho dang nges legs kyi go 'phang thob par 'dod pa rnams kyis /
NK046(mi)002:16349: sbyin pa dang tshul khrims dang bsgom pa las byung
NK046(mi)002:16350: ba'i dge ba rnams la zhugs na yang phan yon
NK046(mi)002:16352: de bas kyang sgrib pa gnyis kyi gnyen po mthar
NK046(mi)002:16353: thug pa zab mo spros pa kun bral gyi stong
NK046(mi)002:16354: pa nyid rtogs pa'i shes rab ni mchog yin pas
NK046(mi)002:16355: / de bskyed pa'i don du thos bsam rnam dag la 'bad par rigs te /
NK046(mi)002:16357: gang phyir sbyin pas longs spyod dag ni sgrub byed cing //
NK046(mi)002:16358: khrims kyis mtho ris bsgom pas nyon mongs spong byed la //
NK046(mi)002:16359: shes rab nyon mongs shes bya kun spong de yi phyir //
NK046(mi)002:16360: 'di mchog nyid de de yi rgyu yang 'di thos yin //
NK046(mi)002:16363: byang chub semsa dpa'i spyod pa la 'juga pa las /
NK046(mi)002:16364: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o //
NK046(mi)002:16366: // bzhi pa de ltar spel ba'i 'bras bu gzhan don du bsngo ba'i le'u la /
NK046(mi)002:16367: bsngo ba bsdus te bstan pa dang /
NK046(mi)002:16368: rgyas par bshad pa gnyis las /
NK046(mi)002:16370: de la sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams
NK046(mi)002:16371: kyi 'gro don rgya che chung sogs su snang ba
NK046(mi)002:16372: ni sngon gyi thugs bskyed dang smon lam gyi dbang
NK046(mi)002:16373: gis yin la / de yang tshogs gnyis yid bzhin gyi nor bu la //
NK046(mi)002:16374: smon lam gyis byi dor ma byas na //
NK046(mi)002:16376: mjug bsngo ba 'di la nan tan mdzod //
NK046(mi)002:16377: ces pa ltar bsngo ba dang smon lam 'di gnad che la /
NK046(mi)002:16378: de gnyis kyi khyad par rang lugs su dge ba
NK046(mi)002:16379: sgrub nas de sems can gyi don du rdzogs byang
NK046(mi)002:16381: dge rtsa bsags pa dang ma 'brel bar sems can
NK046(mi)002:16382: thams cad rdzogs byang thob par shog cig bsam pa
NK046(mi)002:16383: lta bu smon lam yin la /
NK046(mi)002:16384: de ltar nges par byas te dge rtsa gzhan don du ma bsngosa pa'i skyon /
NK046(mi)002:16385: ji skad du ma bsngosa pa dang log par bsngosa //
NK046(mi)002:16386: gzhan la bsgrags dang 'gyod pa bskyed //
NK046(mi)002:16387: dge ba mdzad pa'i rgyu bzhi yin //
NK046(mi)002:16390: bsngo ba mi zad lam yin phyir //
NK046(mi)002:16391: spel dang bsgyur ba'i chos can yin //
NK046(mi)002:16393: dge rtsa ma bsngosa na zhe sdang sogs dge ba
NK046(mi)002:16394: 'dzad pa'i rgyu mang po yod pas mdzad par 'gyur
NK046(mi)002:16395: la / byang chub tu bsngosa na gang byas pa
NK046(mi)002:16396: dper na chu yi thigs pa rgya mtshor lhung ba
NK046(mi)002:16397: rnams rgya mtsho de gnas kyi bar du mi zad
NK046(mi)002:16398: la / pa bzhin du / byang chub tu yongs
NK046(mi)002:16399: su bsngo ba'i dge ba yang de ma thob kyi
NK046(mi)002:16400: bar du mi zad cing 'phel ba'i sgo nas byang
NK046(mi)002:16401: chub la sbyor bar byed pa ste /
NK046(mi)002:16402: blo gros mi zad pa'i mdo las /
NK046(mi)002:16403: ji ltar chu thig rgya mtsho che nang lhung //
NK046(mi)002:16404: rgya mtsho ma zad bar du de mi zad //
NK046(mi)002:16405: de bzhin byang chub yongs bsngo dge ba yang //
NK046(mi)002:16406: byang chub ma thob bar du de mi zad //
NK046(mi)002:16408: dge ba'i rtsa ba gang byas pa de nyid nam
NK046(mi)002:16409: mkha' dang mnyam pa'i sems can gyi grangs dang mnyam
NK046(mi)002:16411: byang chub chen po sangs rgyas 'thob pa'i rgyu nyid du bsgyur bar byed de /
NK046(mi)002:16412: dper na gser bzang po gser mgar mkhas pas rgyan sogs dngos po'i khyad par /
NK046(mi)002:16415: bzang po sangs rgyas kyi sku dang dbu rgyan du bsgyur bar byed pa lta bu yin no //
NK046(mi)002:16416: bsngo ba de la yang 'khor gsum mi rtog pa'i
NK046(mi)002:16417: shes rab kyis zin pa ni bsngo ba dug med
NK046(mi)002:16418: dang / ma zin na bsngo ba dug can yin la /
NK046(mi)002:16419: bsngo ba dug med nyid la'ang dge rtsa de bsngosa
NK046(mi)002:16420: nas stong nyid kyis rgyas 'debs byed pa ni chad
NK046(mi)002:16421: lta yin pas 'khor gsum mi rtog pa'i bsngo ba
NK046(mi)002:16422: min par kun mkhyen chos rjes gsungs la /
NK046(mi)002:16423: des na 'di ltar bsngo ba po rang dang /
NK046(mi)002:16425: bsngo ba'i yul gsum po snang la rang bzhin med
NK046(mi)002:16426: pa'i 'khor gsum dmigs pa med pa'i tshul gyis bsngo
NK046(mi)002:16427: dgos la / 'khor gsum dmigs med kyi bsngo ba de lta bu mi shes shing ma 'ongs na /
NK046(mi)002:16428: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang 'jam dpal dbyangs
NK046(mi)002:16429: dang kun tu bzang po la sogs pas ji ltar
NK046(mi)002:16430: bsngo bar mdzad pa de bzhin du bdag gis kyang
NK046(mi)002:16431: dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di dag yongs su bsngo bar
NK046(mi)002:16432: bgyi zhing bsngo'o snyam nas ltung bshags dang bzang spyod
NK046(mi)002:16433: lta bu'am / dus gsum gshegs pa'i rgyal ba sogs dang /
NK046(mi)002:16434: 'jam dpal dpa' bo la sogs pa brjod na des
NK046(mi)002:16435: bsngo bar dug med 'khor gsum dmigs med kyi bsngo
NK046(mi)002:16436: ba rjes mthun pa tsam 'ong bar mkhas pa rnams
NK046(mi)002:16437: gsungs pas na 'di shin tu gal che ba'i gnad
NK046(mi)002:16438: yin no // de la bsngo ba dang smon lam
NK046(mi)002:16439: rang gis byas shing btab nas gzhan gang zag dam
NK046(mi)002:16440: pa bden pa mthong ba dang tshul khrims shin tu
NK046(mi)002:16441: rnam par dag pa dag gis de la mthun 'gyur
NK046(mi)002:16442: yin no // mdzad dgos la / bsngo ba dang
NK046(mi)002:16443: smon lam de'ang rang rang gis ma byas na gzhan
NK046(mi)002:16444: dag gis byas pas mi 'ong bar gsungs /
NK046(mi)002:16445: bsngo rgyu'i dge rtsa yang rang gi sems kyis thong nas bsngo dgos te /
NK046(mi)002:16446: sngon yangs ba can pa rnams sum cu rtsa gsum
NK046(mi)002:16447: pa'i lha'i dper 'os pa'i bde skyid longs spyod dang
NK046(mi)002:16448: ldan pa rnams kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'khor
NK046(mi)002:16449: dang bcas pa sang gdugs tshod la spyan drangs pa'i
NK046(mi)002:16450: tshe de'i rjes su yongs pa can pa de dag
NK046(mi)002:16451: ga pha ma rnams ser sna'i dbang gis yi dwags
NK046(mi)002:16452: su skyes pa rnams 'ong nas sang khyed rnams kyis
NK046(mi)002:16453: yon bsngo bdag cag gi don du mdzod cig ces
NK046(mi)002:16454: zhus pa'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis ci'i phyir khyed
NK046(mi)002:16455: cag gi don du yon bsngo mdzad gsungs pa na
NK046(mi)002:16456: de dag gis bdag cag yangs pa can pa 'di
NK046(mi)002:16457: dag gi pha ma rnams yin no zhus pas 'o
NK046(mi)002:16458: na sang yangs pa can nyid du shog dang yon
NK046(mi)002:16459: bsngo'o gsungs / yi dwags de rnams kyis ngo tsha bas 'ong mi phod do zhus tshe /
NK046(mi)002:16460: khyed cag las ngan bsags tshe ngo mi tsha na da lus ngan blangs bas ngo ci zhig tsha /
NK046(mi)002:16461: 'ong na yon bsngo la ma 'ongs na ni mi
NK046(mi)002:16462: bsngo zhes gsungs pas der 'ong bar zhus pa bzhin
NK046(mi)002:16463: der 'ong ba na yangs pa can pa rnams shin
NK046(mi)002:16464: tu 'jigs shing skrag pa na de bzhin gshegs pas
NK046(mi)002:16465: de dag la 'di dag khyed cag gi pha ma
NK046(mi)002:16466: ser snas yi dwags su skyes pa rnams yin pas
NK046(mi)002:16467: yon bsngo zhu ru 'ong bas khyed cag gi yon
NK046(mi)002:16468: 'di rnams la bsngo'am gsungs pa na de dag gis
NK046(mi)002:16469: kyang bsngo'o // shin tu bsngo'o zhes pa ltar bsngo
NK046(mi)002:16470: rgyu'i dge rtsa sems kyis thong nas bsngo dgos so
NK046(mi)002:16471: kyang bsngo'o // // de lta na'ang khyad par gsang
NK046(mi)002:16472: sngags kyi dam tshig nyams pa rnams kyis smon lam
NK046(mi)002:16473: dang bsrung ba gang byas pa thams cad phyin ci
NK046(mi)002:16475: dper na tshe ring bar shog cig ces brjod na
NK046(mi)002:16476: tshe thung bar 'gyur ba la sogs pa lta bu
NK046(mi)002:16477: yin pas bsrung ba thams cad mthu dang dmod par
NK046(mi)002:16478: 'gyur par gsungs pas na des rang don du'ang smon
NK046(mi)002:16479: lam btab pa sogs kyang ji yin mi shes gsungs
NK046(mi)002:16480: / de la bsngo ba'i dpang po mdun gyi nam
NK046(mi)002:16481: mkhar phyogs bcu dus gsum gyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan
NK046(mi)002:16482: 'das sras byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dang bcas pa
NK046(mi)002:16483: mngon sum bzhin du spyan drangs te bzhugs par bsam
NK046(mi)002:16484: / pa'am yang na / byang chub spyod la dad pa'i stobs dag gis //
NK046(mi)002:16485: rgyal ba thams cad yid kyis mngon sum du //
NK046(mi)002:16487: rdul gcig steng na rdul snyed sangs rgyas rnams //
NK046(mi)002:16488: sangs rgyas sras kyi dbus na bzhugs pa dag /
NK046(mi)002:16489: de ltar chos kyi dbyings rnams ma lus pa //
NK046(mi)002:16490: thams cad rgya ba dag gis gang par mos //
NK046(mi)002:16491: zhes pa ltar bsngo ba'i dpang por bsam nas /
NK046(mi)002:16492: bsngo ba po sus bsngo na sngon zhi ba lha dang da lta rang re badga gis /
NK046(mi)002:16493: ci bsngo na zhi ba lhas byang chub sems dpa'i
NK046(mi)002:16494: spyod pa bsam pa byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed
NK046(mi)002:16495: pa dang sbyor ba pha rol du phyin pa drug
NK046(mi)002:16496: gi nyams len la 'jug pa yi tshul rnams para
NK046(mi)002:16497: bsam shing brtsams pa yi dge ba /
NK046(mi)002:16498: da lta rang res yi ge 'bri mchod sbyin sogs
NK046(mi)002:16499: chos spyod bcu'i sgo nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod
NK046(mi)002:16500: pa la 'jug pa 'di nyid la gang brtsam pa'i
NK046(mi)002:16501: dge ba ste / de yang sngon zhi ba lhas
NK046(mi)002:16502: spyod 'jug 'di la dus gsum du zhugs pa'i dge
NK046(mi)002:16503: rtsa thams cad 'khor gsum dmigs med kyis bsngosa zin
NK046(mi)002:16504: pas na rang re'i dge ba yang slob dpon gyis
NK046(mi)002:16506: rang re rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyang
NK046(mi)002:16507: zhi ba lha nyid kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang
NK046(mi)002:16508: lhan gcig tu bsres te dper na rgya mtsho chen
NK046(mi)002:16509: po la chu thig bsres pa bzhin du bsngo dgos
NK046(mi)002:16510: gsungs / mdor na spyod 'jug la brtson pa'i dge
NK046(mi)002:16511: ba gang yin pa 'dis mtshon te rang gzhan rnams
NK046(mi)002:16512: kyis dus gsum bsag yod kyi dge ba thams cad
NK046(mi)002:16513: gcig tu bsdus shing bsdum pa des zhes de yi
NK046(mi)002:16514: mthu la brten nas gang gi ched du bsngo ba
NK046(mi)002:16515: ma nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i 'gro ba sems can
NK046(mi)002:16516: thams cad kun gyi don du rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
NK046(mi)002:16517: kyi go 'phang mchog nyid 'thob pa'i ched du bsam
NK046(mi)002:16518: pa byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed de sbyor ba
NK046(mi)002:16519: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa sbyin sogs pha rol
NK046(mi)002:16520: du phyin pa drug la yang dag par 'jug para
NK046(mi)002:16522: de ltar rgyu med na 'bras bu byang chub chen
NK046(mi)002:16523: po mi 'byung bas na 'bras bu byang chub chen
NK046(mi)002:16524: po thob pa'i don du bsngosa pa dang 'dir de'i
NK046(mi)002:16525: rgyu la spyod pa'i don du bsngosa pa gnyis don
NK046(mi)002:16526: 'dra'o // des na 'gro ba sems can thams cad
NK046(mi)002:16527: kyi rgyu byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thog mtha'
NK046(mi)002:16528: bar du dge ba la spyad nas phan tshun chags
NK046(mi)002:16529: sdang la sogs pas 'thab rtsod la sogs pa ci
NK046(mi)002:16530: yang med pas bde ba dang ldan par shog cig
NK046(mi)002:16531: ces smon lam dang 'brel ba dang /
NK046(mi)002:16532: ldan na ci ma rung zhes 'dun pa dang 'brel ba dang /
NK046(mi)002:16533: ldan pa zhig bdag gis bya'o zhes dam bca' dang 'brel ba dang /
NK046(mi)002:16534: de ltar bdag gis byed nus pa zhig bla ma
NK046(mi)002:16535: dkon mchog gsum gyis byin gyis rlobs shig ces gsol
NK046(mi)002:16536: 'debs dang 'brel ba ste de ltar yid la bsam
NK046(mi)002:16537: ste ngag gis brjod pas mdun gyi bla ma rgyal
NK046(mi)002:16538: ba sras bcas kyi gsungs tshangs pa'i dbyangs kyis de
NK046(mi)002:16539: de bzhin du 'grub par gyur cig ces mthun 'gyur
NK046(mi)002:16540: mdzad pas sems can thams cad bde ba dang ldan
NK046(mi)002:16542: de bzhin du sdug bsngal dang bral bar shog cig
NK046(mi)002:16543: la sogs pa smon 'dun dam bca' gsol 'debs dang
NK046(mi)002:16544: de la mthun 'gyur dang bcas pa 'di rnams 'og
NK046(mi)002:16545: ma'i don thams cad la'ang sbyar bar bya dgos so
NK046(mi)002:16546: // de yang mdo sde rgyan las /
NK046(mi)002:16547: de yi rtsa ba snying rjer 'dod //
NK046(mi)002:16548: snying rje'i chu ba byams pa ste //
NK046(mi)002:16549: des dper na sa 'og gi shing gi chu ba'am
NK046(mi)002:16550: rtsa rgyus nas chu'i rlan drangs nas sdong po'i rtsa
NK046(mi)002:16551: ba nas zhugs te de'i yal ga lo 'dab rgyas
NK046(mi)002:16552: pa ltar sems can rnams la yid 'ong gi byams
NK046(mi)002:16553: pa skyes na sdug bsngal dang bral 'dod kyi snying
NK046(mi)002:16554: rje skye bas des kun rdzob dang don dam pa'i
NK046(mi)002:16555: byang chub kyi sems gnyis rgyas par byed cing /
NK046(mi)002:16556: de dang bral na dpal sa ra ha ba'i do ha las /
NK046(mi)002:16557: snying rje dang bral stong pa nyid lta ba //
NK046(mi)002:16558: de yis lam mchog rnyed pa ma yin te //
NK046(mi)002:16560: des na bsngo ba'i le'u 'di'i don thams cad la
NK046(mi)002:16561: byams dang snying rje'i dmigs rnam dngos su tshig zin
NK046(mi)002:16562: yod med gang yin kyang gnyis ka sbyar te bsgom
NK046(mi)002:16563: pa ni 'di'i gzhung thams cad las gal cher bar
NK046(mi)002:16564: gsungs / de ltar byams pa bsgom pa'i phan yon /
NK046(mi)002:16565: sangs rgyas thams cad mchod las khyad par du 'phags pa dang /
NK046(mi)002:16566: byams chos yon tan brgyad thob pa'ang sngon rgyal po
NK046(mi)002:16567: byams pa'i stobs kyis byams pa bsgom pas gnod sbyin
NK046(mi)002:16568: spun lngas 'dzam gling gi sems can thams cad la
NK046(mi)002:16569: gnod ma nus par gsungs pa la sogs pa dang
NK046(mi)002:16570: / snying rje bsgom pa'i phan yon snying rje bsgom
NK046(mi)002:16571: pas lta ba zab mo rnams par dag pa rgyud
NK046(mi)002:16572: / la skye ste / bla ma d+ha rma rak+sha lta bu dang /
NK046(mi)002:16573: lta ba rnam dag rgyud la skye ba la sogs
NK046(mi)002:16574: pa'i gegs sdig pa 'dag pa dang yi dam lha'i
NK046(mi)002:16575: zhal mthong ba 'phags pa thogs med lta bu dang
NK046(mi)002:16576: / sngon rgyal po 'od chen pos snying rje bsgom
NK046(mi)002:16577: pas 'dzam gling gi sems can gyi rgyud la zhe
NK046(mi)002:16578: sdang skye bar ma gyur bar gsungs pa dang /
NK046(mi)002:16580: pu to bas khrom tshogs pa stong phrag mang po la chos bstan pa dang /
NK046(mi)002:16581: dgon pa pas mi med dben pa'i ri khrod du bsgom pa 'ba' zhig mdzad pa dang /
NK046(mi)002:16582: phu chung bas sku gsung thugs kyi rten gsum rgya chen po mang po bzhengs pa dang /
NK046(mi)002:16583: khams pa lung pas grog stong ste chu med pa'i
NK046(mi)002:16584: lung pa rer song nas bshum pa 'ba' zhig mdzad
NK046(mi)002:16585: pa rnams rim par 'brom ston pa la zhus pa
NK046(mi)002:16586: na khams pa lung pa la phyag thal mo sbyar
NK046(mi)002:16587: te basngagasa brjod lhag par mdzad pa lta bu la
NK046(mi)002:16588: sogs pa yin pas snying rje las lhag pa'i dam
NK046(mi)002:16589: pa'i chos med / byams snying rje gnyis spel mar
NK046(mi)002:16590: bsgom pas byams pa bsgom pas gegs sems rgod pa
NK046(mi)002:16591: pa'i chos med / sogs dang / snying rje bsgom
NK046(mi)002:16592: pas gegs sems skyo bar gyur nas snying rlung ldang
NK046(mi)002:16593: pa la sogs pa gcig gegs gcig gis sel bar
NK046(mi)002:16594: pa'i chos med / sogs dang / byed do //
NK046(mi)002:16595: de ltar byams pa dang snying rje 'di bsgom na
NK046(mi)002:16596: rab 'dzam bu'i gling la sogs pa'i sems can la
NK046(mi)002:16597: nye bar 'tshe ba thams cad bsrung thub pa dang
NK046(mi)002:16598: pa'i chos med / sogs dang / byed do //
NK046(mi)002:16599: / de lta min na'ang yul ljongs sogs phyogs re
NK046(mi)002:16600: pa'i chos med / sogs dang / byed do //
NK046(mi)002:16601: / tsam dang / tha na'ang rang nyid nyer 'tshe
NK046(mi)002:16602: las nges par bsrung thub par gsungs /
NK046(mi)002:16603: gnyis pa la gzhan don phan pa dang bde ba'i rgyur bsngo ba /
NK046(mi)002:16604: rang don byang chub spyod pa'i rgyur bsngo ba /
NK046(mi)002:16605: gnyis don bstan pa dar rgyas su bsngo ba dang gsum las /
NK046(mi)002:16606: dang po la dman pa sdug bsngal dang bral bar bsngo ba /
NK046(mi)002:16607: mchog gi dgongs pa rdzogs par bsngo ba dang gnyis las /
NK046(mi)002:16609: khams gsum spyi la khyab pa'i sdug bsngal dang bral bar bsngo ba /
NK046(mi)002:16610: ngan song gsum sogs 'gro ba so so'i sdug bsngal
NK046(mi)002:16611: bye brag dang bral bar bsngo ba dang gnyis las
NK046(mi)002:16614: sdug bsngal gyi sdug bsngal dang bral bar bsngo ba
NK046(mi)002:16615: phyogsa bcu mtha' yas pa rnams kun na sems can
NK046(mi)002:16616: lus dang semsa rlung mkhris bad kan la sogs pas
NK046(mi)002:16617: sdug bsngal dang snying rlung la sogs yid mi bde
NK046(mi)002:16618: ba'i nad sna tshogs kyis mnar bar gyur pa ji
NK046(mi)002:16619: snyed yod pa de dag thams cad badga gi spyod
NK046(mi)002:16620: 'jug la thos bsam bsgom pa sogs byas pa'i bsod
NK046(mi)002:16621: namas dge ba'i stobs kyis dus da lta 'dug sa
NK046(mi)002:16622: 'di ru skad cig yud tsam nyid la sems can
NK046(mi)002:16623: de dag thams cad kyi rgyu sdig pa dang 'bras
NK046(mi)002:16624: bu sdug bsngal dang bral bar gyur cig sogs gong
NK046(mi)002:16625: bzhin bral 'dod kyi snying rje dang lus bde ba
NK046(mi)002:16626: dang sems dag'a ba phun sum tshogs pa rgya mtsho
NK046(mi)002:16627: ltar mtha' yas pa thob cing ldan para shog cig
NK046(mi)002:16628: sogs gong bzhin ldan 'dod kyi byams pa dang /
NK046(mi)002:16629: de bzhin du 'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal dang bral bar
NK046(mi)002:16630: bsngo ba bdag gi dge ba'i mthu yis 'jig rten
NK046(mi)002:16631: gyi khams na gnas skabs su stobs 'byor mnga' thang
NK046(mi)002:16632: che bas lus sems bde dga' dang ldan pa'i sems
NK046(mi)002:16633: can de dag thams cad 'khora ba ru gnas pa
NK046(mi)002:16634: ji srid pa de srid du nam yanga bde dga'
NK046(mi)002:16635: de las nyams par ma gyur cig ces byams pa
NK046(mi)002:16636: dang snying rje'ang bsgom par bya'o //
NK046(mi)002:16637: zag bcas nyer len gyi phung po yod pa de
NK046(mi)002:16638: srid du khyab pa 'du byed kyi sdug bsngal dang
NK046(mi)002:16639: mi 'bral bar sdug bsngal de dang bral bar bsngo
NK046(mi)002:16640: ba mkha' khyab kyi 'gro ba mtha' yas pa rnams
NK046(mi)002:16641: zag bcas khyab pa 'du byed kyi sdug bsngal thams
NK046(mi)002:16642: cad dang bral ba'i byang chub sems dpa' yi zag
NK046(mi)002:16643: pa med pa'i mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das
NK046(mi)002:16644: pa'i bde dga' rgya che ba rgyun mi 'achada pa
NK046(mi)002:16645: thob par shog cig ces byams dang snying rje gong
NK046(mi)002:16647: de ltar rgyu mi dge ba las 'bras bu sdug
NK046(mi)002:16648: bsngal 'byung ba la bsam te rgyu 'bras la yid
NK046(mi)002:16650: 'khor ba mtho dman gang du skyes kyang sdug bsngal
NK046(mi)002:16651: las ma 'das pa'i tshul shes nas 'khor bar zhen
NK046(mi)002:16653: sdug bsngal gyis mnar ba'i sems can de thams cad
NK046(mi)002:16654: rang gi pha mar ma gyur pa gcig kyang med
NK046(mi)002:16655: par bsams na gzhan phan don gnyer gyi blo 'byung
NK046(mi)002:16656: bas na skyes bu gsum gyi lam yang 'dir tshang
NK046(mi)002:16657: ba yin no // gnyis pa ngan song gsum sogs
NK046(mi)002:16658: 'gro ba so so'i sdug bsngal bye brag dang bral
NK046(mi)002:16660: dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal bral bar bsngo ba phyogs bcu'i
NK046(mi)002:16661: 'jiga rten gyi khamsa ma lus pa na rgyu zhe
NK046(mi)002:16662: sdang la sogs pa'i las ngan sgrub pa dang /
NK046(mi)002:16663: de'i 'bras bu tsha grang dang gcod 'dral la sogs
NK046(mi)002:16664: pa'i sdug bsngal dpag med myong ba'i dmyal ba dag
NK046(mi)002:16665: ni ris mi 'dra ba gang dag ji snyed yod
NK046(mi)002:16666: pa rnams bdag gi dge ba'i stobs kyis gnas de
NK046(mi)002:16667: dag tu ni dmyal ba'i lus can sems can mtha'
NK046(mi)002:16668: yas pa rnams tshor ba sdug bsngal gyi sgra tsam
NK046(mi)002:16669: yang med pa'i nub phyogs bde ba can gyi zhing
NK046(mi)002:16670: khams ltar phyi snod kyi 'jig rten thams cad rnam
NK046(mi)002:16671: par dag pa rin po che'i rang bzhin bde 'jam
NK046(mi)002:16672: yangs pa phun sum tshogs par nang bcud kyi 'jig
NK046(mi)002:16673: rten thams cad rnam par dag pa gshin rje chos
NK046(mi)002:16674: kyi rgyal po sangs rgyas 'od dpag med pa dang
NK046(mi)002:16675: / gshin rje'i las mkhan rnams spyan ras gzigs dang
NK046(mi)002:16676: mthu chen thob la sogs pa'i nye sras brgyad dang
NK046(mi)002:16677: dmyal ba'i sems can kun kyang mtshan dpes ba ba'i
NK046(mi)002:16678: rgyal sras byang chub sems dpa' theg pa chen po'i
NK046(mi)002:16679: chos la longs spyod cing ci 'dod 'bad med du
NK046(mi)002:16680: 'byung ba la sogs pa'i bde bas te phun sum
NK046(mi)002:16681: tshogs pa'i bde ba chen pos dga' ba rgya chen
NK046(mi)002:16682: po dang ldan par shoga ces dang /
NK046(mi)002:16683: rgyu zhe sdang la sogs pa'i las ngan sgrub pa
NK046(mi)002:16684: po rnams kyis kyang las ngan de spangs nas bde
NK046(mi)002:16685: ba can du skye ba'i rgyu sangs rgyas 'od dpag
NK046(mi)002:16686: med yid la byed cing mtshan brjod pa la sogs
NK046(mi)002:16687: pa yang dag par sgrub par shog cig ces sdug
NK046(mi)002:16688: bsngal rgyu 'bras dang bral 'dod kyi snying rje dang
NK046(mi)002:16689: bde ba rgyu 'bras dang ldan 'dod kyi byams pa
NK046(mi)002:16690: bsgom pa bya'o // mdor na dmyal ba tsha grang
NK046(mi)002:16691: la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal rang thog tu blangs nas
NK046(mi)002:16692: bsgom ste rang gis der skye ba'i las ngan bsags
NK046(mi)002:16694: der skyes pa thams cad rang rang gi pha mar
NK046(mi)002:16695: shes pas snying rje bsgom zhing rgyal ba sras bcas
NK046(mi)002:16696: ra mda' bskul zhing gsol ba 'debs pa dang /
NK046(mi)002:16697: dmyal bar skye ba'i rgyu bsgrub pa rnams la'ang byams
NK046(mi)002:16698: dang snying rje gong du bstan pa ltar bsgom zhing
NK046(mi)002:16699: smon lam sogs brjod par bya'o //
NK046(mi)002:16700: grang dmyal du skye ba'i rgyu chos kyi gdongs dar sogs blang ba dang /
NK046(mi)002:16701: pha ma sogs gzhan gyi gos bshus pa la sogs
NK046(mi)002:16702: pa'i 'bras bu grang dmyal rnams ni gzhi dang khor
NK046(mi)002:16703: yug thams cad gangs ri dang chab rom gyi khrod
NK046(mi)002:16704: phyogs thams cad kyi bu yug kha 'thab pa'i bar
NK046(mi)002:16705: du nyi zla la sogs pa'i snang ba dang bral
NK046(mi)002:16706: ba'i mun nag chen po'i nang du lus shin tu
NK046(mi)002:16707: gzhon sha can reg tu mi bzod pa gos med
NK046(mi)002:16708: gcer bu gong ma las 'og ma sdug bsngal shin
NK046(mi)002:16709: tu che ba shin tu grang bas lus la chu
NK046(mi)002:16710: bur byung ba chu bur can dang /
NK046(mi)002:16711: de rdol nas rmar song ba chu bur rdol ba can dang /
NK046(mi)002:16712: smre sngags 'don pas a chu chu zer ba dang /
NK046(mi)002:16713: skad kyi gdang chags pas shugs ring gi kyi hud 'don pa dang /
NK046(mi)002:16715: phyi'i lpags pa sngon por song ste bzhi tshal dugs pa ut+pala ltar gas pa dang /
NK046(mi)002:16716: sha'u sngo dmar phyir thon te brgyad tshal sogs su gas pa pad+ma ltar gas pa dang /
NK046(mi)002:16717: de yang dmar nag tu gyur te bargya'am stong la
NK046(mi)002:16718: sogs par gas pa pad+ma ltar cher gas pa'i rma
NK046(mi)002:16719: nang du srin bu lcags kyi mchu can mang po
NK046(mi)002:16720: zhugs nas za ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal mi
NK046(mi)002:16722: tshe tshad kyi khyad par yul ma g+ha d+h+aa'i bre
NK046(mi)002:16723: til gyis gang ba brgyad cu tham pas gang ba'i
NK046(mi)002:16724: bang ba nas lo brgya brgya na til re re
NK046(mi)002:16725: phyung bas zad par gyur ba na ni chu bur
NK046(mi)002:16726: can gyi tshe tshad yin la /
NK046(mi)002:16727: chu bur rdol ba sogs phyi ma phyi ma rnams
NK046(mi)002:16728: ni snga ma snga ma las nyi shu 'gyur gyis
NK046(mi)002:16729: ring ba ste de lta bu'i grang bas shin tu
NK046(mi)002:16730: nyam thag cing sdug bsngal ba'i sems can dmyal ba
NK046(mi)002:16731: pa rnams la sdug bsngal dang bral 'dod kyi snying
NK046(mi)002:16732: rje dang bdag gi dge ba'i stobs kyis yid du
NK046(mi)002:16733: 'ong ba'i me dang nyi ma la sogs pa'i 'od
NK046(mi)002:16734: zer gyis chab rom dang gangs ri sogs lhag med
NK046(mi)002:16735: du zhu zhing lha yul lta bur gyur te dro
NK046(mi)002:16736: 'jam yangs pa'i bde ba chen po thob par shog
NK046(mi)002:16737: cig / rgyu zhe sdang la sogs pa'i 'bras bu
NK046(mi)002:16738: tsha dmyal rnams ni gzhi dang khong yug thams cad
NK046(mi)002:16739: lcags bsreg gi rang bzhin la me lce lhab lhab
NK046(mi)002:16740: tu 'bar zhing me stag gi tsh+wa tsh+wa tho ro
NK046(mi)002:16741: ro 'phro ba'i me bskal pa 'jig pa'i me bas
NK046(mi)002:16742: yang sos kyi me tsha zhing de bas kyang 'og
NK046(mi)002:16743: ma 'og ma rnams bdun 'gyur ram bzhi 'gyur du
NK046(mi)002:16747: mtshams med lnga byas pa'i lus la dpag tshad lnga yod pa dang /
NK046(mi)002:16749: mtshams med brgyad byas pa'i lus la dpag tshad brgyad khri yod pa dang /
NK046(mi)002:16751: theg chen la bskur ba btab pa'i lce la'ang dpag
NK046(mi)002:16752: tshad gsum yod pa la sogs pa'i gzhon sha can
NK046(mi)002:16753: reg tu mi bzod pa yang sos pa rnams ni
NK046(mi)002:16754: mtshon rnon lag tu byung ste phan tshun bsnun pas
NK046(mi)002:16755: brgyal zhing 'gyel ba na nam mkha' nas khyed rnams
NK046(mi)002:16756: yang sos par gyur cig ces pa'i sgra byung ba'am
NK046(mi)002:16757: / rlung grang mo langs pas slar yang sos te
NK046(mi)002:16758: snga ma ltar sdug bsngal mi bzad pa myong ba
NK046(mi)002:16759: / dang / thig nag pa rnams ni lus la
NK046(mi)002:16760: dmyal srung rnams kyis thig nag po brgyad dang bcu
NK046(mi)002:16761: drug la sogs pa btab nas sog le me 'bar
NK046(mi)002:16762: bas gshogs pas sdug bsngal ba dang /
NK046(mi)002:16763: bsdus 'joms pa rnams ni lcags kyi ri chen po
NK046(mi)002:16764: ra dang lug la sogs pa'i gdong ba can gyi
NK046(mi)002:16765: bar ram lcags kyi gtun khung du bsdus shing 'joms
NK046(mi)002:16766: pa la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal ba dang /
NK046(mi)002:16767: ngu 'bod ni lcags kyi khang ba me 'bar ba sgo med par bsreg pas sdug bsngal dang /
NK046(mi)002:16768: ngu 'bod chen po lcags kyi khang pa me 'bar
NK046(mi)002:16769: ba sgo med pa gnyis rim du bsreg pas sdug
NK046(mi)002:16770: bsngal ba dang / tsha ba ni lcags kyi gsal
NK046(mi)002:16771: shing me 'bar bas gshang lam nas spyi bo'i bar
NK046(mi)002:16772: phug ste kha sna sogs dang ba spu'i khung bu
NK046(mi)002:16773: thams cad nas me 'bar ba la sogs pa'i sdug
NK046(mi)002:16774: bsngal ba dang / bsngal ba dang / rab tu
NK046(mi)002:16775: tsha ba ni lcags kyi gsal shing me rab tu
NK046(mi)002:16776: 'bar ba rtse gsum pas gshang lam dang rkang mthil
NK046(mi)002:16777: nas spyi bo dang phrag pa gnyis su phug ste
NK046(mi)002:16778: dbang po'i sgo sogs nas me 'bar ba dang /
NK046(mi)002:16779: lcags leb me 'bar bas lus la kun nas dkris
NK046(mi)002:16780: par byed pa la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal ba dang
NK046(mi)002:16781: / mnar med pa ni lcags bsreg gi sol me
NK046(mi)002:16782: rab tu 'bar bas lus dang me so sor snang
NK046(mi)002:16783: du med pa me yi phung po 'ba' zhig tu
NK046(mi)002:16784: snang ba la shin tu nyam thag pas skad 'byin
NK046(mi)002:16785: pa las sems can du mngon pa tsam las med
NK046(mi)002:16786: pa la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal dpag tu med pa
NK046(mi)002:16788: tshe tshad kyang rgyal chen rigs bzhi bas mi lo
NK046(mi)002:16789: lnga bcu la nyin zhag gcig tu byas pa'i rang
NK046(mi)002:16790: lo lnga brgya thub pa nas gong ma bzhi po
NK046(mi)002:16791: rim par gnyis 'gyur gyis gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pas
NK046(mi)002:16792: mi lo stong drug brgya la zhag gcig tu byas
NK046(mi)002:16793: pa'i rang lo khri drug stong thub pa rnams gzhir
NK046(mi)002:16794: byas te yang sos pas rgyal chen rigs bzhi'i tshe
NK046(mi)002:16795: tshad la zhag gcig tu byas pa'i rang lo lnga
NK046(mi)002:16797: tsha bas gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa'i tshe tshad la
NK046(mi)002:16798: zhag gcig tu byas pa'i lo chen po khri drug
NK046(mi)002:16800: rab tu tsha bas bar bskal phyed dang /
NK046(mi)002:16801: mnar ma pas bar bskal gcig thub pas de dang
NK046(mi)002:16802: de'i bar du sdug bsngal drag po rgyun mi chad
NK046(mi)002:16803: par myong bar 'gyur ba'i tshe dmyal rnams la byang
NK046(mi)002:16804: chub sems dpa'i ste byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
NK046(mi)002:16805: thugs bskyed dang smon lam gyi sprin phung chena po
NK046(mi)002:16806: nam mkhar 'khrigs pa las byung ba'i chu bo rgya
NK046(mi)002:16807: mtsho chen po ltar phun sum tshogs pa mtha'a yasa
NK046(mi)002:16808: pa'i char ba rnams kyis tsha bas shin tu nyam
NK046(mi)002:16809: thag cing sdug bsngal ba'i tsha dmyal ba rnams sdug
NK046(mi)002:16810: bsngal thams cad dang bral zhing rtag tu bsila bar
NK046(mi)002:16811: te bsil zhing 'jam pa'i bde skyid dang ldan par
NK046(mi)002:16812: shog cig / nye 'khor lhag pa bcu drug ces /
NK046(mi)002:16815: spu gri'i thang dang ral gri lo ma'i nags tshal /
NK046(mi)002:16816: shal ma l+ai'i shing ste 'di gsum mtshon char 'dra bas gcig tu byas pa dang /
NK046(mi)002:16817: thal tshan gyi chu bo dang bzhi tsha dmyal brgyad
NK046(mi)002:16818: po thams cad kyi phyogs bzhi po re re na
NK046(mi)002:16819: bzhi bzhi yod pas bcu drug ste /
NK046(mi)002:16820: dmyal me las thar te rgyang ring po nas nags
NK046(mi)002:16821: tshal sngon po mthong bas grib ma ra bsnyegs te
NK046(mi)002:16822: phyin pa na khyi sre bo sogs kyis ded cing
NK046(mi)002:16823: za ba dang ral gri so gnyis rnon pos lus
NK046(mi)002:16824: bcad gtub kyis sdug bsngal bar byed pa'i ral gri
NK046(mi)002:16825: lo ma'i nagsa tshal 'jigs su rung ba de yang
NK046(mi)002:16826: da ni bdag gi dge ba'i stobs kyis dmyal ba
NK046(mi)002:16827: de rnams la sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i grong khyer
NK046(mi)002:16828: blta na sdug gi shar na shing rta sna tshogs
NK046(mi)002:16829: pa'i tshal dang / lho na 'dres pa'i tshal /
NK046(mi)002:16830: nub na dga' ba'i tshal la sogs pa lha'i dbang
NK046(mi)002:16831: po'i skyed mos tshal lta bu'i dag'a tshal sdug gur
NK046(mi)002:16832: te yid du 'ong ba'i bde skyid phun sum tshogs
NK046(mi)002:16833: pa dang ldan par shog cig /
NK046(mi)002:16834: rgyu gtso bo 'dod log spyod pa la sogs pa'i
NK046(mi)002:16835: 'bras bu shal ma ri yi zhes pa ri la
NK046(mi)002:16836: shing shal ma li zhes pa'i sdong po lcags kyi
NK046(mi)002:16837: tsher ma sor bcu drug pa'i drung du /
NK046(mi)002:16838: khyi sre bo lus ri tsam pa skad 'brag ltar che ba /
NK046(mi)002:16839: mche ba gangs ri ltar gtsigs pa /
NK046(mi)002:16841: rnga ma sog le ltar rno bas ded nas tsher
NK046(mi)002:16842: mas phug cing mgo nas rkang pa'i bar za bar
NK046(mi)002:16843: byed pa dang / ri de'i rtse mo sngar dga'
NK046(mi)002:16844: gdung che ba'i grogs des 'bod par mthong nas der
NK046(mi)002:16845: phyin pas kh+aa dang bya rgod sogs kyis mig 'bru
NK046(mi)002:16846: zheng lce gcod pa la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal ba
NK046(mi)002:16847: byed pa dang / dang / rtser lcags kyi skyes
NK046(mi)002:16848: pa dang bud med sogs kyis 'khyud cing bsdam pas
NK046(mi)002:16849: glo snying khar thon pa dang /
NK046(mi)002:16850: mgo bo khar bcug ste bldad pas 'gram phug gnyis nas klad pa skya tsir gyis 'ong zhing /
NK046(mi)002:16851: yang rtsa ba nas 'bod pa sogs sngar ltar sdug
NK046(mi)002:16852: bsngal bar 'gyur ba la bral 'dod kyi snying rje
NK046(mi)002:16853: dang sdong po de yang yongs 'dus brtol gyi ljon
NK046(mi)002:16854: pa las chos dang mthun pa'i dgos 'dod 'byung ba'i
NK046(mi)002:16855: dpag bsam gyi shing nyid du 'khrungsa shing longs spyod
NK046(mi)002:16856: phun sum tshogs pa'i gnas su 'gyur bar shog cig
NK046(mi)002:16857: ces ldan 'dod kyi byams pa dang /
NK046(mi)002:16859: rgyu gtso bo 'dod chags kyi 'bras bu chu klung
NK046(mi)002:16860: mthong nas phyin pas ro myags kyi 'dam rdzab chen
NK046(mi)002:16861: por chud pa'i sdug bsngal dang /
NK046(mi)002:16862: rgyu gtso bo zhe sdang gi 'bras bu grib ma
NK046(mi)002:16863: nag ngam me ba mthong nas dga' ste phyin pas
NK046(mi)002:16864: me ma mur gyi 'ob tu chud pa'i sdug bsngal
NK046(mi)002:16865: de gnyis dang bral te dwangs bsil yid 'ong sman
NK046(mi)002:16866: sna lnga'i dri dang ro nus phun sum tshogs pa
NK046(mi)002:16868: gzhan yang nyi tshe ba'i dmyal ba sgo dang ka
NK046(mi)002:16869: ba thab dang thag pa la sogs pa'i rnam pa'i
NK046(mi)002:16870: sdug bsngal ba rnams la'ang de dang bral zhing bde
NK046(mi)002:16871: ba dang ldan par shog cig /
NK046(mi)002:16872: yid du 'ong ba'i bya mthinga ril dang ngur ba
NK046(mi)002:16873: dag dang ngang pa dang bzhad la sogas pa'i bya
NK046(mi)002:16874: rigs dur ltar dkar zhing gser ltar ser ba la
NK046(mi)002:16875: sogs pa'i mdzes pa'i spu sdug ngoms shing shin tu
NK046(mi)002:16876: skad snyan pa 'byin cing rtse dgas 'phur lding g.yo
NK046(mi)002:16877: zhing zlos gar sna tshogs pa byed pas dmyal ba'i
NK046(mi)002:16878: gnas thams cad mdzesa shing yid du 'ong bar gyur
NK046(mi)002:16879: cig / me tog pad+ma dang ut+pala la sogs pa
NK046(mi)002:16880: dri bsung che zhing kha dog sna tshogs dang ldan
NK046(mi)002:16881: pa'i mtsho yid du 'ong ba yan lag brgyad dang
NK046(mi)002:16882: ldan pa dag gis dmyal ba'i sa phyogsa dag ni
NK046(mi)002:16883: nyams dgar te shin tu nyams dga' zhing yid spro
NK046(mi)002:16884: ba'i gnas phun sum tshogs par shog cig /
NK046(mi)002:16885: rgyu chos spangs dang mtshams med la sogs pa'i 'bras
NK046(mi)002:16886: bu dmyal ba mnar med par lcags bsreg gi sol
NK046(mi)002:16887: me rab tu 'bar ba'i phung por shin tu bsreg
NK046(mi)002:16888: pas me dang lus so sor snang ba med par
NK046(mi)002:16889: 'o dod 'bod cing me sgo cung zad phye bar
NK046(mi)002:16890: snang bas bros pa na slar me rab tu 'bar
NK046(mi)002:16891: ba'i skam pas bzung zhing tho bas mgor bsnun nas
NK046(mi)002:16892: khro chu me 'bar ba khar blugs te slar sol
NK046(mi)002:16893: phung du bsreg pa la sogs pas dmyal ba gong
NK046(mi)002:16894: ma bdun po'i sdug bsngal tshang bar myong bar 'gyur
NK046(mi)002:16895: ba rnams dang bral te sol thung de yanga dgos
NK046(mi)002:16896: 'dod kun 'byung gi rina chen te rin po che'i
NK046(mi)002:16897: phung pora longs spyod pa'i bde ba dang ldan par
NK046(mi)002:16898: gyur cig / tsha dmyal gyi sa gzhi lcags bsreg
NK046(mi)002:16899: me 'bar ba rab tu tsha ba yang tshon sna
NK046(mi)002:16900: brgya rtsa brgyad bkra pa'i shel gyi sa gzhi pany+tsa
NK046(mi)002:16901: li ka'i gos ltar reg bya 'jam pa mnan na
NK046(mi)002:16902: nem pa bteg pa 'phar ba bstar te mtho dman
NK046(mi)002:16903: med pa la longs spyod pa'i dga' bde dang ldan
NK046(mi)002:16904: gyur cig / par shog cig / ra lug ri
NK046(mi)002:16905: dwags sogs dang shig sen bar nas bsad pa la
NK046(mi)002:16906: sogs pas ra lug sogs kyi mgo can gyi ri
NK046(mi)002:16907: la sogs pa'i bar du bsdus nas ngu co di
NK046(mi)002:16908: ri ri lus sha tshal ba khrag thig par byas
NK046(mi)002:16909: te 'joms par byed pa'i sdug bsngal dang bral zhing
NK046(mi)002:16910: bsdus 'jom gyi ri bo la sogs pa rnams kyang
NK046(mi)002:16911: rin po che'i ri bo la rin po che'i gzhal
NK046(mi)002:16912: yas khang 'dod snam la sogs par mchod lha rnams
NK046(mi)002:16913: kyis nyer spyod kyi mchod rdzas thogs pas phyi nang
NK046(mi)002:16914: kun tu'ang mchoda pa yi sprin phung 'phro ba'i gzhal
NK046(mi)002:16915: med khang du gyur pa'i dbus su seng ge'i khri
NK046(mi)002:16916: rin po che'i steng du bde bar gshegsa pa ston
NK046(mi)002:16917: pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor tshogs rgya
NK046(mi)002:16918: mtsho lta bu la chos ston par mdzad pas gang
NK046(mi)002:16919: bar gyur la gus pas mchod cing chos nyan pa
NK046(mi)002:16920: la sogs pa'i bde skyid dang ldan par shog cig
NK046(mi)002:16921: gyur cig / par shog cig / / rgyu tshig ngan dang skur 'debs dang dmod tshig /
NK046(mi)002:16922: tshogs gral du bza' btung gsol tshe kha shag dang
NK046(mi)002:16923: tshogs rdil gyis 'phen pa la sogs pa'i 'bras bur
NK046(mi)002:16924: me'i madga ma yi char dang rdo bsreg pa'i char
NK046(mi)002:16925: dang ral gri rnon po me 'bar ba sogs mtshona
NK046(mi)002:16926: gyi chara 'bab pas sdug bsngal ba dag sdug bsngal
NK046(mi)002:16927: dang bral te dus deng nasa bzung ste me tog
NK046(mi)002:16928: yid du 'ong ba sna tshogs kyi char para ste
NK046(mi)002:16929: char du 'bab pa'i bde skyid dang ldan par gyur
NK046(mi)002:16930: cig / de'ang dper na nags tshal nyams dga' bar
NK046(mi)002:16931: gtsug lag khang yid du 'ong ba zhig na dge
NK046(mi)002:16932: slong lnga brgya gnas pa nyin phyed gung tshig skabs
NK046(mi)002:16933: su babs pa na gan+di brdung bas dge slong rnams
NK046(mi)002:16934: chos gos snam sbyar dang bcas par lhung bzed chab
NK046(mi)002:16935: ril mkhar bsil thog te 'du khang du tshogs pa
NK046(mi)002:16936: dang mnyam du 'du khang me 'bar ba'i khang pa
NK046(mi)002:16937: dang lhung bzed la sogs pa mtshon cha rnon po
NK046(mi)002:16938: me 'bar ba la sogs par gyur te phan tshun
NK046(mi)002:16939: bsnun pa'i sdug bsngal bar gyur nas nyin phyed yol
NK046(mi)002:16940: ba dang sngar ltar gyur ba sngon dad zas gsol
NK046(mi)002:16941: tshe kha shag bkye ba la sogs pa'i 'bras bu
NK046(mi)002:16942: yin par bshad pas na tshogs gral du kha shag
NK046(mi)002:16943: rtsod pa dang tshogs rdil 'phen pa sogs la bag
NK046(mi)002:16944: cig / yod par bya'o // dme 'khrug gis g.yul
NK046(mi)002:16945: du shi ba la sogs pa dmyal ba yang sos
NK046(mi)002:16946: su skyes pa na phan tshun dgra ru mthong nas
NK046(mi)002:16947: lag tu ci blang las kyis ral gri sogs su
NK046(mi)002:16948: gyur pa'i mtshon gyis 'debsa shing bsnun pas yang shi
NK046(mi)002:16949: yang sos dpag tu med pa yi sdug bsngal myong
NK046(mi)002:16950: ba de yang ni sdug bsngal dang bral te dus
NK046(mi)002:16951: deng nasa lha'i bu dang bu mor gyur te phan
NK046(mi)002:16952: tshun yid dga' zhing rtse dag'i bde ba la rol
NK046(mi)002:16953: pa'i phyir du me tog yid du 'ong ba rnams
NK046(mi)002:16954: kyis phan tshun 'phena par byed pa'i bde skyid dang
NK046(mi)002:16957: khye'u ma smin pa la 'dod log spyad pa dang /
NK046(mi)002:16958: dge 'dun pa'i dkor tshong la sogs pa'i g.yo sgyus len pa rnams 'dir skye la /
NK046(mi)002:16959: de yang mdog sngo ba'i chu bos khye'u dang bu
NK046(mi)002:16960: mo de dag mgo nag rdog rdog chus khyer te
NK046(mi)002:16961: lag pa chu khar yud tsam yud tsam 'ong bar
NK046(mi)002:16962: byas te kho bo thon cig zer ba la de
NK046(mi)002:16963: len pa'i ched du 'gro bar snyam pa dang chu'i
NK046(mi)002:16964: pha rol du dge 'dun pa'i dkor nor yod pas
NK046(mi)002:16966: nya sram sogs gsod pa'i phyir du der 'gro snyam
NK046(mi)002:16967: pas phyin pa dang thal tshon gyi chu bo gting
NK046(mi)002:16968: zab pas rab med pa me 'bar ba dang 'dra
NK046(mi)002:16969: ba'i tsha zhing bsreg par byed pa'i nang du bying
NK046(mi)002:16970: ba dag res rba rlabs gnam du 'phyur bas yang
NK046(mi)002:16971: bteg ste chu'i gting du rdo gru gsum rnon po'i
NK046(mi)002:16972: rtser brgyab pas lus dum bur gtong ba dang /
NK046(mi)002:16973: nya sram sogs kyis za bar byed cing chu'i 'gram
NK046(mi)002:16974: la sogs su khwa ta rdo rje'i mchu can la
NK046(mi)002:16975: sogs pas mig 'bru zhing lce gcod pa dang rgyu
NK046(mi)002:16976: ma 'dral ba la sogs pa dang /
NK046(mi)002:16977: chu tshan gyis sha kun tshig nas zhig par gyur
NK046(mi)002:16978: te rus gong me tog kun da'i mdoga ltar dkar
NK046(mi)002:16979: por gyur pa chu rlabs kyis phyir 'phang ba la
NK046(mi)002:16980: rlung gis btab pa'i mod la slar mir gyur te
NK046(mi)002:16981: sngar ltar sdug bsngal dpag tu med pa la spyod
NK046(mi)002:16982: pa rnams badga gi dge ba'i stobsa kyis de thams
NK046(mi)002:16983: cad sdug bsngal de dag dang bral te lha yi
NK046(mi)002:16984: lus phun sum tshogs pa thob nasa lha yi bu
NK046(mi)002:16985: mo lta na sdug pa rnams dang lhan cig tu
NK046(mi)002:16986: lha'i chu bo dal gyis 'abba pa gser dngul gyi
NK046(mi)002:16987: bye ma brdal ba me tog sna tshogs pas brgyan
NK046(mi)002:16988: par phan tshun rtse zhing dga' ba'i khrus la sogs
NK046(mi)002:16989: pas dga' bde'i dpal 'byor la gansa par shog cig
NK046(mi)002:16990: ces 'di rnams rang stobs kyis dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal
NK046(mi)002:16991: zhi bar bsngo zhing smon pa'o //
NK046(mi)002:16992: byang chub sems dpa' gzhan rnams kyi stobs kyis dmyal
NK046(mi)002:16993: ba'i sdug bsngal zhi bar bsngo zhing smon pa sngar
NK046(mi)002:16994: gsang ba'i bdag po'i dbang zhus lha sgom sngags bzlas
NK046(mi)002:16995: pa la sogs pa byas pa'i mthus 'di ltar dmyal
NK046(mi)002:16996: bas rnams kyis rnam 'phrul phun sum tshogs pa glo
NK046(mi)002:16997: bur du mthong ba na rgyu mtshan ci phyir dmyal
NK046(mi)002:16998: ba'i gnas 'dira ni gshina rje'i mi'am las mkhan stag
NK046(mi)002:16999: gzig sogs kyi mgo can rnams dang khwa ta dang
NK046(mi)002:17000: bya rgod la sogs pa mi bazada pa'am ma rungs
NK046(mi)002:17001: pa rnams shin tu rnam par skrag nas phyogs phyogs
NK046(mi)002:17003: sha khrag rkang mar la sogs pa bsreg pa'i du
NK046(mi)002:17004: ba la sogs pas kun nasa dkrigs pas rkang lag
NK046(mi)002:17005: brkyang bskum tsam yang mi mthong bas /
NK046(mi)002:17006: mun pa chen po rnams thugs rje'i 'od zer gyis
NK046(mi)002:17007: basla te lus la bde ba dang sems la dag'a
NK046(mi)002:17008: ba rgya chen po skyed pa'i mthu bzang po 'di
NK046(mi)002:17009: ko skyes bu dam pa su yis mthu yin nam
NK046(mi)002:17010: snyam ste mig gyen du bltas pas na mdun gyi
NK046(mi)002:17011: nam mkha'i dkyil me ri me dpung sna tshogs pa'i
NK046(mi)002:17012: dbus na byang chub sems dpa' dpal gsang ba'i bdag
NK046(mi)002:17013: po phyag na rgyal ba thams cad kyi dbang bskur
NK046(mi)002:17014: ba'i dbang rtags kyi rdo rje bsnam pa 'od dang
NK046(mi)002:17015: 'od zer gyi gzi brjid 'bar ba bzhugs pa mngon
NK046(mi)002:17016: sum du gsal bar mthonga nas sngar sku bzhengs pa
NK046(mi)002:17017: dang yid kyis bsgom pa dang 'chi khar dbang thob
NK046(mi)002:17018: pa sogs kyis lha de ngo shes te de la
NK046(mi)002:17019: rab tu dga' zhing dad pa khyad par can skye
NK046(mi)002:17020: ba'i shugsa kyis sngon gyi sdig pa'i las ngan mtha'
NK046(mi)002:17021: dag dang bral nas rdo rje 'dzin pa de dang
NK046(mi)002:17022: lhan cig tu 'grogsa shing lcang lo can la sogs
NK046(mi)002:17023: par zag pa med pa'i bde ba chen po la
NK046(mi)002:17024: dus rtag tu longs spyod par shog cig ces so
NK046(mi)002:17025: // da lta rang res rigs gsum sems dpa' la
NK046(mi)002:17026: sogs pa'i nye sras brgyad kyi dbang bskur zhus shing
NK046(mi)002:17027: lhag pa'i lhar yi dam du bzung zhing lha bsgom
NK046(mi)002:17028: sngags bzlas te mchod bstod la brtson par bya dgos
NK046(mi)002:17029: // so // lar sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems
NK046(mi)002:17030: dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje dang 'jam dpal
NK046(mi)002:17031: dbyangs dang spyan ras gzigs la sogs pa dmyal ba'i
NK046(mi)002:17032: sems can rnams kyis mjal zhing mthong na mi dga'
NK046(mi)002:17033: ba'i gang zag su zhig yod /
NK046(mi)002:17034: gal te yod na 'dre gdug pa can dngos yin /
NK046(mi)002:17035: de 'dra min na dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal la bsams
NK046(mi)002:17036: na der nye sras brgyad sogs byon par shog cig
NK046(mi)002:17037: ces pa'i bsam pa mi skye ba'i thabs ga la
NK046(mi)002:17038: yod / gal te mi skyen bya yi sgo nga
NK046(mi)002:17039: lta bu ci yang mi shes pas shin tu blun
NK046(mi)002:17040: pa'am rdo ba ltar sems med pa dang 'dra'o gsungs
NK046(mi)002:17041: yod / / de bzhin tu sngar spyan ras gzigs
NK046(mi)002:17042: kyi dbang zhus lha bsgom sngags bzlas pa la sogs
NK046(mi)002:17043: pa'i mthus snga ma bzhin tu nam mkha' las me
NK046(mi)002:17044: tog sna tshogs pa'i char pa dri zhim spos kyi
NK046(mi)002:17045: chu bzang po dang 'dres pa 'abbas pa yisa dmyal
NK046(mi)002:17046: ba'i me madga rab tu tsha ba rnams sgra chil
NK046(mi)002:17047: chila dang bcas pa'i sgo nas 'phral du gsoda pa
NK046(mi)002:17048: mthonga bar gyur nasa bdag cag rnams glo bur du
NK046(mi)002:17049: sngar ma myong ba'i bde bas tshim pa 'di lta
NK046(mi)002:17050: bu ni ci zhig gi mthu yin nam snyam du
NK046(mi)002:17051: bsam te gyen du bltas pa dang mnyam du semsa
NK046(mi)002:17052: can dmyal ba rnams kyis pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa
NK046(mi)002:17053: pad+ma'i rgyan dang ldan pa dang /
NK046(mi)002:17054: pad+ma'i spyan dang 'dra ba phyag na pad+ma bsnams pa
NK046(mi)002:17055: snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i mgon po spyan
NK046(mi)002:17056: ras gzigs dbang phyug zhal nas gsung mchog gi rgyal
NK046(mi)002:17057: po yi ge drug ma'i sgra sgrogs pa mngon sum
NK046(mi)002:17058: du mthonga bar gyur ba na sngar lus kyis sku
NK046(mi)002:17059: bzhengs pa dang sems kyis sku bsgom pa dang /
NK046(mi)002:17060: ngag gis yi ge drug ma bzlas pa dang 'chi
NK046(mi)002:17061: khar 'di'i dbang skur thob pa sogs kyis lha ngo
NK046(mi)002:17062: shes te rab tu dga' zhing dad pa'i mthu yis
NK046(mi)002:17063: las ngan sdig sgrib thams cad dag nas 'phags pa
NK046(mi)002:17064: spyan ras gzigs dang lhan cig tu 'grogs shing gnas
NK046(mi)002:17065: mchog ri bo ta la la sogs par zag pa
NK046(mi)002:17066: med pa'i bde ba chen po la dus rtag tu
NK046(mi)002:17068: sngar 'jams pa'i dbyangs kyi dbang zhus lha bsgom sngags
NK046(mi)002:17069: bzlas pa sogs kyi mthus dmyal ba pa rnams kyis
NK046(mi)002:17070: rje btsun 'jam pa'i dbyangs mthong ba dang phan tshun
NK046(mi)002:17071: sdang ba'i sems dang bral nas byams pa'i sems kyis
NK046(mi)002:17072: gcig gis gcig la sbran te /
NK046(mi)002:17073: kye grogsa po dag da ni dmyal ba'i 'jigas pa
NK046(mi)002:17074: bor la ste da ni 'jigs shing skrag mi dgos
NK046(mi)002:17075: pas ringsa par rings par tshur shog dang 'u bu'i
NK046(mi)002:17076: ste 'u bu cag mang po'i thad du ni rje
NK046(mi)002:17077: btsun 'jam pa'i dbyangs bzhugs pa gang gi mathu yis
NK046(mi)002:17078: lus gshags gcad la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal kun dang
NK046(mi)002:17079: bral bas bde ba dang ldan zhing sems la rab
NK046(mi)002:17080: tu dag'a ba'i shugsa phyin par mdzad la /
NK046(mi)002:17081: ngan song la sogs pa'i 'gro ba ma lus pa
NK046(mi)002:17082: kun sdug bsngal mtha' dag las sgo du ma nas
NK046(mi)002:17083: yongas su skyobs par mdzad pa'i byang chub semsa dapa'a
NK046(mi)002:17084: dmigs pa med pa'i pa'i brtse ba snying rje chen
NK046(mi)002:17085: po thugs rgyud la skyes par gyur pa yi 'jam
NK046(mi)002:17086: dpal gzhona nu bcu drug lon pa'i na tshod dang
NK046(mi)002:17087: ral ba'i zur phud lnga dang ldan pa can zhes
NK046(mi)002:17088: dbu skra thor cog mdzad par skra ching gis dbu
NK046(mi)002:17089: skra steng 'og gnyis nas bcing ba'i 'bur steng 'og
NK046(mi)002:17090: gnyis kyi g.yas g.yon bzhi steng dang ldan rin po
NK046(mi)002:17091: che'i tog gis brgyan pa mtshan dang dpe byad kyi
NK046(mi)002:17092: gzi byen 'od zer rab tu 'abra zhing dmyal ba'i
NK046(mi)002:17093: 'jigas pa med para byed pa gang su zhig 'jam
NK046(mi)002:17094: pa'i dbyangs de 'dir phyin pas na /
NK046(mi)002:17095: sems can dmyal ba pa khyod rnams kyis ltos dang /
NK046(mi)002:17096: tshangs pa dang brgya byin la sogs pa lha brgya'i
NK046(mi)002:17097: ste lha brgya phrag mang pos spyi bo'i cod pana
NK046(mi)002:17098: dag gis zhabsa rten gyi pad+mo la gus pas rgyun
NK046(mi)002:17099: mi 'chad par btud de mchoda pa sna tshogs byed
NK046(mi)002:17101: 'dir phyin pa khyod kyi zhabs kyi pad+mo la lha
NK046(mi)002:17102: brgya'i cod pan dag gis mchod par byed cing zhes
NK046(mi)002:17103: so // sdug bsngal dang ldan pa'i mtha' yas pa'i
NK046(mi)002:17104: sems can thams cad la thugs rjes te thugs brtse
NK046(mi)002:17105: ba chen po'i shugs kyis spyan chab byung bas brlan
NK046(mi)002:17106: par gyur pa'i spyan mdzes pa dang ldan pa'i dbu
NK046(mi)002:17107: la rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa rnams kyis ngo
NK046(mi)002:17108: mtshar ba'i bstod basngagasa dang bcas pas me tog du
NK046(mi)002:17109: ma'i tshogs kyi char chen po 'ba' par gyur pa
NK046(mi)002:17110: gzhal med khang brtsegsa pa yid du 'ong ba du
NK046(mi)002:17111: ma'i nang na lha yi bu mo stong phrag mang
NK046(mi)002:17112: pos sku gsung thugs yon tan phrin las la bstod
NK046(mi)002:17113: pa'i dbyangs snyan pa sgrogsa pa dang ldan pa 'di
NK046(mi)002:17114: la ltos zhes ltos shig ces phan tshun bskul ba'i
NK046(mi)002:17115: mod la rje btsun 'ajama pa'i dbyangs kyi rnam 'phrul
NK046(mi)002:17116: de 'dra ba mngon sum du mthonga nasa da ni
NK046(mi)002:17117: semsa can dmyal ba pa rnams shin tu dga' zhing
NK046(mi)002:17118: spro ba'i shugs kyis ca co sna tshogs 'dona zhing
NK046(mi)002:17119: de dang lhan cig tu zag med kyi bde ba
NK046(mi)002:17120: phun sum tshogs pa la longs spyod par shoga cig
NK046(mi)002:17121: so // / de ltar gzhung 'di nyid 'chad nyan
NK046(mi)002:17122: la sogs pa'i badga gi dge rtsas te dge ba'i
NK046(mi)002:17123: rtsa ba la brten nas kun tu bazanga po la
NK046(mi)002:17124: sogas te nam snying byams pa sa snying sgrib sel
NK046(mi)002:17125: la sogs pa'i byang chub semsa dapa'a rnams kyi zhal
NK046(mi)002:17126: mjal zhing gsung thos pa la sgrib pa'i nyes pa
NK046(mi)002:17127: med cing zhes pa'am yang na byang chub sems dpa'
NK046(mi)002:17128: sgrib pa med pa zhes sgrib pa rnam sel la
NK046(mi)002:17129: sogs pa'i thugs bskyed smon lam rdzu 'phrul gyis nam
NK046(mi)002:17130: mkhar sprin gyi tshogs 'khrigs pa las lus la bde
NK046(mi)002:17132: bsila zhing dri zhima po'i ngad dang ldan pa'i char
NK046(mi)002:17133: pa 'bebsa pa mthonga nas semsa can tsha dmyal ba
NK046(mi)002:17134: de dag mngona mtho dang nges par legs pa'i dga'
NK046(mi)002:17135: bde rgya chen po myur du thob par gyur cig
NK046(mi)002:17136: / dud 'gror skye ba'i rgyu chos 'chad nyan la
NK046(mi)002:17137: mi dga' zhing rgyab ston cing 'phya ba la sogs
NK046(mi)002:17138: pa'i 'bras bu dud 'gro la bying na gnas pa
NK046(mi)002:17141: rgya mtsho chen po'i nang na chu srin nya mid
NK046(mi)002:17142: dang nya mid chen po la sogs pa che ba
NK046(mi)002:17143: ri rab tsam las chung ba skra rtse tsam gyis
NK046(mi)002:17144: che chung mang po chang 'gag gi spang ma bzhin
NK046(mi)002:17145: du gang ba blun zhing rmongs pa che che re
NK046(mi)002:17146: res chung chung mang po khyur mid byed cing chung
NK046(mi)002:17147: chung mang pos che che re re thal mar du
NK046(mi)002:17148: 'bigs te za zhing lus la tshang bca' ba la
NK046(mi)002:17149: sogs pa dang klu la bye tshan gyi tshar pa
NK046(mi)002:17150: 'babs pa dang mkha' lding gis za ba la sogs
NK046(mi)002:17151: pa'i sdug bsngal rgya chen po rgyun mi 'chad par
NK046(mi)002:17152: myong ba dang / lha mi'i gnas na yod pa'i
NK046(mi)002:17153: kha 'thor ba la mi'i bdag tu ma bzung ba
NK046(mi)002:17154: ri dwags bya dang gcan gzan la sogs pa'ang /
NK046(mi)002:17155: khra byis thub kyis bye'u dang bye'u sprang bu thub
NK046(mi)002:17156: pa rnams kyis sbrang bu la sogs pa gcig gis
NK046(mi)002:17157: gcig gsod cing za ba dang /
NK046(mi)002:17158: sha pags rus pa sogs kyi ched du me mda'
NK046(mi)002:17159: dang rgya dang snyi la sogs pas dbang med du
NK046(mi)002:17160: gsod cing rtag tu 'jigs skrags kyis mnar ba dang
NK046(mi)002:17161: / mis bdag tu bzung ba rta khal la sogs pa'ang bzhon bzho ba /
NK046(mi)002:17162: khal 'gel pa zhon te 'gro ba dang bya gcod
NK046(mi)002:17163: pa sna 'bigs pa dang bkol zhing spyod pa la
NK046(mi)002:17164: sogs pa'i sdug bsngal gyis rgyun du mnar zhing tshe
NK046(mi)002:17165: tshad kyang / mdo nyi ma'i snying por tshe thung ba yud tsam dang /
NK046(mi)002:17166: ring ba bskal ba'i bar du myong bar gsungs pa'i
NK046(mi)002:17167: dud 'gro rnams ni blang dor la shin tu blun
NK046(mi)002:17168: zhing rmongs pas dam pa'i chos kyi snang ba'i skal
NK046(mi)002:17169: pa med cing phan tshun gciga la gciga gis gsod
NK046(mi)002:17170: cing za ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal gyi 'jigas
NK046(mi)002:17171: pa chen po rnams dang dus rtag tu bral bar
NK046(mi)002:17172: gyur cig ces sogs dang de dag gis chos ldan
NK046(mi)002:17173: gyi mi lus thob nas skyes sbyang gi shes rab
NK046(mi)002:17174: phun sum tshogs pas lung sde snod gsum la 'chad
NK046(mi)002:17175: nyan dang lam bslab pa gsum gyi nyams len la
NK046(mi)002:17176: dga' zhing spro bas 'jug pa'i skal ba bzang po
NK046(mi)002:17177: dang ldan pa'i gnas skabs mtho ris dang mthar thug
NK046(mi)002:17178: rnam mkhyen sangs rgyas kyi go 'phang thob par shog
NK046(mi)002:17179: cig / ces gong bzhin du smon 'dun dam bca'
NK046(mi)002:17180: gsol 'debs dang 'brel bar bsam zhing ngag gis brjod
NK046(mi)002:17181: cig / par bya'o // rgyu gzhan gyi zas nor
NK046(mi)002:17182: la rloms sems dang rang gi zas nor la ser
NK046(mi)002:17183: sna byed pa la sogs pa'i 'bras bu rim par
NK046(mi)002:17184: phyi nang gi sgrib pa can sogs kyi yi dwags
NK046(mi)002:17185: te de yang lus kyi tshad nyi ma'i snying por
NK046(mi)002:17186: chung ba mtho gang dang che ba dpag tshad stong
NK046(mi)002:17187: gi bar yod par gsungs la /
NK046(mi)002:17188: gnas la bying na gnas pa dang /
NK046(mi)002:17189: mkha' la rgyu ba gnyis las /
NK046(mi)002:17190: dang po rgyal po'i khab kyi dpag tshad lnga brgya'i
NK046(mi)002:17191: 'og rtsa ba'i gnas dang 'phros pa'i gnas rgya mtsho'i
NK046(mi)002:17192: chu 'gram dang mi yi yul la sogs pa na
NK046(mi)002:17193: yod cing sdug bsngal gyi khyad par lo stong phrag
NK046(mi)002:17194: mang po'i bar du tha na chu tsam gyi ming
NK046(mi)002:17195: yang mi grags pas bkres pa dang /
NK046(mi)002:17196: skom pas nyams thag pas sha pag khrag rnams skam
NK046(mi)002:17197: nas lus rid cing mi sdug pa'i mtshan ma mang
NK046(mi)002:17198: po dang ldan pa sdong dum mes tshig pa lta
NK046(mi)002:17199: bu kha nas med ma sbyin la sogs pa'i mi
NK046(mi)002:17200: snyan pa'i sgra mang po sgrogs pa zas skom gyi
NK046(mi)002:17201: ched du 'gro ba na lus che ba yan lag
NK046(mi)002:17202: shin tu phra bas mi theg par lhu tshigs 'khrol
NK046(mi)002:17203: bas du ba 'phyur zhing me 'bar ba dang bya
NK046(mi)002:17204: khyi sogs kyis 'tshe ba dang rdo bsreg dang bye
NK046(mi)002:17205: tshan gyi char sogs kyis mnar zhing rgyang ring por
NK046(mi)002:17206: chu klung mthong bas thang chad chad du song ba
NK046(mi)002:17207: na mtshon cha thogs pa'i srung mas ded pa dang
NK046(mi)002:17208: ma bsrung kyang chu thig tsam yang med par skams
NK046(mi)002:17209: nas gram pa skya thal ler gyur ba chu klung
NK046(mi)002:17211: de bzhin du ljon shing phyin ci log dang /
NK046(mi)002:17212: bza' btung phyin ci log dang /
NK046(mi)002:17213: nyi zla dus tshigs phyin ci log tu gyur ba phyi'i sgrib pa can dang /
NK046(mi)002:17214: gal te zas skom cung zad re rnyed kyang kha khab mig ltar dog pa dang /
NK046(mi)002:17215: mgrin pa rta rnga ltar phra bas mi chud pa
NK046(mi)002:17216: dang cung zad chud kyang lto ba yul ljongs ltar
NK046(mi)002:17217: yangs ba mi khengs pa dang /
NK046(mi)002:17218: lto ba de tsam lto bar song yang de la
NK046(mi)002:17219: me 'bar bas glo snying sogs nang khrol thams cad
NK046(mi)002:17220: bsreg pas sdug bsngal ba nang gi sgrib pa can
NK046(mi)002:17221: dang / sgos khur gyi sgrib pa can ni yi
NK046(mi)002:17222: dwags re re'i lus la gzhan mang pos tshang bcas
NK046(mi)002:17223: nas za bar byed pa la sogs pa dang slob
NK046(mi)002:17224: dpon jo ta ri dang gro bzhin skyes yi dwags
NK046(mi)002:17225: kyi yul du byon pas sdug bsngal pa'i yi dwags
NK046(mi)002:17226: rnam pa mi 'dra ba mang po gzigs pa'i lo
NK046(mi)002:17227: dang / rgyus sogs dang / phan tshun 'dzing 'thab
NK046(mi)002:17228: byas te lus la rma byung ba'i rnag khrag gis
NK046(mi)002:17229: rang gzhan gyi kha zas byed pa rnams so //
NK046(mi)002:17230: tshe tshad kyang mi'i zla ba la nyin zhag tu
NK046(mi)002:17231: byas pa'i rang lo lnga brgya la sogs pa thub
NK046(mi)002:17233: yi dwags mtshun lhas dur khrod du ro bsreg brdung
NK046(mi)002:17234: byas shul du bsnams pas mi de'i tshe de'i spyod
NK046(mi)002:17235: lam thams cad shes nas de dang de yin no
NK046(mi)002:17236: zhes shi bor bardzu bar byed pa yang yod do
NK046(mi)002:17237: // tshe phos pa ji ltar 'gyur ba zhus pa'i mdo las kyang /
NK046(mi)002:17238: ston pa ser skya'i grong du gshegs pa'i tshe /
NK046(mi)002:17239: sh+aakya dga' skyes zhes bya ba dar la bab pa /
NK046(mi)002:17240: gnyen bshes rnams kyis gces shing mi mang po'i bkur
NK046(mi)002:17241: ba zhig yod pa tshe 'phos nas skye bo rnams
NK046(mi)002:17242: mya ngan gyis non par gyur ba na /
NK046(mi)002:17243: bcom ldan 'das la yab rgyal po zas gtsang mas
NK046(mi)002:17244: sems can rnams tshe 'phos pa ji ltar 'gyur ba'i
NK046(mi)002:17245: don rnams rgya cher zhus pa'i lan du /
NK046(mi)002:17246: bcom ldan 'das kyis 'gro ba rnams ni shi 'phos
NK046(mi)002:17247: nas las dge ba dang mi dge ba'i dbang gis
NK046(mi)002:17248: mtho ris dang ngan song la sogs pa'i ris tha
NK046(mi)002:17250: gang dag lha rnams lhar skye ba dang mi rnams
NK046(mi)002:17251: mir skye ba lta bu ma yin pa dang sogs
NK046(mi)002:17252: nas / gang dag tshe 'phos pa de'i cha lugs
NK046(mi)002:17253: ltar snang ba sogs ni bar snang gi khams la
NK046(mi)002:17254: dri za'i 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med pa
NK046(mi)002:17255: mchis pa las dri za 'chi kha ma'i sems la
NK046(mi)002:17256: nye bar 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i rigs rnams dri
NK046(mi)002:17257: za'i zas btsal ba'i phyir lus dang gos rgyan cha
NK046(mi)002:17258: lugs sogs de lta bur sprul pa sogs kyang yod
NK046(mi)002:17259: nas / / de las gzhan pa'i gnod sbyin dang
NK046(mi)002:17260: sha za dang 'byung po la sogs pas shul gyi
NK046(mi)002:17261: nye du sogs bslu ba'i phyir de ltar sprul nas
NK046(mi)002:17262: nas / / ston pa'ang yod / rmi lam sogs
NK046(mi)002:17263: su sngar yun ring por lhan cig tu gnas pa'i
NK046(mi)002:17264: bag chags brdas pas de ltar rmi ba'am yod kyi
NK046(mi)002:17265: nas / / ston pa'ang yod / / gshin po
NK046(mi)002:17266: dngos ni las kyi dbang gis gang du 'gro ba
NK046(mi)002:17267: der skye bar 'gyur ba las de ltar 'ong mi
NK046(mi)002:17268: nas / / ston pa'ang yod / / srid pa
NK046(mi)002:17269: dang / shul mi rnams kyis bza' btung gos rgyan
NK046(mi)002:17270: sogs tshe 'das kyi phyir btang ba ni sdig dang
NK046(mi)002:17271: ma 'dres pa'i bsod nams kyi las des de la
NK046(mi)002:17273: de skye ba blangs ma zin na mtho ris dang thar bar yang skye ba len par byed la /
NK046(mi)002:17274: gal te skye ba blangs zin pa rnams la'ang der
NK046(mi)002:17275: nor rnyed pa dang kun gyis bkur ba sogs kyi
NK046(mi)002:17277: de nyid skye ba mi len par gshin gyi 'jig
NK046(mi)002:17278: rten du yod nas bza' btung sogs la longs spyod
NK046(mi)002:17280: kha gcig gzugs ston pa dang de dang des phan
NK046(mi)002:17281: thogs ma thogs sogs dan rtags kyi gtam smra ba
NK046(mi)002:17282: ni 'a chi 'pho ba thams cad kyi sems la
NK046(mi)002:17283: khyab par byed pa'i rigs dri za bi tsa na
NK046(mi)002:17284: dang / gnod sbyin smra 'dod kyi rigs dang /
NK046(mi)002:17285: 'byung po sar hi ni ta kun tu rtog 'dod
NK046(mi)002:17286: ces bya ba dag gis bsgrubs nas mi ma yin
NK046(mi)002:17287: pa de dag gis shi ba des sngon ji ltar
NK046(mi)002:17289: cha lugs kyi dan rtags dag 'jig rten pa dag
NK046(mi)002:17290: bslu ba'i phyir ston cing smra ba dag yin par
NK046(mi)002:17292: lhas sbyin sogs kha cig the tshom du gyur nas
NK046(mi)002:17293: bcom ldan 'das thams cad mkhyen pa yin min rtogs
NK046(mi)002:17294: phyir / lhas sbyin gyis 'dzam gling gi shing rigs
NK046(mi)002:17295: tsan dan dang smag sha dang seng ldeng la sogs
NK046(mi)002:17296: pa brgya stong mang po bcad nas bsreg pa'i thal
NK046(mi)002:17297: ba rnams so sor mi nor ba'i mtshan ma byas
NK046(mi)002:17298: te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar khyer ba na
NK046(mi)002:17299: phyir / / bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag rim
NK046(mi)002:17300: par 'di ni tsan dan gyi thal ba'o zhes sogs
NK046(mi)002:17301: so sor ma 'dres par gsungs pas /
NK046(mi)002:17302: lhas sbyin bcom ldan 'das la rnam pa thams cad
NK046(mi)002:17303: mkhyen pa'i ye shes mnga' bar yid ches par 'gyur
NK046(mi)002:17304: te / tshe 'phos pa ji ltar 'gyur bar gsungs pa nges so snyam nas /
NK046(mi)002:17305: bcom ldan 'das ni kun mkhyen lags //
NK046(mi)002:17306: shing mang thal ba'i bye brag rnams //
NK046(mi)002:17307: ma gzigs ma gsan nges par mkhyen //
NK046(mi)002:17310: de bzhin tu sh+aakya ming can gyis ser skya'i grong khyer chen por song ste /
NK046(mi)002:17311: khyim ji snyed pa las 'bras kyi phu ba ma
NK046(mi)002:17312: re re so sor mi nor ba'i ming byang bcug
NK046(mi)002:17313: nas thum bor bcings pa glang po'i che'i rgyab khal
NK046(mi)002:17314: lang ba khyer te spyan sngar phyin pa'ang so sor
NK046(mi)002:17315: ma nor bar mkhyen nas gsungs pas yid ches te
NK046(mi)002:17316: des kyang / sangs rgyas spyan gyis thams cad gzigs //
NK046(mi)002:17317: 'jig rten pa ltar brdzun mi mnga' //
NK046(mi)002:17318: sh+aakya'i grong khyer ji snyed pa'i //
NK046(mi)002:17319: 'bros kyi phub ma ma nor mkhyen //
NK046(mi)002:17320: sems can tshe 'phos pha rol na //
NK046(mi)002:17321: ji ltar snang ba 'jig rten brdzun //
NK046(mi)002:17322: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa bden //
NK046(mi)002:17323: kun gzigs khyed la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK046(mi)002:17326: dz+ny+aa na a wa lo ki te ma nahs man+ta
NK046(mi)002:17327: spa ra na ra smi b+ha wa sa ma ya
NK046(mi)002:17328: ma h+aa ma ni du ru du ru h+r+ai da
NK046(mi)002:17329: ya dz+wa la na h'u zhes pa 'bab chu'am mtsho
NK046(mi)002:17330: 'gram du lag g.yas pa'i khyor bar chu blugs la
NK046(mi)002:17331: ye shes skar mad'i snying po 'di lan bdun bzlas
NK046(mi)002:17332: te chu khyod ba bdun slar chur blugs na sangs
NK046(mi)002:17333: rgyas kyi spyan gyis gzigs pa'i yi dwags ji snyed
NK046(mi)002:17334: yod pa de dag gis lha'i zhal zas kyi ro
NK046(mi)002:17335: dang btung ba'i ro mchog dang ldan pa thob cing
NK046(mi)002:17336: yi dwags re re la'ang kha zas dang btung ba
NK046(mi)002:17337: yul ma g+ha d+ha'i bre bdun bdun gyis tshim par
NK046(mi)002:17339: chu de 'thung ba tsam gyis de thams cad yi
NK046(mi)002:17340: dwags kyi skye gnas las thar cing bde 'gro mtho
NK046(mi)002:17341: ris kyi skye gnas su skyes par 'gyur ro //
NK046(mi)002:17342: skyes pa dang bud med bu dang bu mo gzhan
NK046(mi)002:17343: yang byol song gi skye gnas su gtogs pa'i yi
NK046(mi)002:17344: dwags sam bya'am / chu gnas la sogs pa gang
NK046(mi)002:17345: gis chu de 'thung ba thams cad kyi sdig pa
NK046(mi)002:17346: dang sgrib pa thams cad byang zhing bde 'gro'i lam
NK046(mi)002:17348: bza' btung gang yang chos kyi sbyin pa tshig bzhi
NK046(mi)002:17349: re bton te yi dwags rnams kyis thob par bsngosa
NK046(mi)002:17350: pas zas kyi go chod par mdo las gsungs pas
NK046(mi)002:17351: na de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung bslu ba med pa
NK046(mi)002:17352: la yid ches kyi dad pas lag len la theb
NK046(mi)002:17353: par bya'o // gzhan yang yi dwags gtor ma za
NK046(mi)002:17354: ba 'khu ldog can zhes snyigs dus 'dir dkyil 'khor
NK046(mi)002:17355: gnyan po'i mdun du bsad sha'i dmar mchod byas pas
NK046(mi)002:17356: lha ye shes pa rnams gtan nas der mi nye
NK046(mi)002:17357: par bya'o // zhing / der sha khrag la dga'
NK046(mi)002:17358: ba'i mkha' rgyu'i yi dwags rnams sgrub pa po la
NK046(mi)002:17359: 'khor nas phan tshun gcig grogs gcig gis byas pas
NK046(mi)002:17360: de dag gi mthus sgrub pa po la lha mthong
NK046(mi)002:17361: 'dre mthong mngon shes lung bstan phran bu dang 'dre
NK046(mi)002:17362: 'dul dang ngag nus cung zad re yod par gyur
NK046(mi)002:17363: nas pha mgo bus g.yog bu mgo dgras g.yog pa
NK046(mi)002:17364: bzhin lha 'dres mgo g.yog ste re zhig 'phral rkyen
NK046(mi)002:17365: phran bu re sel zhing mthun rkyen phran bu re
NK046(mi)002:17366: sgrub pa'i sdong grogs cung zad re 'phral du byed
NK046(mi)002:17367: par bya'o // zhing / nus na yang / cung
NK046(mi)002:17368: zad tsam gyis 'khu ldog 'byung zhing rang gzhan la
NK046(mi)002:17369: gnod tshab che ba dang phugs su yon bdag mchod
NK046(mi)002:17370: gnyis kar kha mi dge zhing bkra mi shis pas
NK046(mi)002:17371: 'di phyi gnyis phung du 'gyur ba'i mkha' rgyu'i yi
NK046(mi)002:17372: dwags rnams la bslu ba med pa'i dkon mchog gsum
NK046(mi)002:17373: las kyang blo snying brang gsum gtan nas /
NK046(mi)002:17374: mchod cing bstod de lha ru bsten pa 'di //
NK046(mi)002:17375: yi dwags lha ru mthong ba'i dus //
NK046(mi)002:17376: bod sdug pa'i dus la bab pa yin //
NK046(mi)002:17377: zhes gsungs pa'i bden pa'i lung bstan thog tu bab pa yin no //
NK046(mi)002:17378: de ltar mkha' la rgyu ba'i btsan dang rgyal po
NK046(mi)002:17379: shi 'dre la sogs pa ni dus rtag tu gzhan
NK046(mi)002:17380: la bsam pa ngan zhing sbyor ba rtsub pas shi
NK046(mi)002:17381: 'phos ma thag dmyal ba la sogs pa'i ngan song
NK046(mi)002:17383: zhag bdun re'i mtshams su rang nyid sngar mtshon sogs
NK046(mi)002:17384: gang gis shi ba'i rkyen des yang 'chi bar 'gyur
NK046(mi)002:17385: ba'i sdug bsngal myong zhing slar skad cig gis skye
NK046(mi)002:17386: bas yang 'chi yang skye la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal
NK046(mi)002:17387: de gzhan la spo bar 'dod pas gang du phyin
NK046(mi)002:17388: pa der gnod cing rang la ci yang mi phan
NK046(mi)002:17389: pa dang / sngon gyi rang gi mdza' bshes sogs
NK046(mi)002:17390: kyi drung du dga' nas phyin tshe de dag la
NK046(mi)002:17391: glo bur du nad dang smyo 'bog la sogs pa
NK046(mi)002:17392: mi 'dod pa sna dgu 'byung ba dang /
NK046(mi)002:17393: gzhan nus mthu can gyis mnan bsregs 'phang gsum byas pas /
NK046(mi)002:17394: sa 'og mun pa'i gnas su bskal pa'i bar du mnan pa dang /
NK046(mi)002:17395: sbyin sreg gi mes bsreg pa dang /
NK046(mi)002:17396: yungs kar sogs kyi brabs pas lus dum bu stong
NK046(mi)002:17397: du 'gro ba la sogs pa dang dus tshigs dang
NK046(mi)002:17398: nyi zla phyin ci log sogs yi dwags spyi dang
NK046(mi)002:17400: de ltar bsams nas 'dre gdon rnams la yang /
NK046(mi)002:17401: gnod bya gnod byed rgyu 'bras las kyi 'brel /
NK046(mi)002:17402: zhes pa ltar bsam nas yon bdag dang 'dre gdon
NK046(mi)002:17403: gnyis las ngan gyis 'brel pa la chags sdang med
NK046(mi)002:17404: par snying rje bsgom pa'i yul du mnyam par bltas
NK046(mi)002:17405: nas nad pa sogs la phan phyir 'dre gdon ar
NK046(mi)002:17406: la gtad pa'i drag las spangs te byams dang snying
NK046(mi)002:17407: rje byang chub kyis sems bsgom pa ni 'phral phug
NK046(mi)002:17408: gnyis kar phan pa'i man ngag dam pa'o //
NK046(mi)002:17409: de ltar phyi nang sgos khur mtshun lha mkha' rgyu
NK046(mi)002:17410: sogs yi dwags kyi sde tshan sum cu rtsa drug
NK046(mi)002:17411: tu skye ba'i sdug bsngal rgyu 'bras thams cad dang
NK046(mi)002:17412: bral nas dper na byang sgra mi snyan pa'i mi
NK046(mi)002:17413: rnams ni skyes pa dang mnyam du dpag bsam gyi
NK046(mi)002:17414: shing re 'byung zhing sus kyang bdag gir ma bzung
NK046(mi)002:17415: zhing ma rmos pa'i lo thog dang dpag bsam gyi
NK046(mi)002:17416: shing de las zas gos la sogs pa gang 'dod
NK046(mi)002:17417: 'byung bas longs spyod phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan
NK046(mi)002:17418: pa dang rgyud 'jam zhing rang bzhin gyis dge ba
NK046(mi)002:17419: can / mi dge ba bcu mi spyod pa bzhina
NK046(mi)002:17420: du 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas pa na gnas
NK046(mi)002:17421: pa'i yi dwagsa rnams ni bza' btung gos rgyan la
NK046(mi)002:17422: sogs 'dod pa'i yon tan thams cad la longs spyod
NK046(mi)002:17423: pa'i bde ba phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan par
NK046(mi)002:17424: can / gyur cig / 'aphagas pa spyan ras gzigas
NK046(mi)002:17425: dabnga phyug yi dwags kyi gnas su byon te rang
NK046(mi)002:17426: gi phyag sor bcu dang zhabs sor bcu dang sku'i
