NK046(mi)002:17427: ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas 'abba pa'i bdud
NK046(mi)002:17428: rtsi 'o ma'i rgyun te mngar zhing reg bya bsil
NK046(mi)002:17429: ba dpag tu med pa kun gyis yi dwagsa rnams
NK046(mi)002:17430: ni kha mgrin yangs par gyur te ji ltar 'dod
NK046(mi)002:17431: pa bzhin tu bza' btung la sogs pas tshim par
NK046(mi)002:17432: byas shing bdud rtsi'i chu la khrus byas pas tsha
NK046(mi)002:17433: gdung dang bral te rtag tu bsila ba'i yid du
NK046(mi)002:17434: 'ong ba dang gyur pa rnams la yi ge drug
NK046(mi)002:17435: ma'i chos sgrogs pa thos pa'i mdo la byang chub
NK046(mi)002:17436: sems dpa' 'dod pa'i sbyin zhes bya ba ming mthun
NK046(mi)002:17437: pa sha stag tu gyur te bde ba can du
NK046(mi)002:17438: skyes par gsungs pa ltar bde ba dang ldan par
NK046(mi)002:17439: can / gyur cig / shog cig / mar me
NK046(mi)002:17440: brkus pa dang bsad pa dang chos kyi snang ba
NK046(mi)002:17441: la bar chad byas pa dang /
NK046(mi)002:17442: chos la log lta skur 'debs skyes bu dam pa
NK046(mi)002:17443: dang pha ma la mig log dang glegs bam 'jig
NK046(mi)002:17445: gzhan gyi mig 'byin par byas pa la sogs pa'i
NK046(mi)002:17446: las kyi lhag ma'i 'bras bu 'jig rten gyi khams
NK046(mi)002:17447: mtha' yas pa rnams su mig long ba'i long ba
NK046(mi)002:17448: ji snyed yod pa dang de'i rgyu bsgrub pa thams
NK046(mi)002:17449: cad sdug bsngal rgyu 'bras thams cad dang bral nas
NK046(mi)002:17450: de rnams kyis mar me 'bul ba la sogs pa
NK046(mi)002:17451: rgyu sgrub pa dang mig rnam par dag pas gzugsa
NK046(mi)002:17452: rnam par dag pa dang ye shes kyi spyan gyis
NK046(mi)002:17453: shes bya'i chos thams cad kyi ji lta ba dang
NK046(mi)002:17454: ji snyed pa'i don mthonga zhing rtogs par shog cig
NK046(mi)002:17455: / sku gsung thugs rten gyi mdun gyi rol mo'i
NK046(mi)002:17456: sgra rgyun bcad pa sogs kyi 'bras bu 'on pasa
NK046(mi)002:17457: te 'on pa rnams sdug bsngal dang bral te lha'i
NK046(mi)002:17458: rna ba'i mngon par shes pas dus rtag tu sgra
NK046(mi)002:17459: yid du 'ong ba thosa par shog cig /
NK046(mi)002:17460: bud med sogs sbrum ma rnams bu btsa' ba'i dus
NK046(mi)002:17461: su bu la lcags kyi 'jur mig tu drang ba
NK046(mi)002:17462: lta bu la sogs pa dang ma la'ang rus tshigs
NK046(mi)002:17463: thams cad 'khrol zhing bye ba la sogs pa'i sdug
NK046(mi)002:17464: bsngal chen pos ma bu gnyis ka'am gang rung 'chi
NK046(mi)002:17465: ba'am 'chi la thug pa'i sdug bsngal dang bral te
NK046(mi)002:17466: yum lha mo sgyu 'phrul chen mo las sras gzhon
NK046(mi)002:17467: nu don thams cad grub pa 'khrungs pa'i tshe lum+bi
NK046(mi)002:17468: ni yi nags tshal gyi shing drung du bkra shis
NK046(mi)002:17469: pa'i ltas ngo mtshar ba dang bcas te gnod pa
NK046(mi)002:17470: ci yang med par ma zad bsam gtan gyi bde
NK046(mi)002:17471: ba phun sum tshogs pa lta bu dang ldan par
NK046(mi)002:17472: 'khrungs ba ji lta ba bzhina du sbrum ma rnams
NK046(mi)002:17473: la'ang nad la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal gyi gnod pa
NK046(mi)002:17474: med par sras mtshan ldan yid du 'ong ba bde
NK046(mi)002:17475: ba'i sgo nas btsa' bar shog cig /
NK046(mi)002:17476: de yang bu ngan pa dang bzang po mngal na gnas pa na de'i rtags ma la 'byung ste /
NK046(mi)002:17477: sngon ma skyes dgra mngal na gnas tshe mas bu'i
NK046(mi)002:17478: pha gzugs can snying po'i sha za bar 'dod pa
NK046(mi)002:17479: dang / sh+aa ri'i bu mngal na gnas tshe ma
NK046(mi)002:17480: nyid mkhas pa su dang brtsad kyang rgyal bar gyur
NK046(mi)002:17481: dang / ba dang / rgyal bu bsod nams stobs
NK046(mi)002:17482: mngal na bzhugs tshe bkra shis pa'i ltas mang po
NK046(mi)002:17483: dang bcas shing ma nyid khri mthon por 'dug ste
NK046(mi)002:17484: chos ston par 'dod pa'i tshe yab kyis phyogs thams
NK046(mi)002:17485: cad du dri la bsgrags te 'dus pa na khri
NK046(mi)002:17486: mthon por bag tsha ba med par 'dug nas sngon
NK046(mi)002:17487: ma byung ba'i tshigs su bcad pa /
NK046(mi)002:17488: bsod nams bsags na bde bar 'gyur /
NK046(mi)002:17489: de phyir mis ni bsod nams bya /
NK046(mi)002:17490: de bas yang dang yang du bya //
NK046(mi)002:17491: de nyid la ni brtson par bya //
NK046(mi)002:17492: zhes smras ma thag tu legs par smras so mchog
NK046(mi)002:17493: tu smras so zhes pa'i sgra bar snang nas byung
NK046(mi)002:17494: ba la sogs pa'i ngo mtshar bar byung ba dang
NK046(mi)002:17495: / bdag cag gi ston pa thugs rje can lhums
NK046(mi)002:17496: su bzhugs tshe sgyu 'phrul mas chos kyi rnam grangs
NK046(mi)002:17497: mang po shes pa dang nad pa rnams la zas
NK046(mi)002:17498: byin pa'am phyag gis reg pa tsam gyis nad las
NK046(mi)002:17499: grol ba la sogs pa dang /
NK046(mi)002:17500: dben pa la thugs dgyes pa'i rtags su yum lum+bi'i
NK046(mi)002:17501: nags tshal du byon nas sku 'khrungs pa la sogs
NK046(mi)002:17502: pa lta bu yin no gsungs /
NK046(mi)002:17503: sku gsung thugs rten gyi na bza' dang pha ma'i
NK046(mi)002:17504: gos bshus shing shig grang sar 'phang ba la sogs
NK046(mi)002:17505: pa'i 'bras bu gos med gcer bu gyur ba rnams
NK046(mi)002:17506: kyis sdug bsngal dang bral nas srab 'jam yang ba
NK046(mi)002:17507: reg na bde ba'i lha'i gosa phun sum tshogs pa
NK046(mi)002:17508: dag thob pa'i bde dang ldan par shog cig /
NK046(mi)002:17509: de bzhin du zhal zas la sogs pa la mi
NK046(mi)002:17510: dbang par spyad pa la sogs pa'i 'bras bus ltog
NK046(mi)002:17511: ngar che ba go yor dang rdo phye'i kha zas
NK046(mi)002:17512: can phug ron dang khyi la sogs pa bkres pa
NK046(mi)002:17513: yi sdug bsngal ba rnams kyis ro brgya ldan pa'i
NK046(mi)002:17514: zas phun tshogs dang ni skom pa yi sdug bsngal
NK046(mi)002:17515: ba rnams kyis yan lag brgyad ldan gyi chu dang
NK046(mi)002:17516: lha'i bdud rtsi dag dang mngar gsum gyi khu ba
NK046(mi)002:17517: la sogs pa yi btung ba zhim po rnams kyang
NK046(mi)002:17519: rku 'phrog sogs kyis las kyi lhag ma bkren pa'am
NK046(mi)002:17520: dbul zhing phongs par gyur pa rnams kyis gser dngul
NK046(mi)002:17521: rta glang la sogs pa'i nor phun sum tshogs pa
NK046(mi)002:17523: de la yang phyi'i nor longs spyod med pas phongs
NK046(mi)002:17524: shing dbul ba bas nang sems kyis 'dod pa che
NK046(mi)002:17525: zhing chog mi shes pa ni shin tu dbul zhing
NK046(mi)002:17526: phongs pa tha chad pa ste /
NK046(mi)002:17527: dbul po des pas nor bu rin po che rnyed
NK046(mi)002:17528: pa bdag cag gi ston pa thugs rje can la
NK046(mi)002:17529: phul ba la ston pas 'jig rten 'di na su
NK046(mi)002:17530: dbul zhing phongs ba de la sbyin no zhes gzhan
NK046(mi)002:17531: phongs shing dbul ba su la'ang ma byin par rgyal
NK046(mi)002:17532: po gsal rgyal la sbyin par mdzad pa lta bu
NK046(mi)002:17533: yin no // sems mya ngan gyis gdungs shing nyam
NK046(mi)002:17534: thag pa rnams kyang mya ngan dang bral nas sems
NK046(mi)002:17535: dag'a bde rgya chen po thob par shog cig /
NK046(mi)002:17536: re che bas gnyen grogs kyis bslus pa dang /
NK046(mi)002:17537: chos 'jig rten gyi bya ba gang dag mi 'grub
NK046(mi)002:17538: par shes pas yid chad pa rnams kyang slar 'grub
NK046(mi)002:17539: par shes pas yid sos shing brtan pa ste 'grub
NK046(mi)002:17540: nges pas sems la dpa' gdengs phun sum tshogas pa
NK046(mi)002:17542: skye dgu sems can rnams kyis spyod ngan mi dge
NK046(mi)002:17543: ba sna tshogs byas pa'i dbang gis nad rigs mi
NK046(mi)002:17544: 'dra ba sna tshogs pa dang khyad par gnyan nad
NK046(mi)002:17545: nag po rgyug 'gyel la sogs pa'i ma rungs ba'i
NK046(mi)002:17546: nad kyis mnar ba'i semsa can 'jig rten gyi khams
NK046(mi)002:17547: na nad pa ji snyed yod pa de dag kyang
NK046(mi)002:17548: dus da lta myur ba nyid du tsha grang la
NK046(mi)002:17549: sogs pa'i nad rnams las thar bar gyur cig /
NK046(mi)002:17550: 'gro ba mtha' yas pa'i nada ni rlung mkhris bad
NK046(mi)002:17551: kan ldan pa'i nad rigs bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi la
NK046(mi)002:17552: sogs pa ma lus pa rnams dus rtag tu 'jig
NK046(mi)002:17553: rten gyi khams kun tu gang zag su la'ang 'byung
NK046(mi)002:17555: rgyal po dang chom rkun sha za me chu dug
NK046(mi)002:17556: sbrul la sogs pa'i 'jigs pa chen po bcu drug
NK046(mi)002:17557: gis 'jigs shing skrag pa rnams la ni 'jigas pa
NK046(mi)002:17558: de dag med cing mi 'byung bar shog cig /
NK046(mi)002:17559: yan lag lcags sgrog la sogs pas bcing ba dang
NK046(mi)002:17560: sgo gsum byad kyis bcingas pa rnams ni 'ching ba
NK046(mi)002:17561: sna tshogs pa las grol zhing thar bar gyur cig
NK046(mi)002:17562: / mtha rgyal po nas dma' 'bu sprang yan chad
NK046(mi)002:17563: khas zhan cing dbang chung bas mthu stobs nus pa
NK046(mi)002:17564: med pa rnams ni khas drag cing dbang che bas
NK046(mi)002:17565: mthu stobs nus pa dang ldan zhing phun sum tshogs
NK046(mi)002:17566: par gyur nas kyang nga rgyal phrag dog 'khrug rtsod
NK046(mi)002:17567: sogs med par sems ni phan tshun brtse zhing byams
NK046(mi)002:17568: pas mnyen zhing 'jam pa dang ldan pas 'grogs par
NK046(mi)002:17569: / gyur cig / tshong la sogs pa lugs gnyis
NK046(mi)002:17570: gang gi don du lam du zhugs pa'i 'gron po
NK046(mi)002:17571: dag ni gang su yang rung ba thamsa cad la
NK046(mi)002:17572: yang gang du 'gro ba'i phyogsa rnams thamsa cad du
NK046(mi)002:17573: mi nad dang phyugs nad dgra rkun la sogs pa'i
NK046(mi)002:17574: 'gal rkyen nyer 'tshe med cing bkra shis pa'i mthun
NK046(mi)002:17575: rkyen phun sum tshogs pas lam 'jam zhing bde bar
NK046(mi)002:17576: / gyur cig / shog shig / rang rang gser
NK046(mi)002:17577: dngul la sogs pa lugs gnyis kyi dgos pa gang
NK046(mi)002:17578: gi don du 'gro bar byed pa yi don de
NK046(mi)002:17579: thams cad kyang 'abda pa dang rtsol pa gang yang
NK046(mi)002:17580: mi dgosa par lhun gyis 'grub par gyur cig /
NK046(mi)002:17581: chu bo chen po la gru dang rgya mtsho chen
NK046(mi)002:17582: po la gru chen po gzings su zhugsa pa rnams
NK046(mi)002:17583: dus min gyi rlung dang chu srin la sogs pa'i
NK046(mi)002:17584: gnod pa'i nyer 'tshe ci yang med par yid bzhin
NK046(mi)002:17585: gyi nor bu rin po che len pa la sogs
NK046(mi)002:17586: pa'i yid la bsam pa yi don thams cad 'bad
NK046(mi)002:17587: rtsol med par 'grub par gyur te chu yi tshu
NK046(mi)002:17588: rol ngogas su lus sems bdera te bde bar phyin
NK046(mi)002:17589: nas rang rang gi pha ma gnyen grogs rnams dang
NK046(mi)002:17590: lhan cig tu gzhi byes kun bde bar gdong 'dzom
NK046(mi)002:17591: ste dga' bde'i gtam dang ston mo sna tshogs byed
NK046(mi)002:17593: mya ngan ste r+ts+wa chu shing sogs med pas dben
NK046(mi)002:17594: pa'am mya ngan gyi thang dang nags tshal 'jigs su
NK046(mi)002:17595: rung ba la sogs pa rnams su lam gol ba'am
NK046(mi)002:17596: nor nas gar 'gro gtol med pas 'khyams pa rnams
NK046(mi)002:17597: la lam ston pa'i don mthun gyi 'gron po dag
NK046(mi)002:17598: dang phrad par gyur nas chom rkun dang stag seng
NK046(mi)002:17599: dug sbrul la sogas pa'i 'jigas pa med para lam
NK046(mi)002:17600: du dka' tshegs kyis mi ngal bar bde blag nyid
NK046(mi)002:17602: stag gzig dug sbrul la sogs pa'i 'jigs pa dang
NK046(mi)002:17603: bcas pa'i 'brog dgona pa mi yi rgyu 'grul med
NK046(mi)002:17604: cing 'dre srin sogs mi min gdug pa can gnas
NK046(mi)002:17605: par grags pa brag ri gzings mtho ba la sogsa
NK046(mi)002:17606: pa lam med cing nyam nga bar ste 'jigs chum
NK046(mi)002:17607: me pa'i gnas su byis pa gzhon nu dang rgan
NK046(mi)002:17608: po lo lon mgon med pa sprang po dag lam
NK046(mi)002:17609: du ngal zhing dub pas gnyid du log pa dang
NK046(mi)002:17610: myos te dran pa nyams shing rab tu myos pas
NK046(mi)002:17611: bag med par gyur te bla 'khyam pa rnams tshe
NK046(mi)002:17612: len mdang 'phrog srog gcod pa la sogs pa'i 'dre
NK046(mi)002:17613: srin po sha za 'byung pos za bar byed pas
NK046(mi)002:17614: na de dag la 'phags pa'i lha gtsang ris kyi
NK046(mi)002:17615: dpal mgon bdun cu rtsa lnga la sogs pa dang
NK046(mi)002:17616: rang rang gi 'go ba'i lha lnga dang yul de'i
NK046(mi)002:17617: gzhi bdag sogs dkar phyogs kyi lha dag gis bar
NK046(mi)002:17618: chad las bsrung ba dang skyabs par byed par shog
NK046(mi)002:17619: cig / 'dre la'ang sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la dad pa can yod de /
NK046(mi)002:17620: dge slong gnyis lam du 'gro ba la sangs rgyas
NK046(mi)002:17621: kyi bstan pa la dad pa dang mi dad srin
NK046(mi)002:17622: po gnyis kyang rjes su 'brang ste mi dad pa
NK046(mi)002:17623: des 'di gnyis kyi tshe len cing mdangs 'phrog go
NK046(mi)002:17624: zhes zer ba la dad pa can des 'di gnyis
NK046(mi)002:17625: kyi chos zhig gsungs na de ltar mi byed ma
NK046(mi)002:17626: gsung na de ltar byed do zhes song ba na
NK046(mi)002:17627: de gnyis kyis don med kyi gtam bshad nas zam
NK046(mi)002:17628: kha zhig nas phan tshun bag yod par gyis shig
NK046(mi)002:17629: ces brjod nas rang rang so sor 'gro ba na
NK046(mi)002:17630: srin po gcig shos skra gzings ba sogs tshe len
NK046(mi)002:17631: cing mdangs 'phrog pa'i nyams ston pa la gcig shos
NK046(mi)002:17632: kyis khyod ci byed chos gsungs pa ma thos sam
NK046(mi)002:17633: / ci gsungs so sor 'gro ba na bag yod
NK046(mi)002:17634: par gyis shig ces brjod pas bag yod pa las
NK046(mi)002:17635: lhag pa'i chos ci zhig yod ces des de gnyis
NK046(mi)002:17636: bsrung bar byas pa lta bu'o //
NK046(mi)002:17637: lus can thams cad mi dal zhing mi khoms pa'i
NK046(mi)002:17638: gnas brgyad po'i sdug bsngal kun lasa thar nas dal
NK046(mi)002:17639: ba mi yi lus rten bzang po thob pa'i bde
NK046(mi)002:17640: ba dang ldan par shog cig /
NK046(mi)002:17641: mir gyur na'ang rang rgyud log ltas bslad pa rnams
NK046(mi)002:17642: snod kha sbu ba lta bur sangs rgyas byon kyang
NK046(mi)002:17643: don du mi 'gyur bas dkon mchog dang bden bzhi
NK046(mi)002:17644: rten 'brel dang khyad par las rgyu 'bras la yid
NK046(mi)002:17645: ches kyi dad pa med na blang dor phyin ci
NK046(mi)002:17646: log tu gyur nas ngan song du brgyud mar 'jug
NK046(mi)002:17647: pa las med pas na de dag sdug bsngal dang
NK046(mi)002:17648: bral te dang 'dod yid ches phyir mi ldog pa'i
NK046(mi)002:17649: dad pa phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan par shog
NK046(mi)002:17650: cig / blang dor gyi gnas legs par shes pa'i
NK046(mi)002:17651: shes rab kyi mig long bas blun zhing rmongs ba
NK046(mi)002:17652: rnams kyis 'jig rten tshe 'di'i don tsam yang mi
NK046(mi)002:17653: 'grub na dam pa'i chos mi shes pa dang mi
NK046(mi)002:17654: 'grub pa lta smos kyang ci dgos /
NK046(mi)002:17655: des na shes rab med pa rnams kyis rang gzhan
NK046(mi)002:17656: gyi don mi 'grub pa sogs rmongs pa'i sdug bsngal
NK046(mi)002:17657: dang bral te skyes sbyang gi shes rab phun sum
NK046(mi)002:17658: tshogs pa dang ldan pa dang /
NK046(mi)002:17659: theg chen lam gyi rtsa ba sems can la snying
NK046(mi)002:17660: rje yin pas de dang bral nas sems can rnams
NK046(mi)002:17661: la snying rje med pa'i bsam sbyor gyis 'di phyi
NK046(mi)002:17662: gnyis phung gi sdug bsngal dang bral te sems can
NK046(mi)002:17663: rnams la ma ltar brtser ldan zhing ste brtse ba'i
NK046(mi)002:17664: snying rje chen po dang ldan pa dang ma dag
NK046(mi)002:17665: pa'i sdig zas sha chang sogs dang /
NK046(mi)002:17668: tshul 'chos rnyed dang bkur sti'i phyir //
NK046(mi)002:17669: dbang po sdom par byed pa ste //
NK046(mi)002:17670: kha gsag rnyed dang bkur sti'i phyir //
NK046(mi)002:17672: gzhog slong de ni thob bya'i phyir //
NK046(mi)002:17673: gzhan gyi rdzas la basngagasa byed pa'o //
NK046(mi)002:17674: thob kyis 'jal ba rnyed pa'i phyir //
NK046(mi)002:17675: mngon sum gzhan la smod byed pa'o //
NK046(mi)002:17676: rnyed pas rnyed pa rnams 'dod pa //
NK046(mi)002:17677: sngar thob la basngagasa byed pa'o //
NK046(mi)002:17679: ldan grol med pas dad zas gshin dkor ste /
NK046(mi)002:17681: mi slob pa ni bdag por spyod //
NK046(mi)002:17682: slob pa byin pa spyod pa ste //
NK046(mi)002:17683: bsam gtan klog dang ldan pa la //
NK046(mi)002:17684: rjes gnang spyod pas nyes pa med //
NK046(mi)002:17685: lhag ma le los bcom pa yi //
NK046(mi)002:17686: bdag nyid rnams ni bu lon spyod //
NK046(mi)002:17687: tshul 'chal rnams la nam du yang //
NK046(mi)002:17688: gtsug lag khang sogs nyer spyod bkag /
NK046(mi)002:17691: tshul khrims 'chal pas sa ni goms pa gang //
NK046(mi)002:17692: zas ni kham gcig btung ba chu phor gang //
NK046(mi)002:17693: tsam zhig dge 'dun rdzas la longs spyod na //
NK046(mi)002:17694: log 'tsho yin te dmyal bar skye bar gsungs //
NK046(mi)002:17696: ma dag pa'i zas sogs la longs spyod pa rnams
NK046(mi)002:17697: de dang bral nas 'tsho ba bya tshol byis tshol
NK046(mi)002:17698: gang byung des chog sdig dang ma 'dres pas 'tsho
NK046(mi)002:17699: ba rnam par dag pa'i zas phun sum tshogs pa
NK046(mi)002:17700: dang / spyod pa ngan pa pha mar brnyas zhing smod pa dang tshong khe spogs /
NK046(mi)002:17701: bshas nyo bshas btsong bag med tho co khyim pa
NK046(mi)002:17702: sun 'byin gyi spyod pa dkon mchog gi rkang 'dren
NK046(mi)002:17703: / bstan pa'i bla btsong sdom pa nyams shing dam
NK046(mi)002:17704: tshig 'chal ba'i spyod pa ngan pas rang gzhan gnyis
NK046(mi)002:17705: phung gi spyod ngan dang bral nas mna' mi za
NK046(mi)002:17708: mi chos gtsang ma bcu drug gis gzhung bzung /
NK046(mi)002:17709: lha chos 'phags pa'i nor bdun byis rgyud 'byor bas brgyan te /
NK046(mi)002:17710: tshul khrims rnam par dag pas gzhi byas te /
NK046(mi)002:17711: klog pa thos bsam dang spong ba bsam gtan la
NK046(mi)002:17712: rtse gcig tu spyod pa rnams par dag pa phun
NK046(mi)002:17713: sum tshogsa pa'i sgo nas bstan 'gro phan pa bla
NK046(mi)002:17714: na med pa dang ldan par shog cig /
NK046(mi)002:17715: tshe rabs dran na las rgyu 'bras la yid ches pa dang /
NK046(mi)002:17716: byang chub sems kyi rigs sad de byang chub kyi
NK046(mi)002:17717: sems mi brjed pa la sogs pa'i don chen po
NK046(mi)002:17718: yod pas gang du skyes pa'i skye ba thams cad
NK046(mi)002:17719: du dus rtag tu tshe rabsa thams cad dran pa
NK046(mi)002:17721: de yang dper na sh+aa ri'i bus chos gsung ba
NK046(mi)002:17722: thos pa'i khyi mo shi ba bu mor skyes pas
NK046(mi)002:17723: tshe rabs dran nas rab tu byung ste brtson pas
NK046(mi)002:17724: dgra bcom pa thob par gyur ba dang /
NK046(mi)002:17725: rgyal bu lkug 'phye lta bu yin no //
NK046(mi)002:17726: byang chub sems dpa' rnams nam mkha' mdzod kyi ting
NK046(mi)002:17727: nge 'dzin thob pa na gter chen po g.yas na
NK046(mi)002:17728: lnga brgya dang g.yon na lnga brgya la sogs pa'i
NK046(mi)002:17729: longs spyod dang ci 'dod thams cad nam mkha' las
NK046(mi)002:17730: 'byung bar 'gyur ba ltar 'gro ba sems can thams
NK046(mi)002:17731: cad nam mkha' mdzod bzhina du chos dang mthun pa'i
NK046(mi)002:17732: longas spyod rgya che zhing rgyun chad pa med para
NK046(mi)002:17733: shog cig / longs spyod kyi ched du nyin gyi
NK046(mi)002:17734: bya ra mtshan gyi mel tshe la sogs pas ngal
NK046(mi)002:17735: dub dang phan tshun 'thab pa dang rtsod pa med
NK046(mi)002:17736: cinga dgra gdon gyi gnod 'tshe med par rang rang
NK046(mi)002:17737: gis dabnga thob pa nyid du ni ci 'dod dang
NK046(mi)002:17738: ci bder longs spyod par shog cig /
NK046(mi)002:17739: semsa can gang lha rnams la gzugs ngan pa dang
NK046(mi)002:17740: gzi brjid chung ngu gang gzugs bzang zhing gzi brjid
NK046(mi)002:17741: che ba rnams kyis zil gyis gnon pa'i sdug bsngal
NK046(mi)002:17742: dang mi la'ang bla ma dpon po sogs gzugs dang
NK046(mi)002:17743: gzi brjid ngan pa la mi dga' zhing rang yang
NK046(mi)002:17744: nyams mi bde ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal dang
NK046(mi)002:17745: bral nas lha mi de dag gzugs bzang zhing gzi
NK046(mi)002:17746: brjid phun sum tshogs pa chen por shog cig /
NK046(mi)002:17747: gzugs ngan pa'i sdug bsngal dper na bu mo rdo rje ma lta bu la sogs pa'o //
NK046(mi)002:17748: kha zas med rgyab gos med pa la sogs pa'i
NK046(mi)002:17749: dka' thub can gyi gang zag gang zhig dka' thub
NK046(mi)002:17750: kyi dbang gis gzugsa ri da cing ngan par gyur
NK046(mi)002:17751: pa de dag thams cad gzugsa bazanga po phun sum
NK046(mi)002:17752: tshogsa pa dang ldan par gyur cig /
NK046(mi)002:17753: 'jiga rten gyi khams na bud med dbang chud zhing
NK046(mi)002:17754: mngal 'dzin pa dang mo nad so gnyis la sogs
NK046(mi)002:17755: pa'i nad kyang mang bar gyur ba ji snyed yod
NK046(mi)002:17756: pa de dag thams cad skyes pa'i lus phun tshun
NK046(mi)002:17757: tshogs pa nyid thob par gyur cig /
NK046(mi)002:17758: rigs dang longs spyod la sogs pa dman pas rta
NK046(mi)002:17759: bsha' gto len ro khur shan pa la sogs pa'i
NK046(mi)002:17760: ma rabs rnams ni gzhan dag gis brnyas shing smad
NK046(mi)002:17761: pa'i gnas su gyur pa yin pas de dang bral
NK046(mi)002:17762: nas rigs dang longs spyod che zhing mtho ba'i go
NK046(mi)002:17763: sa thob par gyur cig de dag gi dregs pa
NK046(mi)002:17764: dang nga rgyal dag kyang bcom nas zhi dul dang
NK046(mi)002:17766: badga gi dus gsum du bsags pa'i bsoda nams dge
NK046(mi)002:17767: ba 'di nyid kyi mthu yis ni nam mkha' dang
NK046(mi)002:17768: mnyam pa'i sems can thams cad ma lus pa rnams
NK046(mi)002:17769: kyi rgyu sdig pa mi dge ba'i las thamsa cad
NK046(mi)002:17770: spang nasa ni dus rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par
NK046(mi)002:17771: dge ba phun sum tshogs pa byed para shog cig
NK046(mi)002:17772: / khyad par du byang chub sems dpa'i lam thams
NK046(mi)002:17773: cad bsam sbyor gnyis su 'du bas bsam pa byang
NK046(mi)002:17774: chub kyi semsa smon 'jug gnyis dang mi 'bral zhing
NK046(mi)002:17775: sbyor ba pha rol du phyin pa drug gis gzhan
NK046(mi)002:17776: don bsgrub pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la
NK046(mi)002:17777: / gzhola ba dang / mthun rkyen grogs sangsa rgyas
NK046(mi)002:17778: dang byang chub sems dpa'i rnams kyis thugs brtse ba
NK046(mi)002:17779: chen pos yongsa su bzung zhing bdag gir mdzad pa
NK046(mi)002:17781: 'dzi dang rnam g.yeng gnyid rmug rgod 'gyod la sogs
NK046(mi)002:17782: pa'i bdud kyi las rnams ma lus pa spong par
NK046(mi)002:17783: / gzhola ba dang / dang / shog cig /
NK046(mi)002:17784: bdud las de la yang mdo las mang du gsungs
NK046(mi)002:17785: / gzhola ba dang / dang / shog cig /
NK046(mi)002:17786: ba / byams pas sher phyin du bsdus pa lta
NK046(mi)002:17787: / gzhola ba dang / dang / shog cig /
NK046(mi)002:17788: ba / bu ste / de yang nyams len brtson
NK046(mi)002:17789: 'grus can la bdud ni lhag par ldang /
NK046(mi)002:17790: zhes brtson 'grus che yang shes rab med na bdud
NK046(mi)002:17791: kyis bar chad byed nus te bdud bshes gnyen du
NK046(mi)002:17793: khyod sngon sbyongs pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa 'di
NK046(mi)002:17794: 'dra'o zhes sogs yon tan dang ldan par lung ston
NK046(mi)002:17795: pa dang / kha ton 'don pa gcig pus chog zer ba sogs dang /
NK046(mi)002:17796: bla slob spyod pa ma mthun pas chos 'chad nyan lus pa dang /
NK046(mi)002:17797: rang gi tshul khrims sogs la mchog 'dzin dang /
NK046(mi)002:17799: 'dod yon bdud kyis g.yab mo yin //
NK046(mi)002:17800: zhes gsungs pa ltar mngon shes rnyed bkur sogs kyang bdud las yin no //
NK046(mi)002:17801: de la le lo can la bdud med de le lo de nyid bdud yin par gsungs so //
NK046(mi)002:17802: shes rab can la bdud med de /
NK046(mi)002:17804: rgyu rnams bzhi yis byang chub sems dpa' mkhas stobs ldan //
NK046(mi)002:17805: bdud bzhis thub par dka' zhing bskyod par mi nus te //
NK046(mi)002:17806: stong par gnas dang sems can yongs su mi gtong dang //
NK046(mi)002:17807: ji skad smras bzhin byed dang bde gshegs byin rlabs can //
NK046(mi)002:17809: bde 'gror skyes pa'i semsa can de dag thamsa cad
NK046(mi)002:17810: ni tshe yanga dapaga tu med pa thub cing yun
NK046(mi)002:17811: ring du gnas par shog cig /
NK046(mi)002:17812: ji srid gnas pa'i bar du yang longs spyod phun
NK046(mi)002:17813: sum tshogs pa dang ldan pas dus rtag tu bde
NK046(mi)002:17814: bar 'tsho bar 'gyur zhing dus ma yin par 'chi
NK046(mi)002:17815: ba'i sgra tsam yanga gragsa par ma gyur cig /
NK046(mi)002:17817: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du ci 'dod 'byung
NK046(mi)002:17818: ba'i dapaga bsam gyi shing gi skyed mosa tshal phun
NK046(mi)002:17819: sum tshogs pa yid du 'ong ba rnams su sangsa
NK046(mi)002:17820: rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang ni sangsa rgyas kyi
NK046(mi)002:17821: sras byang chub sems dpa' chosa kyi sgra snyan pa
NK046(mi)002:17822: yid du 'ong ba 'ba' zhig sgrogsa pasa gang ba
NK046(mi)002:17823: yis sa'i phyogsa rnams thams cad gang bar shog cig
NK046(mi)002:17824: / gnas thamsa cad du yang sa yi gzhi dag
NK046(mi)002:17825: ni rdo dang gsega ma dang ngam grog gcod rong
NK046(mi)002:17826: tsher ma la sogas pa med pa dang /
NK046(mi)002:17827: lag mthil ltar khod mnyam zhing tha gru yangs ba
NK046(mi)002:17828: blta na sdug pa beed+au r+ya'i rang bzhina las grub
NK046(mi)002:17829: pa tshon sna brgya rtsa gcig la sogs pas mig
NK046(mi)002:17830: mngas ris su bris pa lha'i gos ka tsa li
NK046(mi)002:17831: ka ltar reg na 'ajama pora gyur pa la sogs
NK046(mi)002:17832: pa'i yon tan dang ldan par gansa par gyur cig
NK046(mi)002:17833: / dgon sde dang yul khams la sogs par sangs
NK046(mi)002:17834: rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' bla ma dang rgyal
NK046(mi)002:17835: po la sogs pa'i tshul bzung ba'i gtso bo la
NK046(mi)002:17836: 'khor gra slob dang blon 'bangs kyi 'khor gyis bskor
NK046(mi)002:17837: ba ste gang na gtso bo la 'khor gyis bskor
NK046(mi)002:17838: bas 'khora gyi dkyil 'khor yod do cog gam yoda
NK046(mi)002:17839: dgud yanga gtso bo byang chub semsa dpa' mang po
NK046(mi)002:17840: dag rang rang gi legas pasa te bsod nams dang
NK046(mi)002:17841: rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs las byung ba zang zing nor
NK046(mi)002:17842: gyi 'byor pa dang dam pa chos kyi 'byor pa
NK046(mi)002:17843: phun sum tshogs pas 'khor rnams chos dang 'jig rten
NK046(mi)002:17844: gyi 'byor bas phongs pa thams cad bsal zhing lung
NK046(mi)002:17845: sde snod gsum gyi 'chad nyan dang lam bslab pa
NK046(mi)002:17846: gsum gyi nyams len gyi 'byor pa rgyas shing 'phel
NK046(mi)002:17847: ba dang tshe bsod mnga' thang longs spyod kyi 'byor
NK046(mi)002:17848: pa rgyas shing 'phel bar byed pa'i yon tan gyis
NK046(mi)002:17849: sa yi steng mtha' dag brgyan para madzada pasa ste
NK046(mi)002:17850: mdzad pa'i sgo nas sku tshe yun ring por bzhugs
NK046(mi)002:17851: / par gyur cig / rang nyid gang du sangs
NK046(mi)002:17852: rgyas pa'i gnas sam phyogs bcu'i zhing thams cad du
NK046(mi)002:17853: lus can ma lus pa kun gyis ngang pa'i rgyal
NK046(mi)002:17854: po dus bzang dang rma bya'i rgyal po gser du
NK046(mi)002:17855: snang ba lta bu la sogs pa bya yid du
NK046(mi)002:17856: 'ong ba rnams dang ni shing gi khyad par sna
NK046(mi)002:17857: tshogs pa dang nyi zla la sogs pa'i 'od zer
NK046(mi)002:17858: thamsa cad dang bar snang gi nam mkha'a las kyang
NK046(mi)002:17859: / par gyur cig / / 'du byed thams cad mi rtag pa dang /
NK046(mi)002:17860: zag pa dang bcas pa sdug bsngal pa dang /
NK046(mi)002:17861: chos thams cad stong zhing bdag med pa dang /
NK046(mi)002:17862: mya ngan las 'das pa zhi pa'o //
NK046(mi)002:17863: zhes chos kyi sdom pa zhi dang /
NK046(mi)002:17864: rnam par thar ba'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /
NK046(mi)002:17866: smon pa med pa ste rnam thar sgo gsum la
NK046(mi)002:17867: sogs pa'i zab pa dang rgya che ba'i chos kyi
NK046(mi)002:17868: sgra rgyun mi 'achada par thos para shog cig /
NK046(mi)002:17869: de ltar chos thos pa'i phan yon yang /
NK046(mi)002:17871: rgyal po gang tshe yul 'khor du //
NK046(mi)002:17873: der ni dpal dang grags pa dang //
NK046(mi)002:17875: pha rol gyis ni 'jigs med cing //
NK046(mi)002:17877: sangs rgyas byin rlabs 'byor ba yis //
NK046(mi)002:17879: dmyal ba yi dwags ji snyed rnams //
NK046(mi)002:17881: thams cad sangs rgyas rtag dad cing //
NK046(mi)002:17882: thams cad chos la gzhol bar 'gyur //
NK046(mi)002:17885: 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rnams //
NK046(mi)002:17886: der ni nub par 'gyur ba yin //
NK046(mi)002:17887: chos kyi rnga ni brdung ba yis //
NK046(mi)002:17888: gang gis rna lam grags gyur cing //
NK046(mi)002:17889: dus bzhi dag tu thos pa yis //
NK046(mi)002:17890: de rnams byang chub thob par 'gyur //
NK046(mi)002:17893: lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin gyis mchod pa'i //
NK046(mi)002:17894: dkon mchog gsum gyi tog ste 'di brdungs pas //
NK046(mi)002:17895: mu stegs 'chal ba'i glad pa rnams par 'gem //
NK046(mi)002:17896: zhes gsungs pa la sogs pa bzhin du gan+di la
NK046(mi)002:17897: sogs pa'i chos rnga'i sgra tsam thos pa la de
NK046(mi)002:17898: 'dra'i phan yon yod na chos dngos su thos shing
NK046(mi)002:17899: 'chad nyan byas pa'i phan yon lta smos kyang ci
NK046(mi)002:17900: dgos / lus can de dag thams cad dus rtag
NK046(mi)002:17901: tu sangsa rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang sangsa rgyas
NK046(mi)002:17902: kyi sras byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams dang
NK046(mi)002:17904: 'phrad nas kyang dngos 'byor yid sprul la sogs pa'i
NK046(mi)002:17905: mchoda pa'i sprin gyi phung po ni mtha'a yasa pas
NK046(mi)002:17906: 'gro ba'i bla ma rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa
NK046(mi)002:17907: rnams la mchoda pa rgyun mi 'chad par byed par
NK046(mi)002:17908: shog cig / skye dgu sems can rnams kyi dkar
NK046(mi)002:17909: po dge ba'i las byas na de'i stobs kyis lha
NK046(mi)002:17910: rnams rgyal zhing lha min rnams pham par gyur nas
NK046(mi)002:17911: dkar phyogs dbu 'phang mtho zhing dkar phyogs kyi lha
NK046(mi)002:17912: klu mang po yang dus dus su char pa'i rgyun
NK046(mi)002:17914: de'i rgyus shing dang lo tog thams cad phun sum
NK046(mi)002:17915: tshogas par smin nas yul bar lo legs shing 'brog
NK046(mi)002:17916: par phyugs rnams 'phel bar shog cig /
NK046(mi)002:17917: rgyal khams thams cad du nad mug 'khrugs rtsod sogs
NK046(mi)002:17918: med pa dang bde skyid dpal 'byor yod pa'i rgyu
NK046(mi)002:17919: 'jig rten skyong ba'i rgyal po dang chos rgyal mes
NK046(mi)002:17920: dbon rnam gsum la sogs pa ji ltar chos bzhina
NK046(mi)002:17921: du chos srid zhi bas skyong bar byed par gyur
NK046(mi)002:17922: cig / rgyal po'i chos bzhin byed pa'i mthu la brten nas phyi snod kyi dang /
NK046(mi)002:17923: nang bcud kyi sems can 'jiga rten mtha' dag kyang
NK046(mi)002:17924: rgud pa thams cad dang bral te bde 'byor chen
NK046(mi)002:17925: pos dar zhing rgyas par shog cig /
NK046(mi)002:17926: dus rung dang thun tshod dang zhag bdun pa'i dang /
NK046(mi)002:17927: 'tsho bcang ste sman bzhi po rnams kyang nad rnams
NK046(mi)002:17928: sel ba'i nus mthu phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan
NK046(mi)002:17929: pa dang / las gang 'grub par byed pa'i gsang
NK046(mi)002:17930: sngags kyi bzlas brjod byas pa las ji skad bshad
NK046(mi)002:17931: pa'i phan yon rnams mngon sum du myur du 'agrub
NK046(mi)002:17932: pa dang / par shoga cig / mkha' la rgyu
NK046(mi)002:17933: zhing 'gro ba'i 'byung po dang srin po dang gnod
NK046(mi)002:17934: sbyin dang sha za dang rgya 'dre 'gong po la
NK046(mi)002:17935: sogas pa bsam pa ngan zhing sbyor brtsub pa'i gdug
NK046(mi)002:17936: pa can gyi bsam sbyor ngan pa thams cad zhi
NK046(mi)002:17937: zhing byams pa dang snying rje'i semsa dang ldan par
NK046(mi)002:17938: pa dang / par shoga cig / gyur cig /
NK046(mi)002:17939: mdor na semsa can 'ag'a ste gcig tsam la yanga
NK046(mi)002:17940: lus dang sems la sdug bsngal ci yang myong bar
NK046(mi)002:17941: pa dang / par shoga cig / gyur cig /
NK046(mi)002:17942: ma gyur cig / sdug bsngal de'i rgyu sdig pa
NK046(mi)002:17943: la spyod par yang ma gyur la na bas gdung
NK046(mi)002:17945: 'jigas pa sna tshogs dang gzhan gyis brnyas bar yang
NK046(mi)002:17946: mi 'gyur zhing sems can 'ga' yanga yida mi bde
NK046(mi)002:17947: bar yang ma gyur nas rtag tu bde zhing dga'
NK046(mi)002:17948: bas dge ba la gnas par shog cig /
NK046(mi)002:17949: gtsuga lag ste gsung rab sde snod gsum bzhugs pa'i
NK046(mi)002:17950: khang pa che chung mang po'i yod pa'i dgon sde
NK046(mi)002:17951: rnams su lung sde snod gsum gyi 'chad nyan byed
NK046(mi)002:17952: pa'i klog pa thos bsam pa dang mdo sde sogs
NK046(mi)002:17953: thugs su bzung ba rnams mi brjed pa'i phyir 'don
NK046(mi)002:17954: pa'i kha ton byed pa dang 'dzin pa dang don
NK046(mi)002:17955: rtse gcig tu sems zhing bsgom pas spong ba bsam
NK046(mi)002:17956: gtan gyis te mdor na dgon sde gang ji snyed
NK046(mi)002:17957: pa rnams sangs rgyas kyi rjes 'jug rnams kyi bya
NK046(mi)002:17958: ba'i las spangs ba bsam gtan pa dang klog pa
NK046(mi)002:17959: thos bsam byed pas rgyas shing gang bas legas par
NK046(mi)002:17960: yun ring du gansa par shog cig /
NK046(mi)002:17961: de ltar ma yin par tshong dang so nam /
NK046(mi)002:17962: rta nor gyi g.yog las phan tshun chags sdang gi zug rngu nyin mtshan rnam g.yeng gi 'du 'dzi /
NK046(mi)002:17963: dgra gyod 'khon gsum gyi 'khor lo dang /
NK046(mi)002:17964: khyad par dge 'dun 'khrugs rtsod byas pa'i gnas sam
NK046(mi)002:17965: sa der nyams rtogs kyi yon tan ci yang rang
NK046(mi)002:17966: rgyud la skye med srid de /
NK046(mi)002:17967: dper na mes tshig pa la myu gu sngon po skye mi srid pa bzhin yin pas na /
NK046(mi)002:17969: dpag tshad brgya yi pha rol 'gro //
NK046(mi)002:17971: des na dus rtag tu gang na dge 'dun bzhugs
NK046(mi)002:17972: pa rnams bdud la sogs pas mi phyed cing dge
NK046(mi)002:17973: ba'i bya ba la thugs mthun pa dang /
NK046(mi)002:17974: nya stongs kyi gso sbyong gis tshul khrims mthun par byed pa dang /
NK046(mi)002:17975: zhi gnas kyi gso sbyong sogs kyis lta ba mthun par byas te /
NK046(mi)002:17976: dge 'dun rnams kyis bsgrub par bya ba'i don thar
NK046(mi)002:17977: pa mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam gyi yon tan
NK046(mi)002:17978: khyad par can yanga gong nas gong du thugs kyi
NK046(mi)002:17979: bzhed pa bzhin du 'grub para shog cig /
NK046(mi)002:17980: bslab pa rin po che gsum la tshul bzhin du
NK046(mi)002:17981: slob par 'doda pa'i dge slong dag gi phyi nang
NK046(mi)002:17982: gsang ba'i dbena pa phun sum tshogs pa dag kyang
NK046(mi)002:17984: der yang 'du 'dzi sems rnam par g.yeng ba thamsa
NK046(mi)002:17985: cad spangsa nas ni rang gi semsa ni btang 'gro
NK046(mi)002:17986: bzhag sdod la rang dbang 'byor bas lus sems shin
NK046(mi)002:17987: sbyang gi bde ba thob pas las su rung zhing
NK046(mi)002:17988: spro bas ting nge 'dzin rnam par dag pa zab
NK046(mi)002:17990: dge slong ma rnams kyang chos gos dang kha zas
NK046(mi)002:17991: la sogs pa tshegs chung ngus rnyed pa dang ldan
NK046(mi)002:17992: zhing nang phan tshun 'thab pa dang tshul khrims sma
NK046(mi)002:17993: 'bebs pa sogs kyi gnoda pa thams cad spangsa nas
NK046(mi)002:17994: zhi dul bag yod dang ldan pas dam pa'i chos
NK046(mi)002:17996: de bzhina du thar ba 'dod pas 'khyams nas khyim
NK046(mi)002:17997: med par rab tu byung ba ma lus pa kun
NK046(mi)002:17998: nyon mongs pa'i tsha gdung zhi bar byed pa'i tshul
NK046(mi)002:17999: khrims ji ltar khas blang ba rnams dus nam yang
NK046(mi)002:18000: nyams pa med par bsrung nus par gyur cig /
NK046(mi)002:18001: tshul khrims ma bsrung bar nyams pa'i nyes pa /
NK046(mi)002:18002: sangs rgyas nyid kyi bka' las /
NK046(mi)002:18003: dam chos thob par mi 'gyur zhing //
NK046(mi)002:18004: thos pa myur du brjed par 'gyur //
NK046(mi)002:18005: sa lam rtogs pa'ang yongs mi skye //
NK046(mi)002:18007: tshul khrims 'chal ba ngan 'gror de 'gro ste //
NK046(mi)002:18008: de la thos pa mang pos skyob mi 'gyur //
NK046(mi)002:18011: tshul khrims 'chal la thub dbang gis //
NK046(mi)002:18012: sngags sgrub pa ni ma gsungs so //
NK046(mi)002:18014: gal te ltur ba byung nas tshul khrimsa 'achala bas
NK046(mi)002:18015: te 'chal bar gyur na'ang de la snying nas 'gyod
NK046(mi)002:18016: pa drag pos yid byung nasa bshags 'os rnams bshags
NK046(mi)002:18017: bsdam 'os rnams bsdam nas phyir bcos te dus rtag
NK046(mi)002:18018: tu sdig pa mtha' dag zad cing byang bar byed
NK046(mi)002:18019: par shog cig / de ltar sdig ltung thams cad
NK046(mi)002:18020: byang nas rnam smin gyi 'bras bu ngan song du
NK046(mi)002:18021: mi skye bar gnas skabs su yang bde 'gro mtho
NK046(mi)002:18022: ris kyi go 'phang dag kyang thob par gyur nas
NK046(mi)002:18023: der yanga rab tu byung ste tshul khrims dang brtul
NK046(mi)002:18024: zhugsa rnam par dag pa mi nyamsa par bsrung bar
NK046(mi)002:18025: shog cig ces byed pa rgyun thun gyi 'bras bu
NK046(mi)002:18026: tshul khrims nyams par mi 'gyur ba dang /
NK046(mi)002:18027: rig pa'i gnas lnga la sogs pa dang bye brag
NK046(mi)002:18028: nang rig pa'i sde snod gsum la mkhas pa yi
NK046(mi)002:18029: gang zag rnams ni blang dor gyi mig 'byed pa
NK046(mi)002:18030: dang phan bde'i 'byung gnas rgyal ba'i bstan pa rin
NK046(mi)002:18031: po che 'dzin zhing spel bar byed pa po yin
NK046(mi)002:18032: pas na gzhan kun las khyad par du 'phags pas
NK046(mi)002:18033: bkur sti dang rim gro byed par gyur pa dang
NK046(mi)002:18034: / chos gos dang lhung bzed dang zas la sogs
NK046(mi)002:18035: pa'i bsod snyomsa dag kyang 'bad rtsol med par bde
NK046(mi)002:18036: blag tu rnyed para shog cig /
NK046(mi)002:18037: de la rang gi yon tan gyis nga rgyal zhing
NK046(mi)002:18038: gzhan gyi yon tan la phrag dog dang 'gran sems
NK046(mi)002:18039: la sogs pas gzhan la khyad gsod dang grub mtha'
NK046(mi)002:18040: gzhan la smod pas chos spang gi bya ba dang
NK046(mi)002:18041: tshul khrims 'chal ba'i nyes pa sogs spangs pas rang
NK046(mi)002:18042: gi rgyud ni yongsa su dag pa dang phyogsa rnams
NK046(mi)002:18043: kun tu makhasa btsun gyi snyan pa'i gragsa pa chen
NK046(mi)002:18045: tshul khrims 'chal ba rnams sam sems can gang du
NK046(mi)002:18046: yang rung ste phyi ma la ngan song gsum la
NK046(mi)002:18047: sogs pa'i sdug bsngal nam yang mi myong zhing dka'
NK046(mi)002:18048: ba dang ngal ba drag po spyad pa med para
NK046(mi)002:18049: yang thar pa sgrub pa la lha bas kyang ches
NK046(mi)002:18050: lhag par gyur pa'i dal 'byor gyi mi lus thob
NK046(mi)002:18051: pa nyid kyis ni de dag dka' tshegs med par
NK046(mi)002:18052: rdzogs pa'i sangsa rgyas kyi go 'phang rin po che
NK046(mi)002:18053: myur du 'grod par shoga cig ces pa'o //
NK046(mi)002:18054: gnyis pa mchog gi dgongs pa rdzogs par sngo ba
NK046(mi)002:18055: ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i sems can ma lus
NK046(mi)002:18056: pa kun gyis lan grangs mang po'i bar du phyogs
NK046(mi)002:18057: bcu na bzhugs pa'i sangsa rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams
NK046(mi)002:18058: cad la zang zing dang sgrub pa'i mchod pa rnams
NK046(mi)002:18059: kyis rgyun mi 'chad par byed cinga /
NK046(mi)002:18060: de dag gi byin rlabs la brten nas sangsa rgyas
NK046(mi)002:18061: rnams kyi thugs zag med kyi bde ba bsam gyis
NK046(mi)002:18062: mi khyab cing mtha' yas pa thob pa nyid kyis
NK046(mi)002:18063: sems can thams cad dus rtag tu bde ba chen
NK046(mi)002:18064: po dang ldan par gyur cig /
NK046(mi)002:18065: rgyal sras byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis
NK046(mi)002:18066: ni 'gro ba sems can thams cad rgyud smin cing
NK046(mi)002:18067: grol ba'i don thugs la ji ltar dgongs pa bzhin
NK046(mi)002:18068: du dngos su 'grub par shog cig /
NK046(mi)002:18069: 'gro ba thams cad kyi mgona po thams cad mkhyen
NK046(mi)002:18070: pa sangs rgyas dang sras byang chub sems dpa' chen
NK046(mi)002:18071: po'i tshogs dang bcas pa yis ni thugs la gang
NK046(mi)002:18072: dgongas pa ji lta ba bzhin du semsa can rnams
NK046(mi)002:18073: la'ang phan pa dang bde ba bla na med pa
NK046(mi)002:18074: de dag thams cad myur du 'byor bar shog cig
NK046(mi)002:18075: / de gnyis rim par byed pa po dang bya ba yul la yod pa'i cha las byas pa'o //
NK046(mi)002:18076: de bzhina du rten 'brel zab mo rtogs pa'i rang
NK046(mi)002:18077: byung gi ye shes kyis byang chub brnyes pa'i rang
NK046(mi)002:18078: sangsa rgyas rnams dang rang rang gi yongs 'dzin dam
NK046(mi)002:18079: pa gzhan las thos shing sgrogs las nyan thos rnams
NK046(mi)002:18080: kyang sdug bsngal mtha' dag zhi ba'i bde ba dang
NK046(mi)002:18081: yang ldan zhing mthar thug rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi
NK046(mi)002:18082: bde ba chen po thob par gyur cig ces pa'o
NK046(mi)002:18083: // gnyis pa rang don byang chub spyod pa'i rgyur bsngo ba ni /
NK046(mi)002:18084: rtsom pa po badga kyang lhag pa'i lha rje btsun
NK046(mi)002:18085: 'ajama pa'i dbyangs kyi bka' drin gyis nye bar bskyangs
NK046(mi)002:18086: ba la brten nas byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang
NK046(mi)002:18087: po rab tu dga' ba ma thob kyi bar du
NK046(mi)002:18088: dus rtag tu skye pa'i tshe rabsa thams cad du
NK046(mi)002:18089: tshe rabs snga ma rnams rjes su dran nas rgyu
NK046(mi)002:18090: 'bras la yid ches pa dang byang chub kyi sems
NK046(mi)002:18092: khyim na gnas pa ni 'di phyi gnyis phung gi
NK046(mi)002:18093: nyes pa thams cad kyi gzhir gyur pa yin la
NK046(mi)002:18094: / rab tu byung ba ni 'di phyi gnyis kar
NK046(mi)002:18095: phan bde'i yon tan thams cad kyi gzhir gyur pa
NK046(mi)002:18096: / yin pas na / rab tu byung ba tshul khrims rnam par dag pa'ang thob para shog cig /
NK046(mi)002:18097: de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la /
NK046(mi)002:18098: deng dus bslab pa sna gcig tsam blangs te srung
NK046(mi)002:18099: na bsod nams rgya chen po 'thob pa'i phan yon
NK046(mi)002:18101: bskal pa bye ba gang ga'i bye snyed du /
NK046(mi)002:18102: dad pa'i sems kyis zas dang skom rnams dang /
NK046(mi)002:18103: gdugs dang ba dan mar me'i phreng ba yis //
NK046(mi)002:18104: sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrigs rim gro byas //
NK046(mi)002:18105: gang zhig dam chos rab tu 'jig pa dang //
NK046(mi)002:18106: bde gshegs bstan pa 'gag par gyur ba'i tshe //
NK046(mi)002:18107: nyin mtshan du ni bslab pa gcig spyod pa //
NK046(mi)002:18108: de ni de las bsod nams khyad par 'phags //
NK046(mi)002:18109: zhes gsungs na rab tu byung zhing bslab pa ma
NK046(mi)002:18110: nyams par bsrung na rang gzhan gyi 'di phyi'i don
NK046(mi)002:18111: phun sum tshogs pa 'grub pa'i phan yon bsam gyis
NK046(mi)002:18112: mi khyab pa yod pa lta smos kyang ci dgos
NK046(mi)002:18113: so // de yang badga ni bsod snyoms la sogs
NK046(mi)002:18114: pa'i kha zas gyi nas te ngana don tsam gyis
NK046(mi)002:18115: kyang lus nyamsa stobs dang ldan zhing bde bar 'tsho
NK046(mi)002:18116: so // bar shog cig / sangs rgyas ma thob
NK046(mi)002:18117: kyi bar gyi tshe rabsa kun tu dge ba sgrub
NK046(mi)002:18118: pa la sgo gsum phyi nang gsang ba'i dbena par
NK046(mi)002:18119: gansa pa phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa'ang thob
NK046(mi)002:18120: so // bar shog cig / para shog cig /
NK046(mi)002:18121: ces pa ste de'i dgos pa yang gong du ji
NK046(mi)002:18123: dben gnas kyi yon tan bsams nas de'i phyogs su
NK046(mi)002:18124: goms pa bdun por na bskal pa gang ga'i klung
NK046(mi)002:18125: gi bye ma snyed du phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams
NK046(mi)002:18126: cad la mchod pa phul ba las kyang phan yon
NK046(mi)002:18127: che bar zla ba sgron me'i mdo las gsungs pa
NK046(mi)002:18128: bzhin no // 'grel ba rnams su slob dpon 'di nyid 'phags pa'i gang zag tu gsungs pas /
NK046(mi)002:18129: sa rab dga' ba thob bar du //
NK046(mi)002:18130: zhes pa sogs ni rjes 'jug rnams lam la bslab pa'i don to //
NK046(mi)002:18131: dus gang gi tshe rje btsun 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi
NK046(mi)002:18132: mtshan dpe'i zhal bzang mjal ba'am blta bar 'doda pa'am
NK046(mi)002:18133: chos kyi tshig don cung zad dri bar 'doda na
NK046(mi)002:18134: yanga de'i tshe mgona po 'ajama pa'i dbyangs de nyid
NK046(mi)002:18135: ni gegas dang sgrib pa ci yang med para yanga
NK046(mi)002:18136: mngon sum du mthong nas rnam pa kun tu rjes
NK046(mi)002:18137: su 'dzin cing skyong bar shog cig /
NK046(mi)002:18138: phyogs bcu yi 'jig rten gyi khams nam mkha'i mathasa
NK046(mi)002:18139: gtugs par khyab pa'i semsa can ma lus pa kun
NK046(mi)002:18140: gyi gnas skabs dang mthar thug gi don thams cad
NK046(mi)002:18141: bde blag tu bsgrub pa'i phyir ji ltar 'ajama pa'i
NK046(mi)002:18142: dbyangs kyi sku gsung thugs kyi rnam par 'phrul ba
NK046(mi)002:18143: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod
NK046(mi)002:18144: pa rlabs po ches gzhan la phan pa 'ba' zhig
NK046(mi)002:18145: madzada pa bzhin du badga rang gi spyod pa'ang de
NK046(mi)002:18146: 'drar te de 'dra ba kho na rag zhan la
NK046(mi)002:18147: phan pa 'ba' zhig 'grub bar shog cig ces pa
NK046(mi)002:18148: ste mdor na bcom ldan 'das mgon po 'jam pa'i
NK046(mi)002:18150: spyan ras gzigs kyi brtse ba /
NK046(mi)002:18151: phyag na rdo rje'i nus mthu /
NK046(mi)002:18152: kun tu bzang po'i rnam par thar pa la sogs
NK046(mi)002:18153: pa nye ba'i sras chen brgyad la sogs pa'i sku
NK046(mi)002:18154: gsung thugs yon tan phrin las kyi rnam par 'phrul
NK046(mi)002:18155: pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i spyod pa de ji
NK046(mi)002:18156: 'dra ba de bzhin du bdag gis spyod nus par
NK046(mi)002:18157: shog cig ces de'i don du snying nas dge rtsa
NK046(mi)002:18158: bsngo zhing smon lam gdab par bya'o //
NK046(mi)002:18159: de yang dus ji srid du nam mkha' gansa par
NK046(mi)002:18160: gyur pa dang yul 'gro ba ma lus pa ji
NK046(mi)002:18161: srid gnas par gyur pa yi bar de srid du
NK046(mi)002:18162: gzhan don byed pa po badga ni da mya ngan
NK046(mi)002:18163: las mi 'da' bar gansa par gyur nasa 'gro ba
NK046(mi)002:18164: ma lus pa'i 'khor ba dang ngan song gi sdug
NK046(mi)002:18165: bsngal mtha' dag sel bar byed par shog cig /
NK046(mi)002:18166: dmyal ba la sogs pa'i 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal gang
NK046(mi)002:18167: ci'ang rung ba yod pa de dag ma lus pa
NK046(mi)002:18168: kun bdag la smin nas byang zhing dag par gyur
NK046(mi)002:18169: cig / byang chub semsa dpa'i dge 'dun rnams kyi
NK046(mi)002:18170: thugs bskyed dang tshogs gnyis dang smon lam gyis te
NK046(mi)002:18171: de dag gi mthu la brten nas mtha' yas pa'i
NK046(mi)002:18172: 'gro ba ma lus pa gnas skabs dang mthar thug
NK046(mi)002:18173: gi phan bde phun sum tshogs pa la longs spyod
NK046(mi)002:18175: gsum pa gnyis don bstan pa dar rgyas su bsngo ba ni /
NK046(mi)002:18176: mtha' yas pa'i 'gro ba'i 'khor ba dang ngan song
NK046(mi)002:18177: gi sdug bsngal gyi nad thams cad ma lus pa
NK046(mi)002:18178: zhi bar byed pa'i sman gyis mchog gciga pu nyid
NK046(mi)002:18180: gnas skabs dang mthar thug gi bde ba phun sum
NK046(mi)002:18181: tshogs pa thams cad 'byung ba'i gnas dam pa ni
NK046(mi)002:18182: sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa rin po che yin te
NK046(mi)002:18183: / sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa zhes bya ba ni /
NK046(mi)002:18184: pan+di ta chen po dbyig gnyen zhabs kyis //
NK046(mi)002:18185: ston pa'i bstan pa rnam gnyis te //
NK046(mi)002:18186: lung dang rtogs pa'i bdag nyid do //
NK046(mi)002:18187: de 'dzin byed ba smra byed dang //
NK046(mi)002:18188: sgrub par byed pa kho na yin //
NK046(mi)002:18189: zhes gsungs pa ltar bstan 'dzin gyi skyes bu dam
NK046(mi)002:18190: pa rnams kyis bstan pa dang sems can la thugs
NK046(mi)002:18191: kyis dgongs te / lung gi chos 'dul ba mdo
NK046(mi)002:18192: sde mngon pa ste sde snod rin po che gsum
NK046(mi)002:18194: rtogs pa'i chos lam lhag pa'i bslab pa tshul khrims /
NK046(mi)002:18196: shes rab kyi bslab pa ste bslab pa rin po che gsum la sgrub pa nyams len byas te /
NK046(mi)002:18197: gos chos gos gsum gyi lus brgyan /
NK046(mi)002:18198: lung sde snod gsum gyis ngag brgyan /
NK046(mi)002:18199: lam bslab pa gsum gyis sems brgyan te /
NK046(mi)002:18200: bshad sgrub 'khor lo gnyis ldan gyi sgo nas bstan pa 'dzin pa rnams la /
NK046(mi)002:18201: dad gtong 'byor pa phun sum tshogs pa'i bstan pa'i
NK046(mi)002:18202: sbyin bdag rnams kyis rnyed pa dang bkur sti phun
NK046(mi)002:18203: sum tshogs pa dang bacas te phan bde'i 'byung gnas
NK046(mi)002:18204: sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa rin po che 'di nyid
NK046(mi)002:18205: srid mtha'i bar du phyogs dus kun du dar zhing
NK046(mi)002:18206: rgyas la yun ring du gansa par gyur cig ces
NK046(mi)002:18207: smon lam dang 'brel ba dang gnas na ci ma
NK046(mi)002:18208: rung zhes 'dun pa dang 'brel ba dang /
NK046(mi)002:18209: gnas pa zhig bdag gis bya'o zhes dam bca' dang 'brel ba dang /
NK046(mi)002:18210: de ltar byed nus par bla ma dkon mchog rin
NK046(mi)002:18211: po che gsum gyis byin gyis rlobs shig ces gsol
NK046(mi)002:18212: 'debs dang 'brel ba ste 'brel ba bzhi ldan du
NK046(mi)002:18213: bsngo zhing smon lam gdab par bya'o //
NK046(mi)002:18214: de yang mdor na phan bde'i 'byung gnas 'brel tshad
NK046(mi)002:18215: don ldan sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa rin po che
NK046(mi)002:18216: 'jig rten 'dir gnas par gyur na gang de dang
NK046(mi)002:18217: 'brel ba'i bsod nams ches thob pa nyid /
NK046(mi)002:18218: blo gros rgya mtshos zhus pa'i mdo las /
NK046(mi)002:18219: rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dang chos 'dzin dang //
NK046(mi)002:18220: chos sgrub pa dang srog chags snying brtse ba //
NK046(mi)002:18221: chos bzhi 'di dag yon tan mtha' yas te //
NK046(mi)002:18222: 'di dag mtha' ni rgyal bas mi gsungs so //
NK046(mi)002:18223: zhes dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa dang sems can gyi
NK046(mi)002:18224: srog skyabs pa sogs kyi phan yon tshad med par
NK046(mi)002:18225: rtogs pa dang / zung gi mdo las /
NK046(mi)002:18226: gang dag nga yi bstan pa la //
NK046(mi)002:18227: sbyin pa skra tsam byin pa ni //
NK046(mi)002:18228: bskal pa stong phrag brgyad cu ru //
NK046(mi)002:18229: longs spyod che zhing nor yang mang //
NK046(mi)002:18230: zhes sogs kyis sbyin pa dang /
NK046(mi)002:18232: bskal pa bye ba zhes sogs gong du bstan pas tshul khrims dang /
NK046(mi)002:18233: rtogs ba rgyas pa'i mdo las /
NK046(mi)002:18234: thang gcig bsam gtan thun zhugs na /
NK046(mi)002:18235: khams gsum gang ba'i mi rnams la //
NK046(mi)002:18236: srog sbyin pas ni 'di don che //
NK046(mi)002:18237: zhes sogs kyis bsgom pa las byung ba ste bsod
NK046(mi)002:18238: nams bya ba'i dngos po gsum gyi phan yon gyi
NK046(mi)002:18239: khyad par dang / mngon mtho nges legs thob par
NK046(mi)002:18240: 'dod pa rnams bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po gsum
NK046(mi)002:18241: la zhugs na phan yon chen po thob mod /
NK046(mi)002:18242: de bas kyang sgrib gnyis kyi gnyen po mthar thug
NK046(mi)002:18243: pa zab mo stong pa nyid spros pa kun dang
NK046(mi)002:18244: bral ba rtogs pa'i shes rab ni mchog yin pas
NK046(mi)002:18245: de bskyed pa'i don du thos bsam rnam dag la
NK046(mi)002:18248: gang phyir sbyin pas longs spyod dag ni sgrub byed cing //
NK046(mi)002:18249: khrims kyis mtho ris bsgom pas nyon mongs spong byed mod //
NK046(mi)002:18250: shes rab nyon mongs shes bya kun spong de yi phyir //
NK046(mi)002:18251: 'di mchog nyid de de yi rgyu yang 'di thos yis //
NK046(mi)002:18253: byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod las /
NK046(mi)002:18254: thos pas chos rnams shes par 'gyur //
NK046(mi)002:18255: thos pas sdig las ldog par 'gyur //
NK046(mi)002:18256: thos pas don ma yin pa spong //
NK046(mi)002:18257: thos pas rnam par grol ba thob //
NK046(mi)002:18260: thos pa gti mug mun sel sgron ma de //
NK046(mi)002:18261: rkun po sogs kyis mi khyer nor gyi mchog /
NK046(mi)002:18262: kun tu rmongs pa'i dgra 'joms mtshon cha yin //
NK046(mi)002:18263: thabs tshul man ngag ston pas grogs kyi mchog /
NK046(mi)002:18264: phongs par gyur kyang 'gyur med mdza' bo'i mchog /
NK046(mi)002:18265: mya ngan nad kyi mi gnod sman gyi mchog /
NK046(mi)002:18266: nyes pa chen po'i dgra 'joms dpung gi mchog /
NK046(mi)002:18267: dpal dang grags dang gter gyi mchog kyang yin //
NK046(mi)002:18268: ya rabs rnams dang 'phrad na skyes kyi mchog /
NK046(mi)002:18269: tshogs kyi nang na mkhas pa dga' bar 'gyur //
NK046(mi)002:18270: phas kyi rgol bar nyi ma'i 'od dang 'dra //
NK046(mi)002:18273: thos nyung mun long sgom pa'i tshul mi shes //
NK046(mi)002:18274: de med des ko ci zhig bsam par byed //
NK046(mi)002:18275: de bas thos pa brtson bya de rgyu las //
NK046(mi)002:18276: bsam dang bsgom pa'i shes rab yangs pa 'byung //
NK046(mi)002:18279: dam chos bshad pa'i dus bstan phyir //
NK046(mi)002:18281: thos pas byang chub thob gyur na //
NK046(mi)002:18282: nyan phyir lhags pa smos ci dgos //
NK046(mi)002:18284: byams pa seng ge sgra'i mdo las //
NK046(mi)002:18285: stong chen 'jig rten khams ni gser dag gis //
NK046(mi)002:18286: bkang ste gang la sbyin pa byin pas ni //
NK046(mi)002:18287: tshigs bzhi'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig brjod na //
NK046(mi)002:18288: de yi phan 'dogs de ltar 'gyur ma yin //
NK046(mi)002:18289: phan 'dogs byed par 'dod pa gang zhig gis //
NK046(mi)002:18290: 'jig rten gsum na sems can thams cad kyi //
NK046(mi)002:18291: bde ba gang dag yod pa de dag kun //
NK046(mi)002:18292: sems can gcig la sbyin pa byas pa bas //
NK046(mi)002:18293: gang gis de la sangs rgyas lugs kyi ni //
NK046(mi)002:18294: tshigs bzhi'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig brjod na //
NK046(mi)002:18295: de ni shin tu phan 'dogs mchog yin te //
NK046(mi)002:18296: des ni sdug bsngal dag las grol bar 'gyur //
NK046(mi)002:18297: gang gis gang ga'i bye snyed sangs rgyas zhing //
NK046(mi)002:18298: rin chen bdun gyis yongs su bkang byas nas //
NK046(mi)002:18299: rab dag'i sems kyis rgyal la phul ba dang //
NK046(mi)002:18300: gang gis sems can gcig la tshigs bcad byin //
NK046(mi)002:18301: rin chen sbyin pa shin tu rgya chen des //
NK046(mi)002:18302: tshigs bcad sbyin pa snying rjes bsgrub de la //
NK046(mi)002:18303: char yang mi phod grangs su'ang ma yin na //
NK046(mi)002:18304: gnyis dang gsum la bsam du ga la yod //
NK046(mi)002:18305: zhes sogs dam pa'i chos bcad pa'i phan yon dang /
NK046(mi)002:18306: de kho na nyid bstan pa'i mdo las /
NK046(mi)002:18308: gang gis bskal pa gcig gi bar du nyan pa bas /
NK046(mi)002:18309: gang gis se gol bton pa tsan gcig tu de
NK046(mi)002:18310: kho na nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin bsgob na bsod
NK046(mi)002:18313: de ltar bas na de kho na nyid kyi ting
NK046(mi)002:18314: nge 'dzin 'di gzhan la nan gyis gdams par bya'o
NK046(mi)002:18315: // zhes sogs kyis tshul bzhin bsgom sgrub bgyis pa'i phan yon dang /
NK046(mi)002:18317: gang chos nyan pa'i rgyu'am 'chad pa'i rgyur tha na
NK046(mi)002:18318: gom pa gcig 'dor ram tha na dbugs gcig 'byin
NK046(mi)002:18320: 'di yang dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa'i zhes bka' stsal zhing /
NK046(mi)002:18321: de bzhin gshegs pa gsang ba'i mdo las /
NK046(mi)002:18322: dam chos 'dzin pa'i bsod nams ni //
NK046(mi)002:18323: sangs rgyas kun gyis nan tan du //
NK046(mi)002:18324: bskal ba bye bar brjod mdzad kyang //
NK046(mi)002:18325: mthar phyin par ni 'gyur ma lags //
NK046(mi)002:18326: zhes sogs kyis dam pa'i chos 'dzin zhing bsrung ba'i
NK046(mi)002:18327: phan yon ste tshul de ltar gang gsungs pa rnams
NK046(mi)002:18329: me ni grang bar 'gyur yang srid //
NK046(mi)002:18330: rlung ni zhags pas zin yang srid //
NK046(mi)002:18331: nyi zla thang la lhung yang srid //
NK046(mi)002:18332: las kyang 'bras bu bslu mi srid //
NK046(mi)002:18335: zla ba skar ma bcas pa gnas lhung zhing //
NK046(mi)002:18336: ri dang grang du bcas pa'i sa gzhi las //
NK046(mi)002:18337: nam mkha'i khams ni rnam par gzhan gyur kyang //
NK046(mi)002:18338: khyod kyis mi bden pa yi tshigs mi gsungs //
NK046(mi)002:18339: zhes sogs gsungs pa ltar las rgyu 'bras bslu med
NK046(mi)002:18340: kyi tshul la yid ches pa'i sgo nas ston dang
NK046(mi)002:18341: bstan pa mchog dang mjal ba'i mi lus don dang
NK046(mi)002:18342: ldan pa la 'bad par bya'o zhes 'phros don du
NK046(mi)002:18343: smras so // gsum pa mjug yongs su rdzogs pa'i bya ba la /
NK046(mi)002:18346: gang gis brtsam pa'i mdzad byang /
NK046(mi)002:18347: mjug lo ts+aa bas 'gyur byang bshad pa dang bzhi las /
NK046(mi)002:18349: lhag pa'i lha rje btsun 'jam pa'i dbyangs gang gi
NK046(mi)002:18350: byin gyis brlabs pa'i bka' drin gyis bdag la 'jig
NK046(mi)002:18351: rten gyi bya ba snying po med pa rnams la
NK046(mi)002:18352: chags pa spangs nas thos bsam sgom gsum la sogs
NK046(mi)002:18353: pa'i dge ba'i bya ba kho na rtse gcig tu
NK046(mi)002:18354: btson pa'i blo khyad par can byung ba'am skye bar
NK046(mi)002:18355: mdzad pa de ni bcom ldan 'das 'ajama pa'i dbyangs
NK046(mi)002:18356: yin pas de la sgo gsum gus pa'i sgo nas
NK046(mi)002:18357: phyag 'atshala lo // de bzhin du skyes bu dam
NK046(mi)002:18358: pa gang dag gi bka' drin gyis badga khyim nas
NK046(mi)002:18359: khyim med par rab tu byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs
NK046(mi)002:18360: par mdzad nas lung dang rtogs pa'i yon tan rnams
NK046(mi)002:18361: gong nas gong du dar zhing rgyas par mdzad pa
NK046(mi)002:18362: dpal n+aa len+t+ra'i mkhan po rgyal po'i lha dang slob
NK046(mi)002:18363: dpon la sogs pa bla ma dge ba'i bshes gnyen
NK046(mi)002:18364: rnams la'ang badga nyid gus pas phyag 'tshal lo zhes
NK046(mi)002:18365: phyag mdzad pa ltar rang re rnams kyis kyang rang
NK046(mi)002:18366: rgyud la lung rtogs kyi yon tan cung zad re
NK046(mi)002:18367: yod pa de su zhig gis bka' drin la brten
NK046(mi)002:18368: nas byung ba yin kyang de nyid la rang gis
NK046(mi)002:18369: bla mar bzung nas bka' drin dran pa'i sgo nas
NK046(mi)002:18370: sgo gsum gus pas phyag 'tshal bar bya dgos pa
NK046(mi)002:18371: phyag 'atshala lo // yin no // gnyis pa ni /
NK046(mi)002:18372: byang chub semsa dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug pa lasa /
NK046(mi)002:18373: bsngo ba zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bcu pa'i 'grel ba'o //
NK046(mi)002:18375: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug pa slob
NK046(mi)002:18376: dpona chen po sh+aan+ta de bas te zhi ba'i lhas
NK046(mi)002:18377: madzada pa rdzogsa so zhes so //
NK046(mi)002:18379: de la bstan pa la snga 'gyur dang phyi 'gyur
NK046(mi)002:18380: zhes pa ji ltar yin na 'phags pa rigs gsum
NK046(mi)002:18381: mgon po'i rnam 'phrul sbyin bdag chos rgyal srong btsan
NK046(mi)002:18382: sgom po dang / khri srong lde'u btsan dang mnga'
NK046(mi)002:18383: bdag khri ral can can ste bsgyur yul pan+di ta
NK046(mi)002:18384: lha rigs pa'i seng ge nas pan chen smrir ti
NK046(mi)002:18386: 'gyur byed thu mi sam b+ho ta nas rong zom
NK046(mi)002:18387: kun mkhyen d+ha rma b+ha dra'i bar du bsgyur ba'i
NK046(mi)002:18388: mdo rgyud dgongs 'grel dang bcas pa rnams la snga
NK046(mi)002:18390: phyis su lo chen rin chen bzang po la sogs
NK046(mi)002:18391: pas bsgyur ba'i rgyud 'grel pa dang mdo phran 'ga'
NK046(mi)002:18392: zhig bcas bsgyur ba la phyi 'gyur gsar ma zhes
NK046(mi)002:18393: grags na'ang don du de thams cad bdag cag gi
NK046(mi)002:18394: ston pa thugs rje can sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
NK046(mi)002:18395: rgyal ba sh+aakya thub pa'i bstan pa rin po che
NK046(mi)002:18396: dang de 'dzin pa'i skyes bu dam pa lta ba
NK046(mi)002:18397: bka' rtags kyi phyag bzhi dang ldan pas gsang gsum
NK046(mi)002:18398: gyi mdzad spyod thams cad chos sku'i klong du mkha'
NK046(mi)002:18399: ltar dbyer mi phyed pa'i bdag nyin can kho na
NK046(mi)002:18400: yin pas na phyogs dang ris su gcod par bya
NK046(mi)002:18402: gzhung 'adi'ang legs sbyar gyi skad du brtsams shing rgya
NK046(mi)002:18403: gar 'phags pa'i yul na gnas pa la snga 'gyur
NK046(mi)002:18404: gyi dus su rgya gar gyi makhana po chen po
NK046(mi)002:18405: sarba dz+ny+aa de ba ste thamsa cad mkhyen pa'i lha
NK046(mi)002:18406: dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+aa ba ni rdog lo chen pos /
NK046(mi)002:18407: bee ro tsa na nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam //
NK046(mi)002:18408: ska cog zhang gsum nyi zla zung 'brel dang //
NK046(mi)002:18409: rin chen bzang po tho rangs skar chen 'dra //
NK046(mi)002:18410: kho bo cag ni srin bu me khyer tsam //
NK046(mi)002:18411: zhes pa'i nang tshan ban+de ska ba dpal brtsegsa kyis
NK046(mi)002:18412: kha che'i dpe las bod kyi skad du bsgyur cing
NK046(mi)002:18413: zhus te zhes zhu dag kyang mdzad de 'chad nyan
NK046(mi)002:18414: gyis gtan la phab pa las skal ldan rnams la
NK046(mi)002:18415: phan pa rgya chen po mdzad pa'o //
NK046(mi)002:18416: slad kyi rgya gar gyi makhana po d+ha rma sh+r+ai b+ha bra ste chos dpal bzang po dang /
NK046(mi)002:18417: zhu chen gyi lo ts+aa ba ban+de rin chen bazanga po dang /
NK046(mi)002:18418: sh+aakya blo gros kyis yul dbus kyi dpe dang 'grel
NK046(mi)002:18419: ba dang mthun par bcosa shing bsgyur te gtan la
NK046(mi)002:18420: phab pa'o // yang dus phyis rgya gar gyi makhana
NK046(mi)002:18421: po sum ti k+ait+t+ai ste mkhas pa legs pa'i blo
NK046(mi)002:18423: zhu chen gyi lo ts+aa ba dge slong rngog lo
NK046(mi)002:18424: chen po blo ldan shes rab kyis dag par bcosa
NK046(mi)002:18425: shing bsgyur te legsa para gtan la phab pa'o //
NK046(mi)002:18426: zhes pa 'dir sa bzang 'grel bar bal po'i pan+di ta su ma ti k+ait+ta zhes dang /
NK046(mi)002:18427: lo ts+aa ba phyi ma gsum gyis bcos shing zhus
NK046(mi)002:18428: te dag par byas te gtan la phab pa'o zhes
NK046(mi)002:18429: dang / bar skabs su cung zad ma dag par
NK046(mi)002:18430: song ba rnams bdag gis kyang rgya dpe dang 'grel
NK046(mi)002:18431: ba la gtugs te dag par bgyis pa'o zhes gsungs
NK046(mi)002:18433: 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi rjes bzung zhi ba lha'i //
NK046(mi)002:18434: byang chub sems dpa'i lam bzang spyod 'jug nyid //
NK046(mi)002:18435: rigs gsum dbyer med chos kyi dbang po yi //
NK046(mi)002:18436: bka' srol gdams pa stong gi bcud phul dpyid //
NK046(mi)002:18437: de slad bstan 'gror sman pa'i thugs bzhed kyis //
NK046(mi)002:18438: dam pas legs bskul chud mi za phyir du //
NK046(mi)002:18439: gang gsungs rang blor nges pa'i zin bris sogs //
NK046(mi)002:18440: zab mo'i gsung gi snang ba 'dir bkod do //
NK046(mi)002:18441: rnyed bkur grags 'dod dug gis ma bslad kyang //
NK046(mi)002:18442: ma rig bdag 'dzin gdon chen snying zhugs pas //
NK046(mi)002:18443: ma rtogs log pa'i nyes pa gang mchis pa //
NK046(mi)002:18444: bla ma lha dang dam pa lha rnams la 'chags //
NK046(mi)002:18445: dam pas bskul phyir gsungs rgyun mi nyams phyir //
NK046(mi)002:18446: gzhan la phan phyir dam chos 'dzin pa'i phyir //
NK046(mi)002:18447: 'dir 'bad dus gsum dge tshogs kun bsdoms te //
NK046(mi)002:18448: sras bcas rgyal ba'i yongs bsngo mchog gis bsngo //
NK046(mi)002:18449: phyogs med rgyal bsten dar zhing rgyas gyur cig /
NK046(mi)002:18450: phyogs 'dzin nyams pa'i chags sdang byang gyur cig /
NK046(mi)002:18451: phyogs kyi rgol ba kun nas zhi gyur cig /
NK046(mi)002:18452: phyogs bcur chos kyi rgyal mtshan bsgreng gyur cig /
NK046(mi)002:18453: phyogs dus kun tu bstan 'dzin zhabs brtan cing //
NK046(mi)002:18454: dge 'dun sde 'phel sbyin bdag dpal 'byor ldan //
NK046(mi)002:18455: phan bde'i 'byung gnas rgyal bstan rin pa che //
NK046(mi)002:18456: phyogs dus kun tu 'dzin cing spel gyur cig /
NK046(mi)002:18457: bdag sogs deng nas tshe rabs kun tu yang //
NK046(mi)002:18458: bla ma lhag pa'i lha yis rjes bzung ste //
NK046(mi)002:18459: 'gro la phan phyir byang chub spyod mchog gis //
NK046(mi)002:18460: bstan pa'i snying po phyogs bcur 'jin gyur cig /
NK046(mi)002:18461: gang 'dir 'brel tshad tshe ring nad med par //
NK046(mi)002:18462: sgo gsum dge la yang dag gzhol gyur te //
NK046(mi)002:18463: don gnyis lhun 'grub chos kyi rgyal po nyid //
NK046(mi)002:18464: 'thob par lha dang bla mas byin gyis rlobs //
NK046(mi)002:18465: de ltar smon gang 'grub pa'i mthun 'gyur nyid //
NK046(mi)002:18466: bla ma dkon mchog rtsa gsum rgya mtsho yis //
NK046(mi)002:18467: bden pa'i gsung gis gnang dang chab gcig par //
NK046(mi)002:18468: bkra shis dge legs me tog char 'bebs stsol //
NK046(mi)002:18469: zhes pa'ang phyogs dus gang zag dman par gyur cing
NK046(mi)002:18470: skyes sbyong gi sher brtson zhan par gyur na yang
NK046(mi)002:18471: shar kahthoga pa chen po yongs rdzogs bstan pa'i mnga'
NK046(mi)002:18472: bdag gnas lnga rig pa'i pan+di ta si tu chos
NK046(mi)002:18473: kyi rgya mtsho nas bla ma'i zhal rgyun ltar spyod
NK046(mi)002:18474: 'jug 'grel pa zhig bris zhes bka' yis gnang ba
NK046(mi)002:18476: yid lhung rtsa shul dgon pa'i sprul pa'i sku mchog
NK046(mi)002:18477: 'gyur med theg mchog bshad sgrub rgyal mtshan dpal bzang
NK046(mi)002:18478: po zhes deng gi dus na phan bde'i 'byung gnas
NK046(mi)002:18479: lung rtogs kyi rgyal bstan rin po che la bshad
NK046(mi)002:18480: dang bsgrub pa'i mdzad bzang thugs dam du mdzad pa
NK046(mi)002:18481: bstan pa 'dzin pa'i skyes bu dam pa'i rnam thar
NK046(mi)002:18482: dang bzhes mdzad pa gang gis lha gos dang rgyal
NK046(mi)002:18483: ba kun yum phrin las dpal mo nyer gcig gi
NK046(mi)002:18484: snang brnyan rin po che dang po'i ras bris dang
NK046(mi)002:18485: / rdor dril dang spar du sgrub pa'i zhal bzhes dbyar dam dang /
NK046(mi)002:18486: bri gzhi'i shog bu bcas nan bskul gyis don gnyer ches gnang na'ang /
NK046(mi)002:18487: rang dben rir sos dal nyi phul nyal snyam sogs
NK046(mi)002:18488: kyis de gar lus mur snga 'gyur bstan pa'i nyi
NK046(mi)002:18489: ma zhe chen rgyal tshab rin po che 'gyur med
NK046(mi)002:18490: pad+ma rnam rgyal gyi zhal snga nas de tshul dgongs
NK046(mi)002:18491: nas dar mdzod thag bcas gnang nas de ltar myur
NK046(mi)002:18492: du 'grub na thugs shin tu dgyes tshul gyi bka'
NK046(mi)002:18493: yi gnang bskul ched bstsal dang /
NK046(mi)002:18494: sngar bskul ba po yang dbyar dam ris su mi
NK046(mi)002:18495: 'dor ba'i dam pa mchog gi ngang tshul can khong
NK046(mi)002:18496: la kha shar phyogs kyi bla ma dag gi sa
NK046(mi)002:18497: 'di nyid spar du 'khod par dkar thigs kyi dngos
NK046(mi)002:18498: rdzas phul ba phyag bsnams dang /
NK046(mi)002:18499: bslab pa gsum la gus pa sh+aakya'i dge slong sangs
NK046(mi)002:18500: rgyas sam blo gros mchog ldan dang sh+aakya'i dge slong
NK046(mi)002:18501: thub bstan dge 'dun 'phel rgyas gnyis kyis kyang lhag
NK046(mi)002:18502: bsam dag pa'i yi ge bar zhal bzhes sogs kyis
NK046(mi)002:18503: mthun pa'i rkyen bzang po'i 'byor pa phun sum tshogs
NK046(mi)002:18504: pa dang bcas par nan bskul yang bskyar don gnyer
NK046(mi)002:18505: cher gnang bstsal ba la lhag pa'i bsam pa bzang
NK046(mi)002:18506: pos dpal dge ba bla ma sku phreng gsum pa
NK046(mi)002:18507: thub bstan yongs rdzogs bstan pa'i mnga' bdag 'jam pa'i
NK046(mi)002:18508: dbyangs dngos o rgyan 'jigs med chos kyi dbang po
NK046(mi)002:18509: zhes snyan pa'i ba dan dkar po srid pa gsum
NK046(mi)002:18510: na mngon par mtho ba gang gi gdan sa chos
NK046(mi)002:18511: 'khor dge gong chos sgar rig 'dzin 'chi med grub
NK046(mi)002:18512: pa bshad sgrub dga' tshal du chos thun rnams kyi
NK046(mi)002:18513: snga thun rnams su ngal ba dang len gyis skyabs
NK046(mi)002:18514: rje thams cad mkhyen pa dpal sprul rin po che
NK046(mi)002:18515: nyid kyi zhal snga nas zla drug tu spyod 'jug
NK046(mi)002:18516: 'di kho na rgyas par gnang ba'i skal bzang thob
NK046(mi)002:18517: pa'i skabs kyi rang gis zin bris dang /
NK046(mi)002:18518: skyabs rje mchog gi thugs kyi sras mchog dbon rin
NK046(mi)002:18519: po che o rgyan bstan 'dzin nor bu'i zhal snga
NK046(mi)002:18520: nas spyod 'jug zhag bzhi bcu rer rgyas par gnang
NK046(mi)002:18521: ba lan gnyis kyi skal bzang thob pa'i zin bris
NK046(mi)002:18522: dang / yang thugs sras dam pa gzhan dag gis
NK046(mi)002:18523: zin bris dang gsung gi snang ba la brten nas
NK046(mi)002:18524: go sla gtsor bton gyis sh+aakya'i btsun gzugs rmong brtul
NK046(mi)002:18525: kun bzang chos grags sam kun bzang dpal ldan du
NK046(mi)002:18526: 'bod pas grub par bgyis pa dge zhing bkra shis
NK046(mi)002:18527: dang / par gyur cig // mang+ga lam //
NK046(mi)002:18530: thub gsung zab dang rgya che'i mdo sde rnams //
NK046(mi)002:18531: snying po dril ba byang chub spyod pa'i gzhung //
NK046(mi)002:18532: lta spyod gnyis char ston pa zhi ba lha'i //
NK046(mi)002:18533: bstan bcos 'di 'dra dus gsum 'byon par dkon //
NK046(mi)002:18534: gang la sems kyi dam pa rin chen 'di //
NK046(mi)002:18535: skyes bu gang gi thugs la zhugs gyur pa //
NK046(mi)002:18536: de ni rgyal sras sems dpa' chen po ste //
NK046(mi)002:18537: bde bar gshegs pa'i gdung 'tshob dam pa yin //
NK046(mi)002:18538: de phyir thar 'dod blo ldan skyes bu rnams //
NK046(mi)002:18539: gzhung 'di khog pa'i snying ltar brtson pa gces //
NK046(mi)002:18540: de lta na yang zab cing barlinga ba yi //
NK046(mi)002:18541: don rnams ji bzhin bkral la snyigs dus 'dir //
NK046(mi)002:18542: zhi lha gnyis pa chos kyi dbang po zhes //
NK046(mi)002:18543: snyan pa 'jig rten gsum na ches gsal zhing //
NK046(mi)002:18544: mkhas grub bye ba'i gtsug gi nor bu de'i //
NK046(mi)002:18545: zhal lung dri med bdud rtsi'i thig phreng 'di //
NK046(mi)002:18546: gang de'i gsung gi sras mchog sde snod 'dzin //
NK046(mi)002:18547: thub bstan kun bzang chos kyi grags pa zhes //
NK046(mi)002:18548: sdom brtson che des legs par bshad pa yi //
NK046(mi)002:18549: rnam 'grel 'di nyid gzhan las khyad par 'phags //
NK046(mi)002:18550: de phyir rnam dkar gtogs pa'i blo ldan ma //
NK046(mi)002:18551: bya rgyal rgod gshogs rgyas 'dra'i rigs sras kyi //
NK046(mi)002:18552: ma yum tshe dbang sgrol ma zhes bgyi bas //
NK046(mi)002:18553: spar du bzhengs pa'i legs byas dge ba'i mthus //
NK046(mi)002:18554: tshe 'di'i pha mas gtso byas sems can rnams //
NK046(mi)002:18555: sgrib gnyis byang zhing tshogs gnyis rdzogs pa dang //
NK046(mi)002:18556: byang chub sems gnyis rgyud la rab skyes nas //
NK046(mi)002:18557: sku gnyis go 'phang myur du thob par shog /
NK046(mi)002:18558: ces pa'ang spar byang smon tshig tu 'jam dbyangs mkhyen
NK046(mi)002:18559: brtse'i sprul ming 'dzin pa blo gros rgya mtshos bris
